title: Very good location
text: Very well located, super central and very close to the metro from the airport. A pleasant space, the booking photos corresponded to what we were expecting. Breakfast is nice, without large foods or apparatus but well served. The staff were very friendly and helpful.

title: Exceeded expectations
text:
I am pretty impressed with this hotel. The staff were friendly, helpful, and extremely patient.

Breakfast was fantastic! Breakfast area is a bit cramped for the amount of people who are trying to get their food though.

Like any NYC hotel, elevators during peak times can be a challenge. We stayed on the top (20th) floor so we didn’t have too many issues but I felt bad for those on middle floors who had to pass up several full elevators. My suggestion for those on middle floors is to ride up and then back down if there’s room to get on. 

Our view of the Empire State Building from the top floor was amazing! Room was extremely clean and shower pressure was decent.

Subway station was close and Times Square isn’t a far walk so location was good. We were able to store our luggage for the day while we checked out more of the city.

We would definitely come back to this hotel in the future!

title: Beds are hard
text: After walking all day through New York city, you just want to go back to your room and rest. Can't do that here. The beds are so hard you can't sleep. The rooms are also very small. Other than that, the stay was fine. I couldn't have slept here more than three nights.

title: Small but Sufficient & Clean
text:
Thank you for the nice warm reception by Anthony at front desk whom checked us in.  Very friendly and kind. 

I can understand the small rooms as the location is strategically opposite  subway (reverent st stop line F) and a street across empire state. Rooms most appropriate for 2 adults. 

Narrow walkways. But i appreciate they placed their housekeeping cart outside for guest to retrieve any amneties anytime at their convenience. Their showerhead is non-detachable. Warm Water flow is unstable . Had difficulty adjusting for every shower. Insufficient hooks. 

Lifts were inconvenient and slow especially during breakfaslt times. Only 2 lifts to service so many floors.

Breakfast was good spread with DIY waffles , hot food and delicious bagels. Basic fruits served. Limited seating. 24 hours tea and coffee.

title: EXTREMELY POOR AIR QUALITY - SMOKING IN THE HOTEL
text:
The hotel is horrific. Very dirty. 
They advertise as a non smoking hotel but it is far from the truth.
My 3 year old son almost had an Asthma attack because of the poor air quality.
We tried speaking to the staff but they could not care less.
I'd strongly advise anyone from staying here

title: Fun quick trip to NYC!
text: My husband & I traveled up by train for a quick trip Thursday to Saturday.  We had Stephen Colbert & A Beautiful Noise tickets.  This hotel fit our requirements concerning walkability as well as basic breakfast included.  Our room while small was very clean, affordable and had everything we needed.  We were on 15th floor with view of Empire State Building.  Hotel staff very responsive.  They held our bags as we arrived before check in time and after our check out so we could do more exploring.  Hot tea, coffee and water available 24/7 which is great when returning after a brisk walk to Times Square.   Several reviews mentioned slow elevators.   We did not have any elevator issues.  Only thing to be aware of is that the breakfast seating area gets very crowded and both days we took ours back to our room to eat.  Not an issue for us.  We will definitely stay here again!

title: Good basic tourist hotel
text: Great location . Basic breakfast but fine. Lovely front desk staff. Stayed 20th floor. Was able to pre select my own room with online checkin as Hilton Honors member. Empire state view room. Best views rooms 2001 & 2004 . Front facing , top floor. V quiet. Great base for sightseeing or walk to Madison Sq Gardens. Walk to Times Square although far enough away!  Small rooms and no walk in shower but overall good base if out all day. The area felt safe. Near Subway. Overall good experience.

title: strategico
text: Posizione centrale ottimo se si arriva alla Penn station (5min a piedi) dagli aereoporti. La camera pulita e mobilio moderno anche se la presenza di un condizionatore con cui non era facile regolare la temperatura. Comunque accogliente. Comode acqua e caffe nella hall. Presente caffe anche in camera. Lo spazio della colazione non molto grande e con poca varietà. Hall secondo me non da albergo a 4 stelle per gli spazi offerti.

title: Boa localização e staff incrível
text:
Hotel muito bem localizado, próximo de estações de metrô (que ligam a toda Manhattan), bem como das 5a e 6a avenidas, Broadway e Times Square.
O staff é muito atencioso e educado.
O quarto tem um tamanho ok para até 3 pessoas, mas pode dificultar para alocação de malas para um número maior. 
O aquecimento do quarto era bom, mas a máquina fazia um barulho excessivo.
Um ponto negativo é o café da manhã, que possui poucos itens, além de ficar localizado em uma sala pequena para a quantidade de hóspedes. O mesmo para a quantidade de elevadores (apenas 2), que não conseguem alocar a quantidade de hóspedes, forçando muitos deles a terem que usar as escadas para não precisarem ficar a espera.

title: A nice hotel, super staff
text: I have to say the positives outweigh the negative with this hotel. The staff is super nice and friendly…they are always smiling and helpful. The breakfast is also good. Our rooms were clean and the bed is comfortable. My only negative was that the bathrooms need some updating, but it was clean and the water was hot. There are only two elevators, and they are slow. The rooms are small, but all NYC rooms are. We had enough room for two adults. I also like the location. It’s far enough from Time Square, but it’s close enough to walk anywhere.

title: Nice rooms, quiet, very accessible location
text:
We stayed here for three nights and overall had a very positive experience despite a few hiccups. Upon checking in, we were informed that the King Size bed we booked was not available and that we were in a room with two beds. Not ideally, but luckily they were double beds so not too cramped. 

The room was clean, spacious (for NYC) and quiet. Beds were very comfortable. Breakfast was good, with some staples and some daily variants. Coffee/tea/water is available all day and in the afternoons there are also cookies.

As a former NYCer, I was hesitant about staying in midtown but found the location very convenient. Close to several subways meant getting where we needed to go quickly and efficiently, and it's also a five minute walk to Penn Station so easy for airports.

Staff was all very nice and welcoming.

One negative, which is a reiteration of other people's comments is the elevators are SO slow and seem to have a mind of their own. Hardly a deal breaker especially considering the cost of the hotel.

We'd stay again and recommend it.

title: Perfect Location
text: Steps from Herald Square & Macy’s Thanksgiving Parade plus within walking distance to the theater district, Times Square, Hudson Yard, Union Square, Byrant Park. The employees were outstanding & were so attentive to us our entire stay. They went beyond the normal level of service.

title: Bene solo la posizione e il personale
text: Peccato perché l’hotel è posizione strategica per le maggiori attrazioni da visitare a piedi. Ma la struttura è veramente fatiscente. Camera grande per gli standard di New York e senza moquette ma a parte il letto comodissimo ed enorme tutto cade a pezzi dai mobili alle porte. Personale gentile e disponibile pulizia ok.

title: Great Location
text: Location is GREAT! I was "upgraded" to the 20th floor (w/empire view) which turned out to be a downgrade facing the side building from our original room facing the main street. Once in our new room the bed linen was dirty with hair in it. They did come and change the sheets right away, unfortunately for us it happened to be super late in the evening and we were tired. The elevators are terribly slow and being on the 20th floor was a pain, it took forever to get up or down from the lobby. The staff was incredibly pleasant.

title: Viagem em família
text: Localização maravilhosa, atendimento, limpeza, café da manhã tudo perfeito, na recepção pessoal, super atencioso, passavam na hora as informações solicitada.checkout foi muito rápido e perfeito. A localização é mais do que perfeita.

title: Weekend getaway
text:
This trip was a weekend getaway with family. I usually stay at the Hampton Inn when travelling with family because of the free breakfast (budget saver). I selected this location because the hotel is conveniently located within walking distance (toting luggage) of Penn Station. We traveled to NYC via AMTRAK from BWI Airport. This location is also within walking distance of Times Square, the Subway/Metro, and a Korean restaurant next door.

The hotel rooms (we had three rooms) were clean and the front desk staff was professional, friendly, and helpful. Breakfast was delicious and plentiful. When attempting to schedule an automated wake-up, we discovered a problem with the telephone in one of our rooms. The staff was clear about the estimated time of repair (next day). A member of staff made a personal visit to the room for the scheduled wake-up call the next morning. Thank you to the staff for providing this service. 

I am a Hilton Honors member and enjoy the membership benefits. Free nights with points and free bottled water. I will stay at this hotel again.

title: Simply the best
text: I’ve stayed here loads of times, it’s hard to beat the location. Such welcoming staff throughout the hotel, Jason Maintenace engineer was so nice when he fixed something in our room. Room was spotless as usual, big and spacious room. Love the breakfast which is included it saves a fortune having to eat out. Can’t praise this gem of a hotel enough. I will always stay as long as I come to New York City. Well done to all staff who work there 👏👏

title: Opción en el centro a precio razonable
text:
Hotel bien ubicado, muy cerca de lugares turísticos, se puede ir caminando a la mayoría de los sitios más emblemáticos. Excelente conectividad a través de distintas líneas de metro y estaciones de tren como Penn o Grand Central.
La atención del personal es muy buena. Muy amables, y cordiales.
Limpieza buena. 
Ofrece desayuno gratis, correcto.
Como desventaja menciono que cuenta con dos ascensores, muy muy lentos, en nuestra estadía se rompió uno varias veces. La espera era realmente muy larga. En el horario de la mañana eran tremendas las esperas. Algunas veces decidí bajar los 19 pisos para no esperar tanto tiempo.
Las habitaciones son muy pequeñas, con poco espacio para guardado.
Otro punto a favor es que cuentan con café y té free dirímete todo el día, y por la tarde ofrecen unas galletas muy ricas.

title: Solid Choice
text: The location of the hotel is the real main plus point being right in the heart of the action.  We decided to take the LIRR from JFK to Penn station and on the whole this was an easy ride followed by a ten minute easy walk to the hotel.  The hotel itself has a great set of reception staff who are very helpful and greet you upon return to the hotel.  The hotel provides 24/7 coffee which was also great.  Our room was on the 3rd floor street side, this had its advantages and disadvantages, the main advantage was that you could walk up the stairs and thus avoid the terrible wait for the lifts, however there was a little bit (but not too much) street noise.  The hotel serves breakfast which was a bit chaotic but on the whole worked well.  On a couple of occasions if you went after half past 9 some of the items had run out and it was also sometimes difficult to find a seat.  Also they use single use plastic cutlery which seems a terrible shame.  On the whole though I would recommend the hotel for your stay in NYC.

title: 3 night stay
text:
We booked this hotel because of its location, a couple of minutes walk from both the Empire State building and Macys - Times Square is about 10-12 minutes away. At taxi from Newark Airport (EWR) is about $100 including tolls.

The beds were massive and the room clean and decorated to a good standard, we were on the 6th floor and didn't get too much street noise. There was a hot breakfast provided with coffee/drinks available 24/7. There were tables downstairs where you could bring in food to eat during the day.

The reception staff were helpful and when we were there, there were free cookies at the front desk. Only real criticism were that the lifts were slow.

title: Hôtel bonne qualité très bien situé
text:
Hôtel très bien situé , à 100 m du Macy et a 5 min de l empire state building, a 15 min de Times square . 
Très bonne literie , personnel très sympathique 
Seuls bémols : salle du petit déjeuner de petite capacité et panne d ascenseur récurrente, très gênant quand ça arrive

title: Hôtel très bien placé chambres spacieuses très propre bien équipées avec  wifi gratuit
text:
La chambre était d’environ 19m2 literie king size bonne literie très bien équipée environ 12 prises électriques et autant de ports usb 
La salle de bain spacieuse propre et très fonctionnelle 
Wifi gratuit très bonne réception
 petit déjeuner gratuit et boissons chaudes à disposition 
Bémol sur la lenteur des 2 seuls ascenseurs et la cohue au petit déjeuner car la salle est mal agencée et trop petite
Bouche de métro à 50 m

title: Excellent stay 👍🏼
text: Recently stayed here for 3 nights. We really liked this hotel. Location was spot on! Breakfast was good and varied but got busy the later you go. Free coffee and water all day. Helpful staff. Room clean, quite small but to be expected in New York. Subway right outside. Couldn’t fault it really! Excellent stay no resort fee and free breakfast what more can you want! 👌🏼

title: Excelente hotel. Recomendo
text: Excelente hotel, localização perfeita, quarto ótimo tamanho , cama confortável, toalhas e roupa de cama novas. Café da manhã variado, com tudo de qualidade. O banheiro era muito bom, funcionava perfeitamente com todos os amenities. Pessoal da limpeza simpático e solicito. Os da recepção então…muito prestativos sempre com um sorriso no rosto e fazendo de tudo para resolver qualquer coisa que se solicitasse. Destaque especial para o funcionário Sinsir, da recepção, sempre gentil e nos ajudou muito. No último dia saímos de madrugada do hotel e o funcionário Emanoel também resolveu com boa vontade e simpatia todas as nossas questões. Recomendo do demais o hotel.

title: Scegliere questo hotel senza dubbio!
text:
Hotel in centro a pochi passi dalla metro e dalle attrazioni principali.
Colazione abbondante e pulizia della camera  effettuata tutti i giorni !
In bagno sempre disponibili shampoo, balsamo, bagnoschiuma e addirittura crema corpo!

title: excelente escolha
text: Quarto amplo, limpo e arejado. Funcionários dedicados e prestativos (agradecimento especial ao Jose). Café da manhã muito bom, com produtos de qualidade. Não tivemos dificuldades com os elevadores nem com o café da manhã, como relatado por outros hóspedes. Localização excelente, vários pontos turísticos muito próximos, restaurantes e uma estação de metrô ao lado.

title: Money back
text: Do not stay at this hotel. They will take a $350 dollar deposit from you, when its time to refund it, they are nowhere to be found. They don't have an email address, when you call you are transferred to the call center which doesn not understand English.

title: Hello New York
text: It had been 4 years since we had been and it was wonderful to be back.  The hotel is centrally located. The staff is wonderful and the rooms are clear.  The coffee is good and the breakfast are nice.   Thankyou

title: Excelente wi fi y amabilidad personal
text:
Hotel con gran ubicación a 1/2 cuadra Herald Square, con parada de metro en la esquina. Sin dificultades para volver de noche. 
Desayuno con infusiones y leches variadas, cereales, yogur, muffins, manteca, queso untable, frutas enteras, mermeladas y waffleras. Tiene calientes tb, huevos revueltos, salchichas y bacon. Café de cortesía en el estar del lobby 24hs. Se puede traer comida y consumir allí. 
El personal de recepción, especialmente Reyna que habla español y es muy atenta, busca ayudar y complace. 
Hay 2 ascensores para 30 pisos. Ocasionalmente esperé >3'.
Frente a desperfectos en el baño y el aire acondicionado enviaron a mantenimiento para solucionarlo rápidamente. 
Wi fi impecable para trabajar. 
Habitaciones silenciosas con black out, cama muy confortable y con heladera, placard y cafetera. Baño cómodo con bañera.
Almohadas a mejorar.

title: Great hotel and staff
text:
If you are looking for a hotel with great price/quality ratio then look no further! The rooms are pretty big for NYC standards. The staff us super friendly and helpful. You are a minutes walk away from a subway station offering multiple routes. A little further away is Penn railway station so you are very accessible.

It is also a very safe neighborhood and there was staff and security 24/7.

I am already looking forward to booking my next trip!

title: Bom hotel com excelente localização.
text:
Excelente localização, quarto e banheiros novos e limpos. O café da manhã é muito bom para os padrões americanos.
O único ponto negativo é a demora do elevador.
Hotel super recomendado.
Staff atencioso tanto na recepção, quanto no café da manhã ou as camareiras sempre dispostos a ajudar e resolver seu problema.

title: Ottimo soggiorno
text: Personale sempre gentile e sorridente. Colazione nella media ma molto varia. Personale sempre organizzato a risolvere qualsiasi tua richiesta. Posizione centralissima, collegata bene poiché ha la metro a due passi dall’uscita. Torneremo sicuramnete

title: Perfect hotel to explore NYC
text: Had a great stay last week at the Hampton at 35th street. The location was perfect with a subway entrance just steps away. Use the 35th and 6th Ave NE corner exit you'll be right back at the hotel. The front desk is helpful and efficient. The breakfast was more than adequate if a bit busy. My daughter especially loved the mango pineapple juice!  The room was perfect, two double beds with a view of the Empire state building. The hotel only has like 8 rooms per floor with two stairways and an elevator breaking them up. Point is, my room was only next to 1 other room instead of 2 or more like at other hotels. No issues with noise at all! I'm a light sleeper and this is important to me.

title: Great central base
text: I was initially non-pleased by this hotel when we arrived. We were offered a fourth-floor alley view, but asked if we could move as the room felt dark. This was replaced by an eighteenth-floor room - same view, but we had not paid extra and it was quiet and there was much more light. The room had a good shower, a super comfy bed, good air con, a fridge and a huge selection of TV channels. All you could need! The hotel is a fantastic base for everything - you could eat amazing food within two blocks of the hotel for a month. It is a few steps from 34th-Herald Square Station, which is ideal for getting around Manhattan, Brooklyn and the Bronx. Having breakfast included was a money saver - there was an excellent selection. Get there early to miss the queues! Staff were friendly and polite. This hotel doesn’t have the biggest rooms, the flashiest street - but makes up for that by being the most convenient. Would stay there every time from now on.

title: Value for money !  and comfortable
text: Excellent location, next to metro , in the heart of Manhattan-35th, very kind and helpful staff , reception , breakfast cleaning ladies .Rich breakfast included to the price, very clean and comfortable room .

title: Nice family hotel
text: We stayed at the Hampton inn July 18-21 on the second floor. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was clean, larger than expected and the air conditioning worked wonderfully. The daily breakfast buffet was nicely stocked and clean. The hotel is in walking distance to the Empire State building, Macy's, Herald square and maybe 10 blocks to times square. The hotel only has 2 elevators which are slow so we ended up taking the steps multiple times. That is my only complaint, we would stay here again.

title: EXCELENTE UBICACION EN MANHATTAN
text: LA UBICACION ES 10/10, LA LIMPIEZA DEL CUARTO (603) FUE PERFECTA, ESTUVIMOS DEL 26 AL 30 DE JULIO 2023. LLEGAMOS Y NO HABIA SAFE, PERO NOS SOLUCIONARON EL PROBLEMA A LOS 10 MIN. TAMBIEN CON UN RUIDO EN EL BAÑO LE DIERON SOLUCION. REPETIRIA SIN PROBLEMA. ES UN HOTEL BASICO, LIMPIO, BIEN UBICADO Y CON DESAYUNO. PUEDEN MEJORAR LOS HUEVOS EN EL BUFFET. LO DEMAS MUY BIEN. CALIDAD VS PRECIO!

title: bring earplugs
text:
First with the positive- Central location close to Macy’s, theatres, transportation, Times Square. Rooms are tiny but sufficient for 2 occupants.  Front desk and security staff are courteous and polite.  Breakfast was okay. 
Concerns- BOTH our rooms were lower Floor rooms facing 35th street and it was NOISY. You can hear garbage trucks in the early morning, foot traffic and music at night . Windows facing streets should be better insulated. Air conditioner worked great but noisy as well.  Carpeted hallway Floors are filthy and remnants of moldy grape stem was left in space spot for 2 days. Walls and doors are thin so hopefully you’ll have quiet neighbours with no running children which was NOT the case in our tiny floor.  Good part about being on lower floor as it was faster to walk up stairs than waiting for the 2 elevators. 
Luckily courteous hotel staff and  greeters add stars to my review.

title: Un week end a New York
text: Ottima posizione, buon rapporto qualità prezzo, le comete camere non sono nuovissime ma sono pulite. Nota dolente, l’ascensore è lento e nell’ora di punta si possono aspettare anche 10 minuti. buona colazione e personale cordiale

title: Muy buena ubicación
text: Fuí a NYC con mi familia, la ubicación es excelente, puedes ir caminando a la Pen Station, Time square, broadway. El desayuno cumple con lo básico, las recamaras pequeñas pero limpias, si lo recomiendo.

title: TODO MUY BIEN
text: Tuvimos una estadía muy buena desde la llegada hasta la salida con la amabilidad de todo el personal , ubicado cerca de todo y con facil acceso. Tengan en cuenta que en la recepción podes pedir el mapa de la ciudad con todas las líneas de su red para que se te haga todo fácil

title: Very good midtown hotel
text: Located on 35th street between 5th & 6th (closer to 6th), the hotel is a few minutes walk from the Empire State Building and Macy's. Excellent location! My room had a view of 36th street which wasn't very impressive, but the bed was very comfortable, and the bathroom had a bath (with some hot water issues). The room was small, but functional. The staff were very nice. Breakfast was simple but good. There are only two elevators, and in the mornings and evenings it can take a long time to get up and down (I used the stairs when the waiting times got too long). Very good value/price for a midtown hotel.

title: Excelente!
text: Atendimento cordial e atencioso de todos os funcionários. Excelente localização. Próximo aos principais pontos turísticos e transporte. Vista incrível do Empire States. Adorei a experiência e recomendo!

title: Deposit not returned.
text: Visited with my daughter for 4 nights last December. Good location with reasonable, functional rooms but still awaiting out deposit back despite numerous phone calls and emails. Reception staff friendly. Breakfast self- service which is perfectly efficient.

title: Buen hotel y muy bien ubicado
text:
Hotel correcto y simple y muy bien ubicado.
La gente es muy amable, especialmente Luis. Las habitaciones son comodas y el deayuno esta muy bien.
Muy recomendable si vas a estar unos dias en Manhattan.

title: Hotel Hampton inn Ny
text:
El hotel excelente, muy limpio. Muy buena atención, mucha amabilidad ante todas las inquietudes y necesidades que tuvimos. El servicio fue perfecto tanto las personas en la recepción como de limpieza. 
La ubicación del hotel es perfecta para viajar a todos lados de Nueva York en Subway como a pie. 
Algo para destacar son las cookies que cocina el señor Luis. Riquísimas.

title: Great Stay
text: This hotel was clean and felt modern. The hotel staff was friendly and knowledgeable about nearby restaurants and metro routes. Breakfast was always a different option and was always hot and fresh. This hotel is a perfect place to stay when staying in Manhattan.

title: Great stay!!!
text:
First, a few standard things to say about the hotel. The window air conditioning unit was amazing in our room, it kept the room at a true 68 degrees. The beds were pretty decent, not near the standards of home of course, but my husband and I both have bad backs and neither of us left our vacation with stiff and sore backs. We showered at night after very hot and sticky days, so the showers were always great for us. They have big pump bottles filled with shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, and body lotion. I know I saw conflicting previous reviews about this, so just know we were able to store our luggage before check-in since we arrived at 9:30am. Be aware that while breakfast is in session all stored luggage is placed openly in the main lobby, so you will probably want to make sure that you have locks on your expensive goods. Breakfast is absolutely crazy if you show up after 7:30. We could never find a seat indoors after that time, so we always ended up sitting outside. My biggest bit of advice would be to request the lowest floor room that you can get. The elevators are slow, hot, stuffy, and always busy so we took the stairs most of the time which was very convenient.

We took a Lyft when we arrived at La Guardia and it cost $75 with tip. If you want to be really adventurous like us, on the way back to La Guardia we took the N subway train to Astoria Boulevard and then hopped on the M60 bus (at the Hoyt Av/31 stop which you can see before you even go down the exit stairs to the street). The bus arrives frequently, and tickets can be bought at the bus stop using the same type of machines as the Metrocard which itself can also be used as a form of payment. The bus ride costs the same as a subway ride. The neighborhood in that area doesn't appear to be the nicest area around though, but it is very busy, so you aren't in a desolate area.

Lastly, if you have been running around the city and you want to order food to eat in your hotel, Black Tap has great burgers and chicken tenders, and MEW has great sushi. Sitting down in these restaurants isn't easy without a reservation, but takeout for both of them was only a 20 minute wait and then we just ate at the tables outside the hotel.

Final bit of advice, if you are trying to get to Metlife Stadium you should probably leave 3 hours before the event if you plan to take the subway and Port Authority bus line which hundreds of people ride on. We missed half of the Manchester United soccer game because we only left 2 hours before gametime, and our Lyft ride to the stadium was stuck in traffic for over an hour which also added an extra $100 to our original quote from Lyft :(

title: Great Stay
text: The hotel is clean and offers free breakfast every morning. The hotel has security and a keycard is required for the elevator and stairs which helps promote security and helps you feel safe. The rooms were small but that is expected in New York City. It was a great stay!

title: Great Location
text: The location of this hotel is perfect -- close to the subway and all the big attractions without being in Times Square. Our room was clean, albeit tiny (which is to be expected in NYC). Breakfast area was extremely crowded and small each morning, but we managed to still get something to eat. I appreciate that the front desk held our luggage and arranged transportation to LGA on our last day since our flight didn't leave until late afternoon. Would stay here again!

title: Great Family Stay in NYC
text: Our family really enjoyed our stay at this Hampton Inn. The rooms were clean and comfortable (quite small, even for NYC, but still comfortable). I was very happy that the room included a small refrigerator, and the storage was sufficient. A crib was  provided for our son. The bathroom was nice, and the daily housekeeping was thorough. Breakfast was great, and the staff was so helpful and accommodating. I think the best thing about this hotel is the midtown location. We easily walked to and from Penn Station, Times Square, and Rockefeller Center. The Empire State Building and Macy's are right around the corner, and a subway station was right there for everywhere else we wanted to go. We would definitely stay here again!

title: Excellent Location
text: The complimentary tea/coffee offered is very generous on the part of the hotel. The 2 double bed room was a teeny bit cramped for a family of 4 but then, this is New York, right in the middle of the city, so we couldn’t complain.

title: Ottimo
text: Sono stato con la famiglia a fine giugno, e ci tornerei se dovessi tornare a New York! Dalla finestra vedevo l’Empire! Ottima posizione, pulito, personale gentile e con colazione abbondante! Consigliato

title: Disappointed
text:
Five stars --- The cleaning staff does a good job, a few nice new touches are writing your name with welcome on the mirror and a nice letter from the manager.  Elevators are so bad I try to book lower floors so I can take the stairs.  I used to never stop at desk but new elevator system won't take digital key. Now that I have to get this, there are a few front desk personnel that are not so pleasant and you have to go through the whole checkin process.   Not sure reason but totally inefficient.  
The hotel accommodations were nice when I started booking here 7 years ago, a few rooms are still good but others are not at all maintained. Some beds are broken down and squeaky.  Maintenance needs to be done all over.  I stay here about 3 weeks a year. 

Tonight. alarms repeatedly going off ..all night.  But I still have to work tomorrow so I hope they fix it soon, 3rd time in middle of night is beyond frustrating.

title: Atendimento equipe - manutenção hotel
text: check in problems,Shower no heating, Room maid forgot towels two days and to supply the bath soap and receptionist did found the my buys that was deliver by Amazon and 2 days with one of the elevators broken.

title: Hotel muy recomendable en NY
text:
Ubicación excepcional, vistas espectaculares al Empire State desde la habitación, habitación amplia, cómoda y silenciosa, personal atento y servicial dispuesto a ayudarte en cualquier trámite.
Hotel muy recomendable en NY

title: Great location
text:
Overall pretty good. Great location! Quiet street but close to everything and Penn Station which makes sightseeing so much easier. 
Two things we didn’t like: 
1) the beds and towels not bad but not so good quality considering the price 
2) The disposable cutlery for breakfast is very contaminating ! Could make a change there.

title: super
text: bien localisé, bon petit dej selon moi, la literie parfaite, super équipe a l'exception d'une réceptionniste impolie désagréable et j'en passe qui devrait changer de travail et plutôt viser un travail en back office.

title: Family Vacay to the Big Apple
text: Overall a great stay.  Rooms are decent size and quiet on the backside of the hotel.  Water pressure good in the shower and plenty of hot water.  Breakfast has a good selection, but very crowded and we went a variety of times.  Nice outside sitting area in front.  Staff very friendly and helpful.  Location good for Times Square and Broadway.  Only downside were extremely slow elevators and only two for a twenty floor hotel.  Everything else was great and would stay again.

title: Great location- close but outside of Times Square!
text: We had a great 5 night stay. Choose a room on the front of the hotel, for views of The Empire State Building. We were on the 6th floor and still had great views. There are only 2 elevators for 20 floors, just FYI. Everyone was very friendly.  Subway entrance less than 50 yards from entrance. The only thing that was “off” was the hot water. Sometimes the shower was barely warm, sometimes it would burn your skin off. Not enough of an issue that I wouldn’t recommend this place. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Feels like a small town hotel in the middle of the big city.
text:
We like Hampton Inn properties for the small town hotel feeling. 
We stay at the HI South in NYC, Hallandale Beach, FL, and this location on 35th Str in NYC. 
Rooms are clean, breakfast has a variety of offerings that are fresh. 
Its close to work.

title: Muy bueno
text:
Todo estuvo muy correcto, destaco la amabilidad de Emanuel de recepción y del Sr del desayuno.
La ubicación es perfecta.
Tal vez deberían variar un poco el desayuno incluyendo frutas y verduras.
Lo recomendaría sin lugar a dudas!

title: Passable
text:
Stayed at this hotel on my first 3 nights in NYC.

Location - perfect, in the heart of NYC and close to all attractions. Plenty shopping around and food places. Penn station - a block away.
Rooms - clean, very small and needs more cupboards - especially if you are spending a few nights - I prefer unpacking my bags and the cupboards were very limited.
Beds are comfortable.
Bathrooms are clean.
Breakfast was quite limited although satisfying.

Negative - 
The hotel do not store luggage - so bear that in mind and make prior arrangements if you planning on doing so.
Needs more cupboard space
Front desk were friendly but not very helpful or informative. Had to pretty much rely on Google but Jose redeemed that as he was a little more helpful.

title: Café da manhã excelente ! Localização perfeita !
text:
Hotel muito bem localizado , com funcionários muito educados e cortes . Quarto aconchegante e limpo . 
Café da manhã execelente  , com muita variedade e um Senhor muito prestativo e simpático . Com certeza quando retornar a NY , a neste hotel que ficarei

title: Excelente !
text: Excelente!fuimos varias veces a NYC y últimamente siempre lo elegimos por su excelente ubicación,en la puerta del subte, habitaciones modernas y amplias, buen desayuno y cabe destacar la excelente atención de Luis.Muy amable.y reciben paquetes de compras.Volveremos siempre !

title: I booked a King size bed and I didn't have it. It wasn't available when I arrived.
text: Meu único desapontamento com o hotel foi que eu reservei um quarto com cama King size e me deram um quarto com duas camas de solteiro. Fora isso a localização é ótima e o café da manhã é muito bom. Eu não voltaria porque não confio que me darão o que eu solicitar no momento da reserva.

title: Excellent location & easy check in/out
text: This was our first time staying at this hotel.  I carefully read reviews and selected this hotel based on reviews.  The hotel was an easy walk from grand central station. The hotel staff was friendly upon check-in.  As a Hilton member, they apologized for not providing water upon check-in, but we stopped back at the front desk around 11:30pm when we returned for the night and were able to request our waters then.  Breakfast was consistent with all other Hampton Inn’s that we have stayed at.  Wifi was good.  Room was clean. My only criticism of the entire stay is that the floor in the room did have some dust on it - it could have used one more swipe or vacuum from the cleaning team.  I am super-picky about cleanliness, so I don’t think this would bother others.  I like that they don’t have carpet on the floors.  The room was small, which is expected in many NYC hotels, but it had everything we needed.  You can’t beat the location. Macys is a few steps away.  Times Square & Bryant park aren’t far. Great options for casual restaurants right on W35th. We walked down Broadway to see a concert at Irving Plaza.  Stopped at The Smith on the way to have dinner. Really good food.  Took the subway to see Blue Man Group on a Friday afternoon.  We don’t use the subway often, but this was an easy 1 train trip. After check out, we left our luggage with the front desk and enjoyed the city for the day.  We intend to stay here again.

title: Enjoyable stay in the centre of Manhattan
text: Excellent location, very comfortable bed, tasty breakfast what else do you need? The only downside was the lifts were too slow and the shower pressure is not high but any of these things didn’t make our stay and less enjoyable. Would stay again.

title: Tolles zentrales Hotel mit Mängeln
text: Das Hotel ist super Zentral, etwas in die Jahre gekommen, dennoch sauber und ordentlich. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich. Was ich zu beanstanden habe, sind die mitunter langen Wartezeiten am Lift, auch wenn ich Urlaub hatte und das Frühstück. Das Plastikgeschirr und die Auswahl geben den Minuspunkt

title: Hôtel très bien situé.
text:
Hôtel proche de tout et surtout accès au métro au pied de l'hôtel (très appréciable).
Accueil au top petit déjeuner pas très variés mais satisfaisant.
Chambre propre mais un peu veillotte (chambre 1308). Salle de bain propre mais pour quatre un peu petite.
Cela reste que des détails vu que l'on a pas passé beaucoup de temps dans la chambre (voyage en famille).

title: Ubicación
text:
Inmejorable ubicación que al final es por lo que elegimos este hotel.
Las habitaciones son más pequeñas que cualquier otro Hampton que conozca, pero tampoco se está mucho tiempo más que para dormir. El hotel empieza a necesitar una actualización pero está correcto.
El personal es amable, hay desayuno incluido aunque nunca lo probamos pues desayunamos fuera. El señor encargado de cocima es extremadamente amable, además de hacer unas galletas excelentes que ponen en recepción.

El mayor inconveniente es el tema de los ascensores: te puedes estar 20 minutos  esperando para subir en uno de los dos que hay y otros 15 para bajar.

title: Great location
text: My daughter and I come to NYC at least once a year and we always try to stay at this hotel. It is a short 10 minute walk from Moynihan Train Hall and has several subway stops right outside the front door. The hotel is clean, the staff is friendly and the free breakfast has lots of options. A good choice for your stay in New York.

title: First time at Hampton Inn
text: Made a last minute booking at the Hampton Inn 35th street and it did not disappoint. The reception staff were very friendly and helpful. Rooms were a good size for New York, with a great view of Empire State Building. Beds were comfortable and breakfast had a good selection on offer. At times was a bit busy but this was to be expected at peak holiday times. The location was excellent with a subway station at the end of the street. Lots of choice for restaurants nearby.

title: FABULOUS location, safe, clean and friendly!  It can't be beat!
text: This was the 1st time staying here and it did not disappoint.  What a fabulous hotel.  The entire staff was just the best.  EVERYONE was friendly and helpful.  Our room was very clean and quiet.  Our beds were comfortable.  Great shower pressure. Small refrigerater was appreciated.  The free breakfast was outstanding..eggs, potatoes, oatmeal, toast, bagels, fruit, yogurt, waffles, pancakes, juices, milk, coffee.  The  location cannot be beat.  When you walk out the door, Macys and Herald Square shopping are right there.  Just a couple of doors down were pubs and restaurants.  We went to shows in Times Square on Friday and Saturday and walked back.  Took us about 10-15 minutes.  An easy walk along 6th ave.  WE ALWAYS FELT SAFE.  Outside in front is a lovely courtyard with plenty of seating.  I am a smoker (yes I know it's bad) and it was nice to go outside and have a place to sit down without intruding upon others.   The only negatives (and they are small) would be the elevators are slow and it would have been nice to have a little more storage in the room rather than just the small closet and 3 drawers.  We have always stayed tight in Times Square but this is now our go to NYC hotel.  Thank you Hampton Inn for making our trip so enjoyable.  We will be back!

title: Good rooms/location, poor breakfast/lifts
text: Very well located hotel with reasonable sized rooms, some have great Empire State view, staff good. Lifts get very crowded and slow at peak times. Breakfast on Monday was indifferent and on Sunday was poor, with no fresh fruit, limited offerings of cereal and hot items - unless you like waffles. But overall, as a mid-priced NYC hotel, this wasn't a bad place to stay and I would return.

title: Very nice hotel
text: Nice hotel in a central location.  Room and bathroom are spacious and very clean, little space to store clothes.  Breakfast is simple but sufficient, the dining room is small.  Free coffee 24 hours a day.  The staff at the reception are very kind, fast check-in and check-out process.

title: Great stay
text: I use trip advisor to help me book the best hotel so I figure I should reciprocate and right a review to help others. This Hampton inn was a great choice. It was clean- I am a germ/bug freak. As soon as you walk in you are greeted. Staff extremely friendly, very accommodating and if you have request they are on it right away. The room was small which you will expect in the city, but very clean and beds/pillows were really comfortable. They have a little patio where you can sit and enjoy the city life. It is right near the subway and so many attractions. I would recommend you staying there if you are in the nyc area!! I will definitely stay there again if I am in the area.

title: Good Location
text: We loved the location of this hotel as it was close to the subway station and walkable to points of interest and restaurants.  The staff were friendly and very helpful.  My only complaint is that the elevators are EXTREMELY slow.  I would recommend it as were received a good rate for the time of our visit.

title: Excelente!!!
text: Este hotel es genial! Tiene una muy buena ubicación, el subway (N, R, Q) en la misma cuadra a 50 mts, Macys, Target y otras tiendas a 2 o 3 cuadras. El servicio del hotel en general, el personal/staff que atiende es muy atento y habla español. El desayuno (buffet) incluido es muy bueno y hay cafe y te de cortesía todo el día además de cookies recién orneadas durante la tarde.  En todo un hotel muy recomendable para viajeros de negocios y de placer!

title: Hotel molto sporco con manutenzione pessima
text:
Tutto molto sporco, manutenzione scarsa, politiche di vendita non oneste. Ho prenotato con Booking dove era richiesto un deposito di 50$ a camera, all'arrivo mi è stato invece chiesto, oltre al pattuito pagamento integrale, un deposito di $700 pena la non possibilità di entrare in camera nonostante fossero già state saldate integralmente e per un loro errore di comunicazione. 

La pulizia è quanto meno sommaria e soprattutto le camere nel retro, che sono circa la metà dell'hotel, hanno un odore di fritto pesantissimo che impregna tutta la camera e pure i vostri abiti, ciò per via della canna fumaria di una rosticceria asiatica, peccato che l'odore sia tale da non riuscire neanche a dormire e ciò vi capiterà nel 50% dei casi.

title: Albergo gradevole e centralissimo
text: L’albergo gode di una posizione centralissima, a pochi metri è disponibile la fermata della metropolitana. La colazione è inclusa nel prezzo ed ha una buona scelta tra dolce e salato. Il personale gentile e attento alle richieste del cliente.

title: Maravilhoso! Quero voltar.
text: O hotel superou minhas expectativas. Além da ótima localização, posso dizer que o café da manhã estava incrível. Os funcionários trabalham muito para que tenhamos uma ótima refeição matinal. Havia um funcionário homem alto, magro de cabelos grisalhos que não deixava faltar nada. Ele era muito dedicado. Eu deveria ter dado uma gorjeta para ele, mas infelizmente esqueci. Espero retornar novamente algum dia e encontrá-los todos bem e com saúde.

title: I'll definitely be back to this hotel, the location and amenities were great.
text:
This hotel has a lot to recommend it. The rooms are quite spacious for New York, and the free breakfast is plentiful and varied. Sometimes the breakfast room is crowded but you can always take a plate back to your room. The location is excellent if you don't mind being in the thick of things, and the proximity to subways and buses can't be beat.

The heating was very noisy in the first room I was in. I moved rooms after 2 nights and while the heating was quieter in the second room it was still audible, something I've never encountered on previous visits to New York despite always visiting in winter.

title: Great location and value for money
text: Hotel was in a great location and provided good value for money. The room was a decent size and very clean and comfortable. The breakfast was very good with plenty of choice. The staff were excellent and happy to provide assistance with any queries.

title: A great choice for NYC
text: We stayed here Jan 17 - 20, on the seventh floor. The elevator is small so used the stairs. Not a problem. It is a very quiet hotel in a great location. The staff were very pleasant and helpful. We really appreciated the breakfast which is included. The guy in charge is great at keeping everything stocked. We also appreciated the coffee, hot chocolate and cookies which were available when we got back from a rainy day of sightseeing.

title: Hôtel avec un bon rapport qualité prix.
text: Un hôtel très confortable et très bien placé, proche de la cinquième et de l'empire state Building, chambre spacieuse, petit dej copieux, station de métro a 30 mètres qui vous permet de vous déplacer partout.

title: Ci ritornerei!
text:
Ottima posizione vicina alle principali attrazioni di Manhattan. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo, colazione inclusa nella media degli standard newyorkesi, personale gentile e disponibile.
Stanza moderna e ben pulita anche se un po’ piccolina per 4 persone( 2 letti alla francese). Unica pecca è stato l’affaccio all’interno sugli aspiratori delle cucine( impossibile arieggiare la stanza, entravano gli odori della cucina!). Lo consiglio vivamente!

title: Perfekt läge, varm frukost och trevlig service.
text: Grymt bra ställe! Ser inte så mycket ut från gatan men har allt man behöver. Väldigt trevlig service i Receptionen, en ordentlig varm frukost mer varierade inslag. Bra rum och sängar, rent och välskött. Oslagbart läge ett stenkast från Empire, Macy’s och restauranger + butiker. Kan varmt rekommendera det.

title: Highly recommend
text: I love this hotel! The staffs provides exceptional service, ready to help always. Breakfast was good, 24/7 refreshments are provided. The location is near LIRR and subway station is 2 min walk from the hotel. Macys and Empire state is nearby and Times square is short distance.

title: Good hotel
text:
Pros: 
This hotel is in a very good location, Herald Square subway station is only one minute walking, very clean,  very good hot breakfast everyday (scramble, omelette, bacon, sausage, dry cereals, hot oatmeal, breads, fruits, juices, coffee, pastries, waffles, toppings, yogurts), comfortable bed and pillows, housekeeping every day (Debbie did an excellent cleanse work every day) . The room was not too big  but of good size with mini refrigerator, safe box and the bathroom was spacious. 

The staff:  
Luis at the breakfast was exceptional and very friendly. 
Reina at the front desk was very helpful and exceptional too. 

Cons: 
Only two very slowly elevators for 20 floors. 
The staff: 
The woman who did our check in was not very kind. 
We asked for a higher room, she gestured with his face and sighed, first she answered that it  were not ready, we waited and then she  told us that she did not know when it would be ready because they had only one person for housekeeping, but then we saw assigned rooms on the higher floors and about 3-4 housekeeping in the elevator leaving one on each floor to clean. It should be noted that there are 20 floors with 4 rooms each one. She gave us a lower room anyway. My room was 803 from 01/17/2023 to 01/22/2023.

title: Well worth a visit
text: Excellent hotel just a short two minute stroll from Herald Square . Macys and a subway station on your door.  This hotel is excellent value with complimentary breakfast and friendly and helpful staff.  The hotel is on the doorstep of everything you need to see in New York from Empire State, Rockfeller Centre, Times Square etc and with the subway on the doorstep everywhere is reachable.  The staff always welcomed you back into the hotel after your day out and the complimentary cookies at five in the afternoon, if you were back were a lovely treat to go with the 24 hour day complimentary coffee / tea or hot chocolate.  This hotel is definitely value for money with a very good choice of items for breakfast from freshly made waffles, hot food such as omelettes, bacon, potatoes and porridge (oatmeal) with bagels, bread, OJ and other juices also available as well as a selection of fresh fruits.  The beds were very comfortable and the room was spotless.  The Neutrogena toiletries in the bathroom were also very welcome. This is my second time to stay and I will be back again as this hotel cant be beaten for staff, quality, price , comfort and convenience. Thank you for making our stay one to remember.

title: Hampton Inn Hotel
text: In an excellent location - bed was comfortable with a range of facilities, not to mention the complimentary breakfast every morning which was delicious. Staff were friendly and polite - would definitely recommend this hotel for other visitors to New York.

title: Excelente!!
text: Excelente ubicación, buen trato de sus empleados, El desayuno espectacular y la habitación cómoda, siempre limpia, El servicio a la habitación es muy bueno, muy atento. Cerca de Times Square y áreas de interés es conveniente.

title: Great Hotel & Location
text: The location is great, easy access from La Guardia Airport to Penn Station. Close walking proximity from hotel to Herald Square subway, Macy’s, Time Square, Empire State Building, Bryant Park, MSG.  Free Wifi, room was comfortable, cozy and clean, housekeeping was helpful and did a great job everyday tidying our room. Good daily hot breakfast. Coffee, tea and hot chocolate is available throughout the day.  A great variety of restaurants in the surrounding area. Check in was easy and fast, front desk staff were welcoming and friendly.  Freshly baked warm and delicious cookies at the front desk everyday.  A great and convenient hotel to stay.

title: Great  hotel . Excellent service . Ausom location . Hot coffee and hot water 24/7 which was so important .
text: Great  hotel . Excellent service and location. Good breakfast . Hot coffee and hot water 24/7 which was so important on the cold days we had . Keep on the good work 🥂 we will come again soon . Thank u so much 💙

title: Just an awesome hotel & location
text: Once again we had a blast in NYC and once again we stand at this hotel. It's just convenient to everywhere we like to go. We are a walking family so walking 2.3 miles to a certain store and back is no big deal to us. The breakfast is great. Eggs, sausage, bagels, waffles, yogurt, cereal, fruit etc. Yes, the elevators are slow and the rooms are smaller but it's just a great hotel location you easily overlook it. We've stayed here at least 7 times and will be back again next year. The only thing missing was Luis who runs the breakfast area. Due to covid we haven't been to NYC the last two years and we were really looking forward to seeing him since he treats my young daughters so well. Hope all is well Luis! Missed you.

title: Nightmare
text:
I wish I could recommend this hotel to someone but I just can’t. I’m not the type to even write a review let alone a bad review, but I really think I need to this time in the hopes that it will save someone else much trouble. My wife and I after a long day of driving finally arrived to the parking garage which is like 3 blocks away from the hotel. Which that really wouldn’t have been so bad if the hotel lobby would have had a decent luggage cart for us to borrow to get our belongings out of our car three blocks away. They did have a small luggage cart that I could borrow so after checking in I quickly grabbed the luggage cart and pushed it 3 blocks away to where our car was waiting to be parked in the parking garage. After loading as much of our belongings as I could on the insufficient luggage cart, my wife and I then had to hold everything else that we could in our arms as we struggled to push the luggage cart back to the hotel lobby. After we finally got back to the hotel lobby we had to wait for what seemed like the two slowest elevators ever known to man to reach the lobby floor so we could get in it to go to our room on the 10th floor. This hotel has something like twenty stories and a great many rooms yet they only have two elevators for this whole building for the guests. The elevators were so very very slow. 
       Upon arrival to the 10Th floor where our room was, the hallways are so very narrow. I couldn’t even get the luggage cart that I had to push three blocks each way to get back to the hotel info our room on the 10th floor because of the hallway being so narrow so I had to make several trips from the cart around the corner in the hallway to our room several times just to get our belongings into the hotel room.
       Upon our day to checkout of the hotel, there were other people checking in and these guests had filled up the only two luggage carts out of the whole hotel with their luggage yet they were not taking their luggage and luggage carts anywhere but just letting them sit there in the lobby. I asked the hotel clerk at the lobby desk if there was anymore possible luggage carts anywhere and she said no. I then said that I need to have a luggage cart so I can get my belongings out of the hotel room to which she said there was nothing she could do about anything in a rather uncaring way. In the meantime I have to go get our car checked out at the parking garage three blocks away. The attendant at the parking garage was very rude and said I could not even leave my car there for a minute after I paid for the parking fee. So I pay for the parking fee and while the valet is bringing our car down I’m flat out running as hard as I can back to the hotel lobby to where my wife is waiting with all of our belongings after we had to carry everything down from our room by hand and while waiting forever for two very slow elevators. We fortunately were able to get everything loaded in our vehicle somehow at the end but it was a total nightmare. I would never recommend this hotel to anyone.

title: Excellent location
text: Second time I’ve stayed at this hotel.  So convenient.  Elevator is very slow. Room was clean. Needed an additional blanket.  Staff brought it to me very quickly. All the staff were extremely nice.  Found hailing a taxi in front of the hotel was difficult

title: The best hotel
text: Fantastic hotel, easy check in, spotless clean room too. We were on the 19th floor and it was lovely and quiet at night. Works had started on lifts so we thought it would be hell waiting but waited no more then 3 mins every time, with one lift working wasn’t bad at all. Breakfast every morning full and plenty, something for every taste. All the staff are lovely, friendly and very helpful. I’ve stayed here 3 times and will always choose this hotel when visiting New York for its location, cleanliness and price. I would highly recommmend.

title: ttres correct
text:
hotel remarquablement situé a Manhattan , accessible depuis l'aeroport par LIRR a Penn station puis 5 minutes a pieds 
seul bemol le petit dejeuner bien que gratuit il ne vaut pas plus , personnel chaleureux et souriant , chambre confortable , bon rapport qualité prix

title: Good place to stay
text: The place is accessible to everything.friendly staff.Good breakfast.clean rooms. Housekeeping is excellent. I recommended this place if you are planning to go in NYC with your family or friends.itis close to the iconic Macy’s.

title: You can't go wrong here
text:
I've stayed a couple times on this hotel and I had a good stay on both times.

The hotel is somewhat outdated but the service is good and if you're going to use it simply to sleep and rest after a day in the city, this is a good option.

The staff is very friendly and helpful. You can have packages delivered at no cost at this hotel.

Breakfast is included, which is good. However, it's not very good and it's pretty much the same thing everyday. I mean, it's a nice bonus to have breakfast included but please avoid it if you have a chance.

Nothing remarkable about this place but also nothing negative to say. This is a good choice.

title: Really enjoyable stay
text:
We enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  I was a bit sceptical after reading some reviews, and the street didn't look very welcoming when we arrived, but once we were inside the lobby, we were reassured.  The staff were very welcoming and helpful.

Our room was on the 9th floor, and we had a lovely view of the Empire State Building.  The room was a good size for NYC, which was a pleasant surprise.  The air conditioning unit was quite noisy, but we turned it off - thankfully, it wasn't required in October.  There were many USB sockets, which was a real help with all our many gadgets requiring charging.

We didn't have much trouble with the lifts, but they could be slow to arrive or quite full at check-out time.

Breakfast is included in the price, which was a big plus.  The breakfast area is relatively small, but having stayed at a similar hotel nearby, we expected it to be like this.  We always found a seat, even sharing a table with other travellers.  Tea and coffee are available in the breakfast area 24hrs, which is great for us Brits!

The location is excellent, as it's close to most of the tourist places, Penn Station, Madison Square Garden and a subway station almost right outside.  Many restaurants and bars are nearby, so you're not stuck for food and drink.  There is a deli round the corner called Toast, where you can get fresh fruit, hot food and other snacks.

We would have no hesitation in staying here again in the future.

title: Great Hampton in NYC
text: Exactly what a great Hampton Inn should be.   Good location near Penn Station (but not too close), Herald Square and the Empire State building.   Nice renovated rooms with a modern NY vibe, typical small size for NYC but nobody should hang out in their room when visiting NY.   The breakfast area was really nice.  It reminded me of a boutique hotel in Paris (even though the food was the same as any other Hampton Inn).   Great internet.   As others have said, the elevators are a bit slow but this is not uncommon in NYC.  I did not wait more than a few min.

title: Great hotel
text:
The hotel is very well kept and the rooms are cleaned every day till a very high standard.

The breakfast is basic but does the job, proper cutlery would be a simple improvement.

Staff are very friendly and super efficient.

However what makes  this great is where it is situated with access to the action and Maceys.

title: Buon compromesso per stare in centro a NY
text:
Discreto hotel in posizione ottimale per visitare la città .
Piuttosto vecchiotto ma tutto sommato confortevole . Camera discretamente spaziosa 
Colazione essenziale ma comoda .
Una addetta alla reception non proprio cortese con gli stranieri

title: Posizione top , può migliorare
text:
Hotel in posizione spettacolare davanti a Macy’s e sulla fermata della metro arancione, personale cortese e colazione buona,  la pulizia non e’ un granché e pare anche un po’ lasciato andare, gli ascensori sono un punto debole e negli orari di punta c’è da farsi il segno della croce.
Prezzo molto alto ma in zona mi pare siano tutti così

title: Hotel Idéalement situé !
text: Personnel très cordiale, hôtel très propre, chambre correcte en taille. mais surtout idéalement situé, Métro à 50 mètres. Il est à juste a coté de Time square et de l'empire state building. la salle de déjeuner est peu être un peu petite si il y avait un petit bémol à dire. Je recommande cet hôtel

title: Nice hotel excellent staff
text: Came here for 1 night a pair of adults with our 8 year old, the rooms are big but a little old but well maintained. The breakfast was standard but good with plenty of seats available. We found the staff amazing always trying to help the put in extra effort so we could check in easier and gave us a good recommendation for lunch that in the end turned into one of our highlights of our stay. We would recommend.

title: Perfect location, great service but huge waste producer
text:
Hotel itself is perfect located. This was great choise for one who  wants to have Manhattan in walk distance 👍 
Rooms are nice and clean and service was good. ✅
We had breakfast included, but there was not much to choose and repeating the same every 3 days…I was missing at least some vegetables as there was NON at all in offer. ⁉️
What I could not understand and accept ❌❌❌ was huge quantity of waste produced during breakfast. All plates, forks, spoons, knifes, cups were from plastic or paper and end up in waste. 👎 
Imagine amount of visitors,  in times of saving the earth, green strategies and minimizing of waste and I can not agree with this approach. 
I was traveling to many european and asian countries also after covid times, but I havent see it ANYwhere❗️
This would be a reason why I would not visit this hotel again…

title: Lovely hotel, great location
text: Excellent location for Empire State, Times Square etc. Rooms very clean and comfortable we were two adults and a teenager in two double beds and there was plenty of room. All of the staff were very helpful. Empire State view on request. Breakfast very good and lots of choice. Only negative was that the Elevator was quite slow but aside from that we had a very enjoyable stay and would definitely recommend

title: Excelente hotel en Manhattan
text: Excelente hotel. Comodidad y servicio. Inmejorable ubicación.El desayuno está incluido (si si quizás se podría mejorar algo) pero sin prejuicio de ello todo genial. Habitaciones amplias, cómodas y limpias

title: Bon rapport Qualité - Prix
text:
Personnel agréable et souriant.
Bon petit déjeuner sucré, salé et varié.
Les cookies de l'après-midi, une tuerie!!!
Quartier très sympa et sûr .
Propre et efficace.
Je recommande à tous points de vue.

title: Ottimo hotel a Manhattan
text: Hotel in una posizione perfetta a Manhattan con vista Empire State Building (che si trova nella strada parallela) e letteralmente a due passi dalla metro. Staff super gentile e pulizia della camera giornaliera. Ottima la colazione inclusa nel prezzo (uno dei principali motivi che mi ha fatto scegliere questo hotel). Sempre disponibile l'acqua, oltre a frutta e cookies. Lo consiglio!!!

title: Exceeded our expectations!
text: Worked for us!  Great location & friendly staff!  King room was what you would expect in NYC for two - size was adequate & it was clean.  Amazing view of Empire State Building!  Per the other reviews, the only downside is the elevator - a bit slow.  Overall, exceeded are expectations & was a great value in NYC!  Would stay at again!

title: Honest review
text: Just back from a trip to New York and booked this hotel. The size of the room for 3 adults was cramped I would definitely book again but not thus room as it definitely was not spacious. Staff were friendly I think initially it was for 2 ppl as they only had facilities in room for two ppl . Nice h[otel great location it was a pity about the room size

title: Great stay in midtown.
text: This Hampton Inn had the best, friendliest staff ever!  When we arrived exhausted after a redeye flight from the West coast, they were able to offer us a room (and breakfast) at 6:30 am.  We were so grateful for some much-needed sleep.  Room was spotless.  Elevator, as others have said, was slow.  Breakfast room was crowded unless we went really early, but in general this place does a great job!

title: Good location
text:
The staff are wonderful, however the hotel is in need of certain refurbishments. The lifts take forever and there aren't enough, so the wait can be long particularly when you are on a high number floor!

Breakfast was okay, but there isn't enough space for people to sit down with their food. 

But I can't fault the location, or the room itself!

title: Perfekt läge, stora fräscha rum med bra standard
text: Hotellet som ligger i midtown 35st knappt 150 meter från Macys och ca 50 meter till Subway tunnelbanan är perfekt läge. Jag har även bott på andra hotell längst gatan så jag känner till området väl. Hotellet är bra och erbjuder enklare frukost som är mycket värt speciellt när du har med dig  familjen. Bra storlek på rummen, rent och fräscht, kyl och safetybox. Tyvärr var de två hissarna katastrof, vi blev dessutom fast i en hiss en morgon och det var ingen kul upplevelse men dom funkade resten av veckan och man hoppas att dom har en plan att förbättra dom.

title: Overnight stay
text:
The location in midtown was excellent. The bed was extremely comfortable. The lift lived up to its very bad reputation. Only one lift was working, apparently it was working a few days earlier. 
The variety at breakfast was great and the room was not as small as I expected.

title: Good stay again...
text:
Stayed here 4 times now...the location is excellent. Had a Double/Double room for the 4 of us- enough room too- bathroom bit on the small side but had everything you need. On the 12th floor with a view of Empire State Building. Air-con a bit loud but after all the walking around slept very easily so didn't disturb us too much. 
We were lucky with our breakfast time and always managed to get seats- enough choices - 3 hot items, then waffles, muffins,bagels, oatmeal & cereals,breads, yogurt etc.
Tea, coffee & hot chocolate & juice.
Cookies in the afternoon & always water available.
Liked the sofas outside now...that was lovely.
Staff friendly....lifts can be a pain and slow...160 steps up to 12th floor..got our steps in that way too!!!
Would always recommend.....

title: Excelente opción precio y calidad
text: El hotel muy bien situado, personal de recepción muy amable, limpieza de hotel y cuartos muy bueno, desayuno basto, algo repetitivo pero es buen arranque. Algo pequeño el hotel pero así es en Ny, muy cerca de 5 Avenida y Times Square, Metro en la esquina. Muy buena opción en NY por precio y calidad.

title: Gutes Hotel in zentraler Lage, Metro vor der Tür. Tolles Frühstück.
text: Gutes Hotel in bester Lage. Zimmer ausreichend groß mit Blick auf Empire State. Schrank etwas klein. Nur 2 Aufzüge bei 20 Etagen, in Stoßzeiten längere Wartezeit. Aber ganz tolles Frühstück, abwechslungsreich, warm und kalt, Obst zum Mitnehmen. Kaffe und Tee ganzen Tag kostenfrei.

title: Excellent emplacement
text:
Emplacement nickel 
Petit déjeuner varié et évolutif chaque jour 
Personnel très professionnel 
Chambre confortable et assez silencieuses
Métro au pied de l'hôtel 
Empire state building à une rue, Times Square à 10 minutes à pieds

title: Run down overpriced cesspit
text:
This hotel is not worth the money it’s completely rundown, filthy & breakfast is absolutely sickening. We were told that an extra $50 per night on top of what we already paid would be needed as security, this ate into our spending money which is absolutely disgraceful. 

Very bad hotel, not worth the money

title: Buena opción en Manhattan
text:
Muy buena relación calidad-precio. A 100m entrada de metro con varias lineas y en tambien autobús. 
El desayuno abundante y especialmente bien atendido por Luis. El y sus compañeros siempre estuvieron atentos a las necesidades de las niñas. 
Creps, fruta, tortillas, hamburguesa, salchichas, cafe.... Todo siempre disponible. 
Habitaciones suficiente amplias para Manhattan.
Una agradable opción. Repetiria

title: Excelente relación calidad/precio
text:
Buena ubicación. Justo al lado de una parada de metro y al lado del Empire State Building. 
Habitaciones una era para 2 adultos y 2 niñas y era un poco justa, y la otra para 2 adultos perfecta. En general correctas y muy limpias. 
Desayuno bastante completo. Único problema con los ascensores, que a horas punta, tocaba esperar bastante. 
En general todo bien.

title: Best choice if you want to visit NY
text: I highly recommend this hotel because perfectly situated at midtown NY and the staff always busy to help you. In 5 minutes you could eat and rest at the Bryant Park. Real fun ! The breakfast always different every day and you can have fresh water and coffee all along the day !

title: Excellent hôtel
text:
Excellent hôtel très bien situé.
Petit déjeuner top et bien garni.
Équipe géniale, à l’écoute et disponible.
Boissons chaudes et eau fraîche proposées à volonté toute la journée.
Cookie servis au goûter, topissime.
Restaurants près de l’hôtel.

title: Excellent place to stay!
text:
The location was perfect to visit main points of interest. The staff were very friendly and  helpful. The rooms a good size and clean. Breakfast area was good and available till late to bring snacks and eat after a long day.
Every afternoon there were freshly baked cookies for everyone to help themselves!
Great place to stay, we will definitely come again on our next trip to NYC!

title: Visite New York
text:
Très bon emplacement. Personnel à l’ecoute
Point négatif le bruit de la Climatisation intérieure et extérieure 
Horaire de petit déjeuner correct. Petit déjeuner peu varié mais suffisant. Beaucoup de monde à certaines heurs

title: Buona posizione, aspetti migliorabili
text: Breve soggiorno durante un viaggio itinerante negli Usa. Camera pulita e confortevole. Buona colazione Usa style. Posizionata a due passi dalla stazione 34st/Herald square con vista sull'Empire State Building. Personale super efficiente e gentile. Da migliorare: poco spazio per la colazione in relazione al numero delle camere e ascensori a volte bloccati al piano. Nel complesso esperienza molto positiva. In zona diversi cocktail bar che meritano!!

title: Great experience with this hotel
text: Staff was very attentive. Hotel was very clean. No carpet in any room!  I like duvets that are covered. Room was a basic size. We had a king sized bed.  Certainly room to walk around and have suitcases. Perfect location. Easy to catch a cab and easy to use the subway from here. Also walking distance to many things. Good breakfast. Typical of Hampton inn breakfast   The only down size to this hotel is the slow elevator. But that was really just from 8-10 when guest coming down for breakfast. We had a handicap room with a roll in shower. Very fast hot water and great water pressure. I would highly recommend this hotel and will definitely stay there again. Julie I

title: Great location and good value
text: Spacious room by NYC standards.  Great staff, clean room, great amenities, great location, good breakfast, nice outdoor space.  Common spaces need a little maintenance, and no ice machine on our floor.  Good value, would definitely stay again.

title: Muy bueno!
text: Fuimos de vacaciones y nos gustó mucho el hotel y la atención de todo el personal. La ubicación es muy buena, cerca de los principales puntos turísticos, al resto se puede llegar caminando perfectamente.

title: Günstig, zentral und sehr gut
text:
Das Hotel liegt nur 5 Minuten vom Empire State Building entfernt, sehr zentral.
Die Zimmer sind klein, aber sehr sauber. Das Frühstück ist inklusiv und für New Yorker Verhältnisse sehr gut. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich.

title: Decent enough hotel, great location
text:
The location of this hotel is brilliant, the staff are excellent. However the hotel itself is getting pretty run down for a Hilton. It’s obvious it needs a refurb.

The lifts are so slow, and frequently we had to wait as they were full or just so slow to reach our high floor (17th floor) 

Breakfast was pretty poor, the options were okay but there wasn’t enough seating or much variety. 

The towels were tiny! Considering we were visiting America we assumed the towels would be bigger than a child’s size.

Aside from these flaws, I would maybe stay again? Or try next door as it seemed more modern.

title: Excelente
text: Hotel familiar. Muy buena onda de todo el personal especialmente de Luis ortiz que siempre está dispuesto a ayudar es muy atento amable y excelente anfitrión.  Buen desayuno y lindas camas. Volvemos sin dudarlo

title: Great Location - Great Staff
text:
Room was average for New York, but location is just steps away from Herald Square and all the subway lines there. It was VERY quiet in our room, which is a major plus for me! Staff is very nice and helpful (shout out to Felix!). 
Breakfast had many hot and cold options and the breakfast room was nice too.

title: PERFECT LOCATION
text:
We enjoyed our stay at Hampton. This Hotel is close to Time Square and all the attractions can be reached using the metros. The breakfast was basic but enough choices to fill you up for a long time
i would definitely recommend this hotel .The room was small but clean, Staff friendly and helpful

title: Well located but tired
text: Rented 3 rooms for my family for 4 nights to experience NYC for the first time.  The hotel is well located mid town however it is well overdue for renovation.  I am a Hilton Gold member and have a reasonable sense of Hilton property standards.  This one fails in my opinion.  Issues included, broken or very slow elevators requiring guests to use stairs, small breakfast dining area requiring waits to get a table, noisy AC, noisy door closers from adjacent rooms interrupting sleep.  Overall price vs value was not there in my opinion.

title: Great location
text: I just returned from a three day stay. I stayed in a king room on the 4th floor facing 35th. I recommend a lower floor so you can avoid the slow elevators. Friendly reception desk. Nice free breakfast. Room was clean and modern although a little small but that was ok. Nice counter space in bathroom. Mini fridge. Hotel is less than 100 steps to the subway entrance. I walked all over.  Also free cookies in the afternoon. I would stay here again. It’s right next door to a Hilton Garden Inn.

title: Für 1 städte reise ok.zimmer sauber.Betten sehr bequem.
text: Sehr zentral.Betten sind sehr bequem.Trotz die läge ist leise kann man gut schlafen.Zimmer ein wenig abgekommen aber betten sind neu.NYC city ist hält teuerer als andere städte.Im hotel verbringt man wenig zeit also für das sehr ok ist.

title: Well located
text: I am still at this hotel and very satisfied This hotel is well located. Breakfast is served and quite good actually buffet style with omelet, toast, cereals…enough to please most customers. Staff is friendly and helpful. We took a king size bed on 35th street which like any street in NY is busy.

title: Quasi perfetto
text: Lo Staff è cordiale ed efficiente, la location è ottima, stanze pulite e il service room perfetto. La colazione buona e sufficientemente varia. La pulizia delle stanze e la sicurezza anti Covid è buona!

title: Highly recommend
text: We arrived early. They kept our bags so we could visit the city.  They were very kind and professional. The room was very clean.  The location is pretty good. I would definitely stay here again. Felix took very good care if us.

title: Un excellent rapport qualité /prix et une localisation exceptionnelle
text: Localisation exceptionnelle ! Chambre très confortable. Petits-déjeuners fantastiques. Accueil très agréable et dévoué. Et surtout un excellent rapport qualité /prix ! Les chambres avec vue sont fantastiques avec une vue magnifique sur l’Empire State Building qui est juste au dessus de l’hôtel !

title: Desastroso
text: Lo único bueno es el personal que se esmera, pero la calidad del hotel es pésima cuando de los Hilton se trata! Tan buenos empleados y no los valoran!! No vuelvo, le recomiendo a los empleados q busquen un Hotel q les de valor

title: Peut mieux faire pour une chambre à quasiment 200 dollars la nuit
text:
Hotel idéalement placé à portée de pied de beaucoup de sites, métro et bus.
J'ai du mal a croire qu'il a été récemment rénové comme dit une famille dans les avis précédents.
Les ascenseurs sont vétustes  et très lents. Le sol rapiécé avec du scotch ... 
La salle du petit déjeuner aurait besoin d'un coup de propre sur les tables plus souvent et le réassortiment de toasts, fruits ou jus de fruits plus rapide. Pour un petit déjeuner succinct, ça passe.
Notre chambre à deux lits était spacieuse mais avec très peu de rangements et surtout très bruyante car donnant à l'arrière sur cour : les turbines de ventilation des autres immeubles activées 24/24h font un bruit énorme malgré les fenêtres fermées et notre propre clim mise en route.
La salle de bains mériterait un coup de jeune (papier peint décollé et douche decellée) et surtout un meilleur entretien quotidien du sol. il nous est arrivé à plusieurs reprise de ne pas avoir de l'eau froide pour tempérer l'eau chaude de la douche ou du lavabo. le "ménage" de la chambre n'a jamais était fait avant 17h durant la semaine de notre séjour.
Pas de room service délégué à l'extérieur mais jamais livré malgré un paiement en ligne ...

title: Cómodo
text: Me gustó el hotel. Fue el que mejor precio/calidad encontré que fuera céntrico y cerca de una estación de metro. Ha resultado ser muy cómodo y con personal muy amable. Habitación y baño amplios. Se notaba que había sido renovado hacía poco pero mal hecho. Por el precio no podemos ser muy quisquillosos. Solo dos ascensores y muy lentos. Zona para desayunar bonita pero pequeña. Desayuno simple que se hace monótono al pasar los días. Solo una tostadora y una máquina de hacer gofres para la cantidad de gente que desayuna en el hotel. Las máquinas de zumos, chocolate caliente y café estaban disponibles las 24h.

title: El Placer de Conocerlos
text:
Ubicación perfecta, limpieza perfecta, desayuno completo y comida diferente todos los días y elaboración propia  de excelente calidad.
muy buena atención en recepción Felix  y Jose, dan respuesta a cualquier inquietud o necesidad.
Luis encargado de la cocina, deja ver la im,agen de limpieza pulcritud, y un servicio excelentelimpieza

title: Hotel bien ubicado
text:
El hotel cuenta con una ubicación estratégica en el centro de la ciudad. Se encuentra en diagonal a Macys y a pasos del Empire State Building.
Tuvimos inconvenientes con el check in además de un caño roto general que hizo que por dos días funcionara un solo ascensor complicando el acceso a nuestra habitación en el piso 19.
Al final de la estadía nos reintegraron una noche por los inconvenientes.
En cuanto a la habitación era pequeña pero perfecta para dos, cama king, super cómoda, mini heladera, escritorio, cómoda y placard.
El hotel cuenta con desayuno no es muy variado pero sirve para ahorrar.

title: Agréable séjour en famille
text: Hotel rénové, idéalement situé à une minute du métro et de Macy's, 10 minutes à pieds de Times Square. Les réceptionnistes étaient avenants. La chambre était de bonne dimension (pour New-York...) et récemment rénovée. L'hôtel n'est pas trop grand : 20 étages et 7/8 chambres par étage, donc calme car peu de passage dans le couloir.
