Nous avions une chambre au second étage, c'était idéal pour descendre par les escaliers et éviter l'attente des 2 ascenseurs. La salle du petit-déjeuner est agréable, mais un peu trop petite et il faut attendre pour une table de libre, il y a également une petite terrasse. Le petit déjeuner inclus est simple mais suffisant (yaourt, bagel, muffin, gaufres, œuf, bacon, fruits, céréales, café, thé et chocolat chaud). Une bonne adresse à un prix raisonnable.

title: Bene, ma non benissimo!
text:
Posizione ottima a una street dall’empire.
Letto big size comodissimo.
Bagno nella media e accettabile per essere negli USA.
Colazione troppo affollata a qualsiasi orario e con poca scelta.
Da rivedere il numero di ascensori rispetto a numero di piani/camere, ci vuole troppo tempo per trovare un ascensore libero!
Pulizia della camera solo su richiesta e con un extra!

title: Welcome with a smile.
text: The staff member Jose was friendly with a smile.  I requested a room with a view and I received it.  The hotel room and the bathroom was clean.  I also noticed the staff member’s  was always cleaning the dining area.  It’s located across the street from Macy’s

title: A Few Tips About this Hampton Inn
text:
This Hampton Inn is located close to Penn Station, Macy’s and various subway entrances.  We used the LIRR from JFK via Jamaica Station to Penn Station to walk the two blocks to this hotel. It does save about $50 dollars one way.  

The breakfasts at this Hampton Inn were our highlight.  There is a dedicated staff that puts everything together before 6:00AM.  Kudos to these fine workers.  We enjoyed going down to breakfast for our 3-night stay. 

There were different breakfast selections for each day.  One day it was scrambled eggs; another day cheese omelets.  The turkey sausages changed too.  I liked the ones that looked like Polish Kielbasa’s.  My wife did not like the coffee.  I found it most tolerable with the Hazelnut flavoring. 

With that said, we did find this Hampton to be looking its age.  The elevators are atrocious.  There are only 2 elevators for 20 floors and they took so long to get anywhere.  If that could be fixed, I would rate this hotel higher.  A number of times we just walked down our 10 flights of stairs just to get out.  

I would ask to get a “lower-floor” if you are not paying for an Empire State building view.  

Rooms are indeed small.  We had just traveled from Portugal and found our European rooms much larger.  Everything is tight, even the bathroom.  

Our sleep was good, though, as the beds are comfortable.  Our backs did not ache. And the room was clean. 

Ice was just on certain floors.  You may want to inquire which floors have ice.  Luckily, we just had to use the stair-case to go down one level to get our ice.

If you can get this hotel at a good rate, you may have found a winner, even with the flaws. If you found this review to be “helpful” in any way, please give me a “helpful-check” to let me know.

title: Great location
text: We stay here whenever we come to New York. It is less than a 10 minute walk from the Amtrak station and right outside is the Herald Square subway stop with 6 lines stopping there. The lobby just hit completely redone and the breakfast area also got a facelift. Rooms were clean on arrival and I was fine they didn’t clean while we were there. The staff is friendly, there are plenty of breakfast options and we can leave our bags there on our last day after we check out until we are ready to head home. Thanks for another great stay!

title: No cleaning service. Disgusting.
text: They don't clean the rooms for days. You ask for it and they don't even take out the trash. I guess for some extra fee you can rent a mop and clean your room yourself. Disgusting. Very disappointed. Choose another place for stay where clean rooms is not considered something special.

title: LA MEJOR OPCION
text: Inmejorable ubicación y magnífico trato en recepción. Habitación acogedora y muy limpia. Completo el requerimiento de los 200 caracteres mínimos aunque en esencia todo está contenido en las sencillas frases.

title: Excelente localização
text: Ótima localização, café da manhã excelente, quartos confortáveis, equipe atenciosa, estivemos neste hotel em fevereiro de 2020, março de  2022 e com certeza será minha escolha nas próximas idas a New York.

title: Hotel da rede Hilton
text: Este hotel superou as minhas expectativas. Desde o atendimento da recepção e o pessoal do café da manhã todos muito solícitos em ajudar até mesmo os da copa durante o dia todo. Quarto confortável e o banheiro também. Café da manhã com um delicioso waflle, perto do metrô. Tem café e chá disponível o dia todo, que foi ótimo porque estava muito frio. E também a tarde servem um delicioso cookies grátis. Este hotel te convida a voltar nele.

title: Excelente opción precio - calidad
text:
Ubicación muy buena, en la esquina hay una entrada al subway con bastante líneas, caminando unas cuadras se llega a varios puntos importantes.
Desayuno normal, van variando cada tantos días. Lo mejor es tener café y chocolate calientes las 24 hs gratis.
Cuentan con varias personas que hablan español, la mayoría son todos muy amables y dispuestos a ayudarte. En especial Luis, Jose y Felix
Wifi bueno en todo el hotel.
Lo malo: Habitación normal tirando a pequeña, sin lugar prácticamente para guardar ropa.
La calefacción por lo menos en nuestra habitación era demasiada ruidosa, muchas veces nos despertaba el ruido por las noches.
No me gustó que nos apuraran para realizar el check out, era a las 11am y desde 9:30am ya nos querían hacer dejar la habitación cosa que no hicimos hasta que se cumpla el horario.
Cuenta con 2 ascensores y en ciertos horarios se colapsaba mucho, pero en líneas generales estaban bien.
Pagamos un extra para tener vista del Empire state, la vista era buena pero los vidrios estaban demasiados sucios, no se justifica el pago extra.

title: טיול משפחתי
text:
מיקום מעולה.
מרחק הליכה ממקומות רבים : אמפייר סטייט בילדינג, טיימס סקוור וכו.
ארוחת בוקר סבירה: מכשיר להכנת וופל בלגי, מיץ תפוזים  בייגלס, גבינת פילדפיה, ריבות, לעיתים מקושקשת וכו.
מנהל אחזקה של מתחם האוכל - לואיז  אדןץם נחמד, אדיב הביא לילדים הפתעה בארוחת הבוקר .
הצוות אדיב.
מעליות איטיות לעיתים  המתנה ארוכה עד הגעת המעלית.
סהכ אחלה מלון

title: Good location, rooms not cleaned
text:
We stayed here for my Daughters 18th birthday. upon arrival the hotel had no details of our booking, however they did let us have a room if we paid $650 down payment, until our travel agent sorted it out, which to be fair they did  and the hotel not having our booking turned out nit to be a fault of thr hotels.

Breakfast was bagels, toast, all the normal stuff with either a sausage or bacon and egg each morning, but paper plastes ad single use plastic cutlery.

Our room ws on the top floor, with a gret view of the ESB, the rooms re pretty small, with very little storge or hanging space, we mainly lived out of thr suitcase for the week.

However our biggest problem was cleaning, we asked for our room to be clead daily however it was not clened once, the blanket excuse of Covid was given. All big companies need to stop hiding behind covid as an excuse to save money, and actually offer service, which in this case means cleaning  the rooms. Even when we asked for clean towels they didnt take the old olds away so by the end if the week out bathroom was full of old damp towels. 

On a plus  note, reception staff very friendly, and another big plis is the location which for us was fantastic.

Would i stay here again? Maybe but they need to sort the cleaning situation out.

title: Hotel despretensioso, porém superou expectativas!!
text:
Mesmo sendo de uma linha mais econômica, superou minhas expectativas. Tudo organizado, quarto, banheiro, café da manhã completo p NYC.
O pessoal da recepção comandados pela Sandra fazem nossa estadia bem melhor! Pessoal do café da manhã também são bem atenciosos, em especial Luis.

title: La gente hace la diferencia
text: Los empleados hacen la diferencia!!! Es un hotel correcto de acuerdo al precio, pero los trabajadores le ponen la buena onda para que uno se sienta como en casa, 11 puntos para Luis, un genio!!! José de recepción, las chicas de limpieza, etc.

title: Excelente atención!
text: Este hotel tiene muy buena ubicación, personal muy profesional y amables. Camadas y almohadas muy cómodas, buen servicio de limpieza, buen desayuno, servicio de café, te, chocolate caliente a disposición de los huéspedes gratuitamente.

title: Excelente localização e serviços
text: O hotel está muito bem localizado,  perto de tudo. Os funcionários são muiiiito delicados e atenciosos.  Café da manhã excelente. Para não perturbar o descanso dos hóspedes, a limpeza do quarto é feita quando solicitada, e muito caprichada, tem Wi-Fi em todas as áreas, a cama é muito maravilhosa, chuveiro excelente, amenites no quarto da Neutrogena, a tarde servem chocolate quente e cookies deliciosos.  E apesar disso tudo, não cobram resort fee. Super recomendo.

title: Muy correcto calidad/precio, fantastica ubicación!
text: Todo ha sido muy correcto, el personal muy amable y dispuesto. El desayuno bastante correcto, cosa a tener en cuenta en NYC , ya que en muchos sitios pone desayuno incluido y es un buffet pero solamente de bollería, y éste no es el caso. Faltaría algo de renovación pero calidad precio es correcto. La ubicación perfecta!

title: Calidad del servicio
text: Las habitaciones cómodas y limpias, desayuno buffet de calidad, la atención del personal y la perfecta ubicación del hotel. Personal preocupado de atender las necesidades de los huéspedes. Desayuno variado y abundante.

title: Rocky start but ended up being a good stay
text:
After getting off to a rocky start I must say this hotel met ALL of our needs perfectly. 

When we checked in they initially didn’t have our reservation which is harrowing after you’ve traveled from out of town. Further there were some reviews that the hotel had canceled their reservation due to being overbooked right before check in but we never received anything to that effect from Expedia or the hotel. After about an hour of waiting they were able to find our reservation and get us checked in. 

The elevator and hallways are beginning to show their wear a bit but overall was well maintained. The room itself was fine and what we asked for two queen beds. Clean, spacious enough (by NYC standards), had a fridge and coffeemaker in it, was walking distance to Penn Station, and less than a block from the subway. We had a view of the Empire State Building even though we were on a lower floor (11th). Icing on the cake for free breakfast until 11am, free coffee and water in the lobby 24/7 etc. Nooooo one comes to NYC to sit in their hotel rooms and this was far from the smallest room I’ve ever had in the city though that’s not to say it was large. They gave us plenty of linens for the bathroom etc. No issues with the free wifi. 

This hotel represented an exceptional value price and location wise and I would definitely return here if in need of that in the future.

title: Excellent location
text: We traveled for leisure. A couple and 2 children, 16 and 10yo. The room is small but good enough for us. The breakfast is basically American style and is a good plus. They required proof of vaccination and masks.

title: They let their guests lay in other peoples crumbs!
text: Never again will I stay at this hotel I would not mind paying a few bucks more at a better establishment. Good luck on catching the elevator, their isn’t a microwave in the rooms or dining area so good luck eating cold leftovers. The workers try their best but you can tell the management is lacking in work ethics and sanitation. I literally laid in a bed with old sheets that had the previous guests crumbs still on them and was not offered a refund or free night?!!! Ridiculous.

title: Good location but needs updating
text: Visited in December pre Christmas so the prices were slightly hiked but a nice hotel with a great location in the heart of midtown. Staff were helpful and friendly but the building is tired, old and in need of a renovation. Room was OK, but again decor is dated and this place could do with some investment to match the great location.

title: Excelente servicio
text: Excelente servicio no tuve ninguna queja durante mi estadía (de un fin de semana). El desayuno excelente, la opción de botellas de agua incluida y chocolate caliente me encanto. La ubicación es muy buena

title: The best location
text:
The best location, had Empire State Building 1 block away, time square 10 min walking and all subway stations close by, Broadway walking distance. The hotel is a little old but the rooms are ok.
The only bad thing was the elevator but the location pays off

title: Parfait
text:
Très propre très confort. Parfaitement situé avec vue sur l’empire! 
Personnel super sympa 

- :
Petit déjeuner pas ouf mais dépanne bien. 

Nous reviendrons dans cet établissement ! Vraiment bien et chambres assez grandes

title: Buena estadía
text: Muy buen sitio limpio buen desayuno todo cerca el subway a menos de 100 metros buena atención hablan español café todo el tiempo muchos canales de televisión aunque los cuartos son pequeños apenas para  lo que se necesita

title: Passez votre chemin
text:
Cet hôtel n’est clairement pas a la hauteur des bonne notes qui reçoit. Nous n’avons pas apprécié notre séjour bien que l hôtel soit idéalement placé. A notre arrivé la chambre était sale et aucun ménage n’a été fait durant les 4jours où nous y avons séjourné alors que nous étions priés de manger dans nos chambres. Les poubelles se sont accumulées ! 
La douche coulait mal et le chauffage faisait un bruit abrutissant.. mélange de soufflerie et de sifflement, on a déjà vu plus agréable ! 
Enfin les ascenseurs étaient d’une telle lenteur que l’on favorisait des escaliers…

title: Convenient.
text: This Hampton Inn is exactly as it’s described. It’s clean and functional. There’s no Manhattan glitz but you’re not booking here for that. The primary to stay here is for it’s convenient location. Times Square, The Edge, MSG are all within walking distance.

title: Zentral gelegen
text:
Das Hotel ist ein bisschen in die Jahre gekommen. ( zugige Fenster bzw. Am Fenster ist es so kalt, kann als Kühlschrank dienen.)
Heizung funktionierte zum Glück. 
Leider war ein ganzes Haarbüschel in der Badewanne. 
Reinigung erfolgt nur, wenn man das an der Rezeption anmeldet. 
Frühstück ausreichend und lecker, es gibt auch Obst. 
Nutella, Käse und Wurst fehlen, das finde ich sehr schade. 
Sehr zentral gelegen. Sehenswürdigkeiten gut und schnell erreichbar. Subway Station direkt am Hotel.
Die Sicht auf das Empire State Building ist super. 
Die Angestellten sehr freundlich. 

Insgesamt war es ein toller Aufenthalt.

title: Todo fue Perfecto.
text: Elegí este hotel por los Review de otros clientes y no me equivoqué. Todo estuvo perfecto. La atención del personal es increíble, los desayunos exquisitos y variados y la ubicación es perfecta. Volveré de nuevo.

title: Holiday
text:
We really enjoyed our stay in NY, the hotel has a very good location to everything. 50 meters away there is a Macy’s
The room was a little small but everything else was excellent. The breakfast was typically American.

title: Volvería!
text: Muy satisfecha! Habitaciones muy correctas, aunque el desayuno siempre era el mismo exceptuando algún plato caliente que variaba a diario, estuvo todo muy bueno. el personal muy amable en todo momento y siempre dispuesto ha intentar ayudarte en cualquier duda.

title: Horrible
text:
Hôtel très très médiocre! 
Déjà pour commencer, on arrive à l’hôtel aucune réservation de faites à nos noms! Donc nous avons dû payer 1750$ sur place sinon nous étions expulsé de cet hôtel! 

Chambre très vieille, finition à revoir, douche qui ne s’écoule pas, couloir extrêmement brouillant, et surtout pas de femme de ménage il faut réserver à l’accueil pour que le ménage soit fait (génial) 
Alors le petit dej n’en parlons pas vraiment pas digne d’un breakfast américain! 

Enfin si vous voulez profiter d’un bel hôtel n’allez pas à celui ci! 
Le seul point positif, à côté de Times square et en face du empire state building

title: Bien placé, bon rapport qualité prix et literie de qualité
text:
Hôtel bien placé pour visiter la ville. Beaucoup de points touristiques et boutiques shopping à proximité à pied. Ainsi que le métro à 2 pas de l’hôtel.
Chambres familiales spacieuses. 
Il faut penser à demander le service de chambre, c’est précisé il me semble sur le site.

title: Muststaynyc
text: We stay here every time we travel to nyc.  Great location, Friendly staff, and excellent price!  They also have a wonderful free breakfast. I get up early even on vacation.  They always have coffee ready in the mornings.

title: Bon séjour à New-York mais...
text: Bon hôtel bien placé au coeur de Manhattan avec station de métro à proximité (50 mètres). Petit déjeuner excellent. Ménage approximatif (en plus il faut le demander). La clim fait un bruit d'enfer lorsqu'elle fonctionne (en hiver également pour maintenir la température). Le personnel est super agréable et disponible.

title: great location
text:
travel with kids was easy because this hotel provide breakfast, they provide 24h coffee service, and the location was great. 
However the wall is very thin so make sure your kids does not make a lot of noise in the night time cause it probably will disturb others.

title: One week in NYC
text:
Hotel in ottima posizione.
Pulizia ok e dimensioni della stanza decisamente superiori rispetto alla medi di New York.
Ascensori un po’ lenti, colazione abbastanza ricca.
Personale gentile e disponibile.

title: Cumplió con todo
text:
Buena ubicación, mucha vida alrededor del hotel , lugar perfecto para después de un día largo de visitar la ciudad.
Boca de metro en la puerta del hotel (casi) y Bryant park muy cerca. Limpieza y un desayuno con los básicos para empezar un día con fuerza, muy bien.

title: Relación calidad precio muy bueno.
text:
El hotel nos costó 940€/6 noches. La habitación grande y con vistas al Empire. La cama era enorme y muy cómoda. La limpieza si dices que quieres que vayan todos los días, lo hacen y muy bien. El desayuno tiene un poco de todo y rico así que genial. Tienes café té y chocolate las 24h sin coste. 
Las cortinas de la habitación muy juntitas así que entra algo de luz. Las ventanas malísimas así que entra frío y mucho ruido (aun que por la noche no hay mucho jaleo en la calle y se duerme bien).  Solo hay dos ascensores y uno a veces no funciona así que hay que esperar bastante (pero nosotros en la 4a planta usábamos las escaleras si tardaba)
En general muy bien para los precios y condiciones que hay un nueva york.

title: Ubicación
text: Perfecto ,pequeña habitación,pero cómoda ,lo mejor el café,chocolate y agua que está disponible a cualquier hora  la ubicación nos pareció muy buena ,en la misma esquina estaba una parada del metro y Mancy’s

title: Décevant globalement
text:
Bon lit, bon emplacement de l’hôtel.hall non fonctionnel 
Parties communes, sol ascenseur très dégradés, couloir d’étages sales jamais nettoyés et toujours occupés par les chariots de ménage…
Mériterait une rénovation des parties communes. Hall peu chaleureux 
Attente ascenseur interminable souvent sur utilisé par le personnel au détriment de la clientèle 
Pas de place au petit déjeuner…
Fonctionnel mais peu plaisant surtout en comparaison avec plusieurs hôtels du quartier dans lesquels je séjourne régulièrement. 
Ménage non fait par défaut de demande ( et oui le Covid a bon dos!)

title: Er du et par eller familie, skal du vælge et andet hotel
text:
Der var for meget støj om natten. Vi boede på samme etage som en flok unge mennesker, der råbte, smækkede med dørene og løb på gangene midt om natten. Det lykkedes desværre ikke for hotelpersonalet at få det stoppet trods flere henvendelser. 
Morgenmaden var ensformig og vaffelmaskinerne virkede ikke 5 ud af 6 dage. Det var plasticbestik og plastickrus til morgenmaden - det er ikke særlig miljøvenligt. Den ene dag var der ikke knive. Det er svært at smøre sit brød med en ske.

title: Spoiled by overbooking
text: We had booked a 6 night stay seven weeks before but the hotel was overbooked on arrival and we had to go to a hotel 20 minutes walk away which only had single rooms! Terrible start to our 5 day stay. We had to go back early the next day to ensure we were booked in for the rest of our stay. We have received no compensation.

title: Great location for a very reasonable price!
text: This hotel is a block from the Empire State Building and just a few blocks from Times Square, the theater district, Bryant Park, New York Public Library and so much more. Very safe. Extremely clean. Friendly staff. Compact rooms and bathrooms but still everything you need. Comfortable beds. Lots of charging options for electronics. Free breakfast. And very reasonably priced.

title: Super rapport qualité/prix
text: L'hôtel est très bien situé, le personnel est accueillant et professionnel. Buffet petit déjeuner inclus dans le prix! Possibilité de déposer les valises jusqu'à l'heure du départ. Service de nettoyage sur demande.

title: Súper bien ubicado
text: El hotel está demasiado bien ubicado con el metro literalmente a pocos pasos, restaurantes con salir del hotel, en general el hotel está limpio, mis almohadas tenían un olor extraño aunque todo se veía limpio.

title: Beware! Overbooked hotel cancelled our reservation leaving us stranded and without any options!
text: The Hampton Inn Empire State cancelled our reservation without any notice even though we had paid in full for two nights through AAA. They left us without a hotel on a weekend when most hotels are sold out or extremely expensive. Horrendous experience-be warned! No excuse, just blaming the “vendors”. What vendors? We booked and paid for that hotel 3weeks prior on the AAA website. Nightmare!

title: Super
text:
Everything was just perfect, very nice breakfast. the staff was so kind and so professional.the hotel was so clean.
Nice place and good service. I will stay there again for sure. I like it. My best regards.

title: Buen servicio no limpieza en la habitación
text:
La ubicación es PERFECTA 
El personal muy agradable sin embargo la habitación no la limpian si este servicio no se solicita 24hrs antes lo cual me parece ilógico en un hotel y durante COVID, podrían notificar al huésped de esto

Mucho ruido de la calle, costo dormir

title: Empire State View
text: The room we were assigned was on the Empire State Building side. The view was fun especially at night. The building seemed overall close to many different attractions in NYC whether it was walking distance or by car.

title: Excelente ubicación y servicio.
text: Muy buena relación precio-calidad. Excelente ubicación, céntrica con estación de metro en la esquina. Impecable limpieza, muy buen desayuno, comodidad y excelente atención. Poseen personal que habla español y todos son súper amables. Reciben paquetes de correo.

title: Perfect for value and convenience
text: This hotel is in a perfect location with easy access to the subway, which is a huge plus for us. It’s adjacent to Herald Square and lots of shops. We stay here almost every trip to NYC. They have a decent breakfast, good coffee and it’s not super noisy at night. Highly recommend. Rooms are small but typical of NYC.

title: Excelente hotel y servicio
text: Muy buena atención, limpieza y servicio.   Excelente ubicación, accesible a subway y a  comercios.  Muy cómodo tener el desayuno incluido, además buena calidad de comida.    Mi familia se sintió muy cómoda con la atencion del personal.

title: Never had this happen at a hotel...
text:
First thing I'll say is I'm a Hilton Diamond member, so I always try to stay at Hilton hotels when traveling. While on business, I like staying at Hampton Inns.  This one was in a convenient location for where I was working and it was an overall good stay.  Staff was very nice and accommodating, room and public areas were clean, and I slept well.
The only odd thing... The TV.
While I don't watch a lot of TV, when I'm back in my room after a long day of meetings, I like to be able to sit down and watch TV or have it on while I'm catching up on emails and other tasks.  However, there was no channel guide! Not an electronic one on the TV or a printed one in the room. There were certain channels I could tune to that showed me what was on TV (but didn't even show all the available channels), but the channel numbers were incorrect. No "guide" button on my TV remote either.
I thought this was odd and must have been an oversight, so the next morning after my first night, I stopped by the front desk and inquired about this. The lady was very nice but said they didn't have a channel guide, but I was welcome to call down to the front desk if I was looking for a certain channel.
Most hotels I stay at have an on-screen channel guide or a little card in the room (which I understand with covid restrictions may not be feasible).
Just seemed odd to me.  Fortunately I found the 1 channel I wanted to watch and was good for my stay.
Would I stay here again? Probably, if I needed to be in that vicinity of the city. However, if you're traveling with kids who like to get on the TV, you might want to inquire about their channel issues.

title: Buena opción para presupuesto ajustado
text: Buena ubicación, cercano al metro, tiendas y atracciones; nada de lujos, desayuno aceptable con buenos productos pero poca variedad. Cuartos pequeños, les falta luz y espacio para guardado de ropa. Lobby a mejorar.

title: Good location, clean and comfortable
text: Good location near a lot. The subway lines (the station is about 200 feet from the front door) make it even more accessible to the city and buroughs. Room was clean. Staff was courteous and professional. Breakfast was good. Price was reasonable. Would definitely stay here again.

title: EXCELENTE ESTADÍA !!!!VOLVERIA MIL VECES
text:
Muy lindo hotel en relación a la tarifa que abonas, he estado varias veces en New York y este es un hotel sencillo pero te sientes muy a gusto con la familia.
Ducha excelente, refrigerador, maquinas de hielo, buenas camas, limpio, caja fuerte, gimnasio, personal muy amable.
Luis en la parte de cafetería, excepcional amable y siempre dispuesto para ayudar
Jose en el ingreso también amable.
Si bien la zona de desayuno es chica en nuestro viaje de septiembre siempre encontramos lugar y siempre reponían lo que faltaba.
Hotel chico, si grandes ruidos salvo los pisos bajos frente a la calle, dos ascensores que por ahi hay que tener un   poco de paciencia, y recomendatoria que el aire acondicionado posea regulación para la temperatura.
Resumen , buen hotel sencillo, pero muy linpio , como, buen desayuno , buena relacion precio calidad, muy bien ubicado y personal excelente.
Si buscar algo de lujo , tenes que pagarlo.

title: Muy buen hotel, excelente ubicación y desayuno
text: La relación precio prestación es muy buena. La habitaciónes están re bien . Camas cómodas y servicio excelente . Estuvimos 4 noches . El desayuno es de los mejores que he visto en este tipo de hoteles . Obviamente volveríamos !!!!

title: Excellent location, helpful staff, good king bed, good breakfast
text: Excellent location a block away from the Empire State building, Macy´s, and very close to Times Square and Broadway with very easy access to the subway station. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The room is kind of small but has everything you need and the king bed is good. Breakfast is good. I would return here if I travel again to NYC!!

title: Great for a few days!
text: I love to stay at this hotel! Was my 2nd time! Always heart welcoming. During my stay I’ve enjoyed the breakfast! Perfect location in the city! The rooms are clean and no carpets A plus for people like me with allergies. Easy to arrive if coming from JFK with the metro!

title: Not great
text: Air conditioner smelled like it was on fire. There was no microwave. The sink and toilet water came out brown. Bed was very uncomfortable and had a dip in the middle.we would role into each other while we slept

title: Totalmente satisfecho con Hampton!
text: El hotel está en una gran ubicación, a metros de la 5ta avenida, calle Broadway, Times Square, Empire State. Las habitaciones son muy cómodas y limpias. El desayuno es muy bueno, es muy completo (café, te, chocolate, jugo de naranja, yogurt, tostadas y bagels, cereales, fruta, huevo, avena, waffles) y además van variando todos los días. El personal es amable y muy atento. Sin dudas volvería, cumple con lo necesario para una buena estadía en NYC.

title: Excelente Hotel, cerca a todo
text: El hotel lleno nuestras expectativas, habitación limpia solo se tiene que informar que se desea que se limpie todos los días y así lo hacen, muy buen desayuno, ubicado cerca a todo, personal muy amable.

title: Desastre
text: Sin mantenimiento, sucio, precario para lo que publicitan. Tiene una ubicación perfecta. Pero si les toca una habitación de contrafrente, va a estar complicado dormir por el ruido de motor permanente.

title: Ok.
text: Great location with easy access to subway station. Close walk to many bars and restaurants. Very simple rooms. Hallways feel dark and dingy. Prefer to stay right next door at the Hilton garden. It’s a good value as long as you aren’t planning to spend much time In The room!

title: Nice location, 1 min walk from main subway station, staff is very nice, rooms very small, breakfast not the best.
text:
This is a great location near the Empire State bldg. it’s just a few doors down from a subway station. The staff is very nice. The breakfast included did not unfortunate include any cold drinks like juice etc. fruit options were limited. Beware if you have more then 2 people - it is a very small
Room.

title: L’hôtel était mieux avant .
text:
Problème d’ascenseur .longue attente à l’enregistrement et au Check out :une personne pour tout ce monde et l’autre est tout le temps au téléphone ! Nettoyage de chambre quand c’est fait à 17h00 ou 16h00 c’est à dire à la fin de ta journée de travail ?
Un grand changement dans cet hôtel que j’aimais tant

title: La mejor opción precio/calidad
text: Si bien el hotel lo seleccione por su ubicación, al llegar tomo más valor, ya que nos recibieron increíblemente por la hora en que yo llegaba era mucho antes del check in, pero ellos nos dieron la opción de utilizar la habitación desde nuestra llegada, se nos explicó que por la pandemia el desayuno no estaba funcionando con normalidad, pero que en las mañanas Nos daban un colación, eso a los 2 días cambio y el desayuno se comenzó a servir de manera normal en el comedor del hotel, se podía programar el aseo a la habitación nosotros decidimos día por medio, pero ellos igual fueron todos los días a limpiar la habitación… en fin no hay nada negativo.

title: Excellent stay
text: I spent couple of days in August in this hotel and overall this is one of the best hotels that I’ve stayed in NY. Room was clean, all the stuff members were welcoming and very helpful, although we couldn’t have our breakfast in restaurant in hotel breakfast to go was reallynice and free coffee, tea and hot chocolate was really great. I hope to come again soon 🙂

title: Closed hotel
text: Don’t stay here.  They are closed, but still take reservations.  I reserved about 2 months ago, and checked in online the day before my stay started, but when I got there they sent me somewhere else.  They said they sent me email, but the email came from an unknown person with the subject line “IMPORTANT”, so it looked like spam to me.

title: Beware
text: Hotel is closed and they don’t tell you this until a week before your reservation. Worse, despite many Hilton family hotels nearby, they won’t put you at one of them but one that does not look good and doesn’t have the same cleaning policies. Not a nice way to treat your guests.

title: Closed hotel, but taking reservations
text: Don’t book this hotel.  They are closed.  When I tried to check in today there was one person inside the door who sent me to another hotel several blocks away.  They would not provide transportation and it was hot outside for a long walk with luggage.  I booked online through Hilton and also checked in yesterday through Hilton.  Apparently the hotel has not even notified Hilton that they are closed.  No apology, just “we sent you an email”.  Clearly, if I had received an a mail, I would have not showed up at a closed hotel.

title: Pésimo, no se dejen engañar.
text:
Reserve este hotel hace meses para venir con mi esposa y mi hija. Pagamos un paquete en la pagina de Despegar.com y todo iba bien hasta que llegamos al hotel donde no encontraban mi reserva, tuve que mostrar una impresión que por suerte traía. Resulta que el hotel no está recibiendo a nadie, me mandaron a otro hotel a 4 calles al que tuvimos que caminar con maletas.

Llegamos al Hub hotel y nos dieron una habitación miniatura y sin los desayunos que incluía lo que pagamos.

Este hotel no se hizo responsable de nada y sigue apareciendo en herramientas de búsqueda de hoteles cuando no están recibiendo a nadie.

Pésima experiencia, una pena haber pagado por adelantado.

title: Poor communication and service
text: We booked this hotel several months back and we were changed to a different hotel at a later date, without giving us a clear choice. The reason given was ‘we are still closed’. The communication was not clear and we kept getting messages from expedia about our reservation for Hampton Inn, even on the date of arrival, though it was changed to some other hotel. When we went to this hotel, it was still operational and they told us at the hotel that the reservation was cancelled because there was a ‘government party’ that extended the stay.  The hotel they put us in was from a different chain and in a different area, which we probably could have gotten for much lower price, have we booked it at the same time as the original booking. We decided to stay at a comparable hotel at much higher price, but happy that we could get it at the last minute. The cherry on the top was expedia charging us for cancelling a hotel ‘reservation’, that was actually cancelled by Hilton group. We also spent additional fortune reserving for a comparable hotel at a higher last minute rate.

title: Great stay!
text: My family stayed here for a long weekend. Location is perfect, staff were all extremely friendly and helpful, room was clean and fairly large for NYC standards. Room was really quiet too. An all around great stay!!

title: Séjour agréable dans cet hôtel mais gâché par une facturation abusive
text:
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans cet hôtel idéalement placé. Chambre correcte et confortable avec vue sur l’empire State building. Petit déjeuner bien achalandé. 

Nous sommes en revanche très déçus du service après-vente. En effet, une somme de 430 € a été débitée abusivement par l’hôtel sur notre CB (en supplément de notre facture) et nous n’avons toujours pas été remboursés malgré des multiples relances via le site hébergeur de notre réservation.

title: Perfekt hotell med närhet till det mesta
text: Vi va 3st killar som delade rum här. Hotellet va kalas med närhet till stadspulsen runt hörnet. Jag äter inte frukost men gillade dom smaksatta våfflorna dom ändrade smak på varje dag. Hoppas vi syns snart igen hotellet.

title: Midtown Magic
text: This hotel is a prime location for work and places to enjoy. For where it is it is very quiet almost like a high end Inn. I have stayed there several times and each time they treat you like a old friend

title: Great Value + Would Stay Again
text: The hotel is in an excellent location. I was there originally for work, but got to see a lot more of Manhattan than I expected because of the excellent location. Every staff member I interacted with was excellent -> super friendly. They went above and beyond to make my stay comfortable.

title: Excelente en todos los aspectos
text: Si había un lugar perfecto para quedarse en NY era este!!! El servicio, la comodidad, la limpieza, la amabilidad de la gente que atiende. La verdad un 10 en todo. Volvería mil veces. Te ofrecen te y galletitas caseras todo el tiempo y al viajar en invierno este tip es esencial, ya que nos la pasamos tomando cosas calientes. El desayuno super completo y riquísimo.

title: Super sejour
text:
L emplacement est ideal et l accueil tres agréable
Nous avons aussi apprécié le petit déjeuné buffet copieux et varié
Nous avons put laisser nos bagages en consigne le dernier jour et les récupérer en fin de journée
Nous recommandons cet hotel pour un séjour avec des enfants

title: Hampton in late Feb
text: Clean place with nice staff and nice amenities for a fair price (although, I did stay here in late February, so that may play a role in the price). I would definitely stay here again. Furthermore, it is located in a location that is very accessible to many restaurants and sightseeing spots.

title: Excelente
text:
Para nossa viagem o hotel foi perfeito, café da manhã muito bom para o estilo americano, recepção atenciosa e no final do dia sempre tínhamos chocolate quente e cookies na recepção. Metrô fica na esquina do hotel na qual facilita muito e também muitas lojas ao redor. Além do metrô ser na esquina conseguíamos fazer muitos passeios a pé pelo região e conhecer muitos pontos turísticos da cidade. 
Eles aceitam que deixe a mala guardada no hotel antes e depois da estadia.

title: Excelente ubicación y relación calidad y precio
text: El hotel está muy bien ubicado, tiene servicio de WIFI incluido, el servicio de desayuno es muy bueno y un punto excelente a aprovechar considerando que generalmente los precios por los alimentos en NY son altos.

title: Good place to stay while in NYC
text:
Great location! Nice renovated hotel. Got a nice view at Empire State building from my room at 20th floor.
Only 2 elevators so can be some wait time at peak hours. Breakfast room can get very crowded as well. Staff has difficulties with replenish breakfast items when it gets busy. At other times its ok.
No check in or check out necessary using digital key. I love that feature!
Decent sized room and bathroom. Up to Hampton standards.
Comfy bed.
Hotel to return to!

title: Merveilleux séjour
text: L’emplacement idéal pour découvrir New-York. À 30 m d’une station de métro. À 150 m de Macy’s. À une rue de l’Empire State Building...à ce titre notre chambre au 20ème étage avait vue sur l’Empire ! Magnifique !!! Proche à pied d’autres points touristiques.  La chambre (2 lits en 140) était très bien. La literie est confortable.  Le petit-déjeuner (buffet à volonté) est copieux et varié. L’équipe est au petit soin et notamment Luis est sa délicate attention pour les enfants avec ses paquets de cookies.  Est mis à disposition toute la journée des boissons chaudes.  L’équipe à l’accueil est toujours disponible, à l’écoute et souriante. L’équipe d’entretien est discrète et efficace.  Hôtel à conseiller vivement !

title: Excellent location
text: This hotel stands up to the Hilton standards, in line with my experience with Hampton inns elsewhere. The room wasn't big, but for NYC and price, good value. Place looks recently redone, with Nest thermostats, USB charging ports, no foul odors even in the small yet wide hallways.

title: Friendly Staff & Great Location
text: The room was clean and comfortable.  The customer service was great, especially the super friendly young man that checked us in.  Great location near Penn Station, the Empire State Building and Bryant Park.  Times Square and the theatre district are also within a reasonable walking distance.

title: Great Location Clean Rooms, QUIET!
text: need a place for one night in the city after a KNICKS game! Location was great just a few blocks away. The cost was amazing for a Friday night in NYC. the place was clean the staff was friendly! It was perfect for an over night stay. Oh and you couldn't hear the noise of NYC!

title: Excelente
text: É o quarto ano consecutivo que ficamos no Hampton Inn Empire States, principalmente pelo atendimento de excelência, em especial do funcionário Luis. Localização muito boa, ao lado da estação de metrô, próximo da Macys, TARGET, Empire State e dá para ir andando para B H e Time Square. Café da manhã com variedades de pães, iogurte, babana, maçã, salada de frutas, omeletes, calabresa, bacon, ovos cozidos e mexidos, etc. Quartos com acomodações confortáveis e banheiro limpo.

title: Very nice surprise in NYC!
text: We were in town to see Josh Groban at the Radio City Music Hall and looked for hotels near Penn Station and Radio City Music Hall. We were impressed with the reviews. Even though it is a small hotel, it was well equipped and pleasant.

title: Clean. Courteous. Centralized Location.
text:
Pros:

Attentive Staff

Great maintenance

Freshly renovated rooms 

No carpets

2 complimentary water bottles for 
Hilton Honors members.

In-room DVR

Quiet

Clean, well-lit stairwells that lead directly to front of building or lobby instead of some place creepy.

Hot, fresh breakfast served by professional staff in a clean area.

Cons:

Outside draft underneath heater.

Auto heating system is not in sync with room temperature and takes an hour to turn back on in between.

No on-site washer/dryer, which would be an added bonus.

title: Excellent location!!!
text:
The location of this hotel is perfect, just a few steps from de subway entrance and a lot to do nearby. All the staff very kind, always smiling and always ready to help.
Thumbs up for Khadesha, Sandra, Luis and Rosibel

title: Ótima opção de hospedagem em NYC
text: O hotel fica bem perto de duas estações do metrô. Check-in fácil. Oferecem a opção de chave digital (você abre a porta pelo seu celular). Bom atendimento no front desk. O que poderia ser melhor é o espaço do café-da-manhã, que às vezes fica cheio. No mais, vale o custo-benefício.

title: Asombro y felicidad!
text:
He ido a varios hoteles en Manhattan y éste me ha asombrado por la relación precio-calidad. Excelente atención del personal, casi todos hablan español, reciben tus paquetes de Amazon, habitación limpia y súper espaciosa (la cama un capítulo aparte: te absorbe!!! Es lo más!) y algo que suma mucho es el variado desayuno buffet (cada día hay distintas opciones) y el servicio de café todo el día mas chocolate y cookies a la tarde (que con el frío viene muy bien!). Especial agradecimiento a Luis, quien siempre está atento y dispuesto para ayudarte en lo que necesites (del 1 al 10: 11 puntos!).
Ubicación estratégica, en la esquina subte 34 Station con combinación a donde quieras! 
Definitivamente elegiré este hotel nuevamente en mi próxima visita a NY ya que todos los aspectos son positivos!

title: Bday trip for my ten year old
text: The staff at the desk are wonderful and same at the breakfast. An older gentleman hands out cookies to all the kids every morning and it makes all of them so happy. I don’t like elevators so I asked for a low level room and they found me a room on the second floor so I can take the stairs. Room was very clean and is very comfortable. Location is amazing and the price with breakfast is fabulous. The breakfast is also pretty good with choices of fresh juices smoothies oatmeal waffles eggs yogurts bread pastries etc. I was impressed.

title: The best!
text: We were always greeted by friendly people. The breakfast was fantastic with a great variety. There were many little extras like hot chocolate and cookies in the afternoon. They accommodated our every request. Our room was was very clean and made up that way every day.  This hotel would be wonderful at any price. Kudos to the great staff. Quiet also.

title: Gut mit einigen Abstrichen
text:
Die neu renovierten Zimmer sind sehr gut gelungen. Wer einen leichten Schlaf hat - so wie ich - der sollte bei dieser Adresse einen Bogen darum machen. 

Zudem verfügt das Hotel (bei 20 Stockwerken) über gerade mal zwei Aufzüge, die zudem auch vom Personal benutzt werden. Geduld mitbringen! 

Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit.

title: Amazing stay!
text: The location of this hotel was very convenient to the subway and places to eat.  It was within walking distance to Broadway shows but was far enough away from tourist locations that it was quiet at night.  Ashley and the front desk were very welcoming.    The breakfast was a good way to start off the day!

title: Flavio Brazil
text: Excellent services and wonderfull experience at the hotel. The kindness and the attention of hotel staff were the best part of the stay and made the experience unforgetable. Recomend to all. The best cost/benefit in Manhattan.

title: tres propre et très bien situé
text: Hotel très propre et très confortable situé à 50m du métro et à proximité de l'Empire State Building et de Times Square.seul bémol le manque d'étagères pour ranger les vêtements. Je conseil vivement. Et pour dîner vous avez à côté le tacombi (tacos) et le Mandoo Bar (koreen) à  des prix raisonnables pour manathan.

title: Clean and inexpensive in NYC
text: The hotel is in a great location.  Easy Walking distance from penn station, Empire State Building snd Times Square.  A little longer walk to Central Park but still doable. It was clean, staff was friendly and it was very reasonably priced.

title: A nice place to stay in mid town Manhattan
text:
We needed a place that was within a reasonable distance from Madison Square Garden for one night. We usually stay at Hamptons when possible because of the quality. 
At this location the staff was very pleasant, and the building was clean. The rooms were recently renovated and ours was fine although small. But it is NYC.

title: Excelente
text: Hotel excelente! Quartos limpos, confortáveis e silenciosos! Localização perfeita, com metrô a passos de distância! Cafe, chá e cookies são oferecidos aos hóspedes o tempo todo, uma delícia pra quando você chega cansado e com frio de um dia inteiro de passeio. Atendentes simpáticos e prontos a ajudar. Guardam as malas antes do check in. Super recomendo!

title: Good location, clean room
text: The front desk was friendly and welcoming. The room was clean and the beds were comfortable. Hallways were a little tight. The location of the hotel was good. I liked being near a subway station and within walking distance to Madison Square Garden. Made for easy traveling.

title: Nice hotel but not too happy with my stay
text:
Mind this is not my first time in NYC, this is my 4th trip and off course I LOVE NYC. But this time was not too happy, first I made the booking with Booking com for 5 people and two kids were 16 years old (big kids, not small kids) so they gave me a room with 2 full beds not even queen beds, booking com MISTAKE and mine for getting a non refundable reservation this was reserved back in Nov 2019, so I call the hotel and they did not care about the room for 5 people and also spoke to booking com and not help from any of both. So we had to go and we stayed this last weekend, we sleep very uncomfortable off course, but no other choice. 
Room had enough room for our luggage, desk, beds and a chair. 

Breakfast was great and Luis was also super helpful with us and everyone at the time of the breakfast and maintain the breakfast area well clean but Sunday and Monday the area was not very clean. 

The room lady who made our room 204 from Jan 17-20 never put enough towels, I always had to ask for extra towels every night after all day walking. 

Then the guy who works at night poor guy he was always bringing everything and first night sheet had blood, so he came to made our bed (sorry we did not get his name but he was from Jamaica) he was super nice guy too. 

Front desk always helpful and fast respond all the time.

Location in my opinion was far from Times Square, about 10 blocks. 

I did not take pics of the room but was a second floor not noise at all. 

Hotel was clean and outside areas too.

I will not stay here again, only because it was dar from Times Square since I stayed before in that area. But hotel it is pretty good. 

Metro station like 20 steps away from the hotel.

title: Boa relação custo benefício, para NYC
text:
Quarto espaçoso.
Limpo.
Cama confortável.
Quarto para 4, e caberia 4.
Banheiro Ok.
Bem localizado. Comida e espetáculos na redondeza.
Staff bastante educado.
Café OK (bem americano, cada um por si), gostei da máquina de waffle.
Bastante travesseiros (gosto disto).
Chá e cafés à disposição 24h.
Calefação perfeita.

title: Great renovation, Convenient to virtually everything, And Affordable
text: Excellent location that was a walk to everything from the Empire State Building, Kipps Bay, Times Square, Madison Square Garden and so much more.  Small rooms just like most other NYC hotel rooms, but it was recently beautifully renovated with a contemporary feel that made it feel much bigger. Clean, very nice staff and it felt very safe. Enjoy!

title: A Very Positive Experience
text: I selected this hotel primarily based on its location, the price and my prior experience with the Hampton Inn Hotels.  I felt very comfortable at the hotel throughout my stay.  The staff are very courteous and helpful, my room was very clean & comfortable, and the location was perfect for my NYC plans.

title: Excelente ubicación y buen servicio y limpieza
text: El hotel está muy bien ubicado a unos pasos del TimeSquare, las habitaciones son cómodas con moderno inmobiliario, muy limpias. Este hotel es definitivamente un buen lugar para alojarte durante un viaje de trabajo o negocios.

title: Bedding was worn out
text: I didn't have a very restful stay. Was extremely disappointed with the worn out bedding that was pilling and had a rough texture. Staff was all friendly and helpful. Location wasn't bad. Could have been cleaner.

title: Satisfecha
text:
El hotel es correcto , esta muy bien ubicado, personal exelente! 
Ls habitaciones matrimoniales son chicas me cambie al otro dia a una de dos camas y estaba mejor. No trae un buen lugar de guardado de ropa tuve  que dejarla sobre el escritorio .
El desayuno es correcto. 
La cortesia del cafe las 24 hs y cookies es buenisimo!!

title: Dormir mejor que en tu casa es posible
text: Como siempre excelente. Tanto las habitaciones como el personal. La cama es tan cómoda que te atrapa y aunque no tengas sueño te duermes. Es un detalle el desayuno, no desayunabamos todos los días ahí porque no es muy variado pero los días que lo haces pues eso que te ahorras. Volveré seguro. Es mi segunda vez y no dudo en una tercera

title: Excelente precio/calidad. Muy recomendable
text: La estadía fue excelente, así como también el desayuno y la predisposición del personal. Aunque el espacio del desayuno es pequeño y hay demasiada gente todo el tiempo. La ubicación es excelente, a pasos del subte (34-Herald Square).

title: Amazing Birthday/Christmas trip!
text:
Traveled with family and friends for my sons 18th birthday. Can not fault this hotel at all. We were treated so so well by all the staff (Ryan could cheer up a bit!) Emmanuel and Jason were so welcoming as were the girls at the front desk, I appointment as I cant recall all of their names but I know one was something like Kadesha and she was the sweetest girl. 

Louis made the children feel so welcome, giving them treats everyday he always came to find us and have little chat. He made our stay, it felt like home from home. The rooms were big by New York standards and very comfortable. We had an amazing view of the empire state building. 

Breakfast was good but sometimes very busy however you could take food away to your room, which was great. The location is just simply perfect, easy to get to everything. I Slept really well here and we were at the front too. 

Hot drinks and water available all day and night in the lobby and biscuits too. I really dont have a bad word to say. We had a hold deposit taken from our card at check-in and at check-out this was returned immediately to my account. 

Staff were so so helpful and very sweet. We will most certainly be back.  

Thank you everyone for making our trip such a lovely one. Love from England see you again. X

title: Great Hotel
text: Number 1 I was traveling for work and needed to get around on subway which this location is perfect to get anywhere, Number 2 it was very clean , Number 3 the free breakfast was perfect to pick something up before work. NUMBER 3 and the most important one was the customer service from the people at the front desk and anyone else in the building offering advice for place to go and just greeting me every time I came back. Also on my departure out I got to the airport only to realize my Apple Pen. I called and they instantly checked the room and found it within 10 minutes I received a call back that they had it and will ship back to Wisconsin for me!!! GOLD!! Highly recommend!!!

title: Nice location, great staff
text: Came with a friend who has stayed here before.  It was very clean, the staff were helpful and friendly, and the price was great for the location.  Often hotel pillows are too big for me, but these were perfect.  Definitely consider it for your NYC visit.

title: Nice hotel
text: Very nice stay we had in Hampton Inn Manhattan. Friendly people and good prices. Excellent location close to Empire States Building, Macy's. I really enjoy to stay there and  I intend to return back in my next holidays.

title: December in Manhattan
text: I must say that customer service is excellent. Every single person in the hotel tries to make your visit great. Unfortunately, the room has a very tiny closet and the breakfast station is placed in a little room that makes highly uncomfortable to access the food at the same time that all guest wants to get breakfast. The location is excellent.

title: Ottimo
text:
L'hotel si trova a Herald Square e ha un'entrata alla subway vicinissima, aspetto non secondario se si decide di utilizzare la metro come mezzo principale di trasporto. Posizione ottima quindi per esplorare tutte le zone della città.
Camere pulite e personale gentile, prima colazione americana buona . Consigliato!

title: Emplacement idéal!
text:
L'emplacement est parfait, tout près de l'empire state building et à quelques rues de times square. Au calme. Proche de plusieurs points utiles (bars, restos, magasins, laverie)
Le personnel est très sympathique et disponible
Nous avons trouvé la chambre un peu petite pour 4 personnes (2 adultes et 2 enfants). Ainsi que les lits (2 lits de 120 cm!); toutefois très confortables!
L'hotel et la chambre sont propres.
Petit déjeuner convenable sans être exceptionnel non plus.

title: Amazing experience and hospitality
text: I stayed at this hotel for 11 nights , including New Year’s Eve with family and it was truly value for money and an amazing experience. The staff was very polite and helpful. The location is amazing. The stay was wonderful and I’d choose this hotel the next time I’m in New York as well. The staff at the front desk is very helpful. Considering it’s in the heart of the city, the stay and the experience was definitely worth it. Would definitely come back!

title: Bite of the Big Apple
text: This hotel is conveniently located a few blocks from time square and other popular sites in the city.  The Metro station is a less than 30 yards from the front entrance, for easy travel other than UBER.  The breakfast is okay, its free, what else is there to say?!  The front staff is cool, in particular Saundra was my go to in the daytime as far as water, putting in a special clean order as I left hotel room, etc.  Victor was cool as part of the Maintenance dept to hook you up on the remote controls and Jason was good on the booking rooms and views.  Overall the rooms were good but small; this may be the norm but if you're from Texas, well...During the holidays it could be a bit crowded, day after Christmas and New Year's Eve. If you are a light sleeper it could be a bit noisy with all the horns, sirens, commercial vehicles, etc.  It is truly the city that never sleeps.

title: Migliorabile
text: Soggiornato per 7 notti a cavallo tra il vecchio e il nuovo anno. Posizione dell’albergo molto strategica, ingresso della metro a 20 metri dall’uscita dell’albergo e Times Square a pochi minuti a piedi. Abbiamo scelto questo albergo in quanto il più vicino a quello prenotato dai nostri amici. Nel complesso soggiorno buono migliorabile con piccole accortezze (colazione decisamente migliorabile sia come cibo che organizzazione, camere arredabili  in modo più funzionale. Nel complesso un soggiorno sufficientemente gradevole.

title: Strategico, accogliente, personale gentile
text:
Abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel per 6 notti; la posizione dell'Hotel è perfetta sia per girare il centro a piedi, sia per raggiungere la maggior parte dei punti di interesse a NY tramite la metro che è proprio a due passi dall'hotel.
Le camere sono tutt'altro che spaziose però il servizio di pulizia è buono. Il personale gentilissimo ed accogliente. La colazione è buona e consente di soddisfare sia gusti occidentali che non. Caffè, the ed acqua sono sempre a disposizione. A richiesta forniscono anche comodissime bottigliette di acqua.
L'unica nota stonata è l'aria condizionata eccessivamente rumorosa, ma riscalda molto velocemente per cui è possibile tenerla spenta.

title: Tirando a localizaçao e a simpatia do Front desk mais nada presta nesse hotel!!!
text:
Prós: A localizaçao, ao lado do Metro e próxima ao Times Square a pé. O pessoal do Front Desk, em especial Sandra, Jason e Ryan. 
Contra: o Pior café da manha que voce experimentará na sua vida, comida insossa e de aparência horrícel, talheres de plástico, bandeja de papelão e copos descartáveis ( num hotel de USD 260,00 a diária ); O espaço para refeiçoes tem umas 10 mesas e um espaço de 6 metros quadrados para pegar a comida que nao são suficientes nem para 10% dos quartos do hotel, causando filas intermináveis.
O Hotel nao tem estrutura para suportar a lotaçao dos seus quartos, possui somente 2 elevadores, para descer, subir; Ou usa-se as escadas ou aguarda de 15 a 20 minutos.
Quartos minúsculos, são para no máximo 2 pessoas e  2 malas, porque nem lugar para guardar a roupa voce terá, vai ter de deixar as roupas na mala todo o tempo.
Há opções muito melhores, o atrativo de café da manha grátis é um engodo!!!!!!!!!!

title: Christmas Visit to NYC
text: Our family was pleased with every aspect of this hotel.  The customer service was fantastic.  We checked in early at 10am, left our bags at the hotel and parked in the garage that the hotel utilizes (around the corner). We requested a late checkout the following day and were allowed to remain in our room until 12:30. We left our bags until 5 that evening. We paid $114 for two days of parking an SUV, which we didn't find outrageous for a secure garage in NYC. The hotel breakfast was typical of what you'd expect for a free continental breakfast. The staff kept it well-stocked. As other reviewers have remarked,  it can take awhile to get an elevator during peak times,  but our view of the Empire State Building from the 17th floor was well worth the wait for an elevator!

title: First visit to NYC.
text: We picked this hotel for our first trip to NYC based on reviews on its location and it was perfect for us. We chose to stay in a room with a view of the Empire State Building so not sure if there has any difference but it had everything we needed- fridge, iron, ironing board, hairdryer, USB sockets and plenty of adaptors, comfortable bed and was spotlessly clean. We stayed from 18th to 23rd and the hotel definitely got busier on the last couple of days but we never had to wait particularly long for the lift and always managed to find a table at breakfast time. Check in was quick and easy and all of the staff we encountered were friendly and helpful. I would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel or staying there should we return. Thank you for a pleasant stay!

title: Under resourced hotel. Avoid during holidays.
text: Under resourced hotel. Avoid during holidays. Elevators intermittent functioning -- 20 floors!  Breakfast room too small for all of the guests. Small lobby - piled up luggage. They could not stop luggage properly until the breakfast was over at 10AM.

title: Excellent Location - CLEAN FRIENDLY HOTEL
text: Excellent location!!  Extremely clean, comfortable beds. Check in was extremely fast abd easy, woman at front desk VERY friendly!!! Accepted a family of 6 (3 adults and 3 children) Will most definitely stay at this location again without hesitation.

title: Fourth time to stay
text: Traveled to NYC numerous times and this is my favorite place to stay. It is so convenient to Times Square, Macy’s, Fifth Ave, Bryant Park, Rockefeller Plaza, Empire State Building. Very reasonably priced and breakfast is included. There is a subway stop right out the door. But I would recommend walking to the above so you can see the city above ground. Many great places to eat close by. It is clean with small rooms. It can be noisy but you are in NYC. Will stay here on my next visit.

title: Excelente custo/benefício
text: Ótima localização, dá pra ir a pé até a Times Square, Macys, etc! Mas se preferir vc estará ao lado do metrô. Funcionários atenciosos, quartos bonitos e limpos, café e água a vontade quebram um galho! Mesinhas na área em frente o hall de entrada, quase na calçada, dão um ar descontraído! Voltarei em breve.

title: Superior Service
text: I stayed here the night of December 15, 2019, and left valuables in the room when I checked out.  I want to commend Barbara in Housekeeping, who found the items, and Jason Bautista and Sandra Gomez and and other employees for working above and beyond to get a package to me.  I called late that night and was told that the housekeeping staff had a place to hold items found in the room and someone would contact me in the morning.  I spoke with Jason Bautista in the morning and he had already checked and my belongings were there and he sent me an authorization form to complete and, after several tries, I got it to him.  Sandra Gomez brought the package to Fed Ex that afternoon.  The next morning I realized it had been sent to my home address instead of the location I am in for the next three weeks I contacted the hotel and spoke with a man at the front desk who said he would relay the message to Sandra when she came in, which he did.  I received a call from Sandra after she went back to FedEx to have the destination changed.  I have to say I have NEVER received such wonderful care and will return to this hotel whenever I am in New York City.

title: Luna di miele
text: Abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel per 4 notti. Posizione ottima per girare il centro a piedi e raggiungere alcuni siti di interesse come times square, empire state building, Bryant park. Le camere sono piccoline ma pulite. Personale gentilossimo ad accogliere qualsiasi richiesta. Colazione non molto variegata ma comunque buona. Caffè e the a disposizione h24. Consigliatissimo

title: You don't get what you pay for...
text: Although the location is fairly convenient, this is definitely a dated hotel that only has two elevators for its 20 floors.  At times, those elevators will have either one or both seemingly devoted to the top five or so floors and therefore you and others will be waiting inordinate amounts of time (10+ minutes) in the lobby.  The rooms are fairly small (to be expected) but I was surprised by the lack of a fridge and that the curtains were about 8 inches away from the window and therefore let in a constant bright light throughout the night.  The metal box spring was a bit insecure and creaked whenever you laid down on it.  Food was standard soggy eggs/omelet options and there's hardly any space to dine.  I would highly recommend choosing any of the alternate hilton options nearby as you're paying a huge premium for the outdated amenities this particular hotel provides.

title: Location!!
text: Esta es una de las mejores locaciones. Tienes la estacion del tren casi al frente del hotel. Puedes caminar a cualquier area de Times Square, Empire State, Macys y demas. La vista desde el cuarto hermosa al los edificios. Lo unico es que el cuarto era super pequeño y la hielera y los vasos estaban en el baño los cual es anti hiegienico. El desayuno sabroso y el staff muy amable.

title: Excellent
text: Overall, the experience and stay was excellent.  The staff was fantastic, and the service was top notch.  The room was very clean, including the restroom.  My only complaint would be that the bedding could be updated, but it was comfortable.  I would stay here again and would recommend it to anyone.  The location is great, too!

title: Great location for the holiday season
text: Macy's is right around the corner, Times Square is a short walk as is Rockefeller Center (maybe a mile). Plenty of good places to eat (check out Andrews for breakfast). The only issue was with one of the elevators was in and out of service.

title: Good location, good facilities poor breakfast.
text: Practical hotel, in very good location, close to major city attractions and shoppings, 2 minute from subway station. Good and very clean bedroom / bathroom. Poor quality breakfast, not in line with overall hotel.

title: Okay
text: Room was not ready by 3.  Found hair in shower when we arrived. Over priced.  Was gone all day then when we arrived back to the room, it was not cleaned.  Felt they had the time to perform housekeeping duties.

title: GREAT PLACE TO STAY
text: This hotel is close to everything......We were up in Nov. and Jason and Yonfi at the front desk went above and beyond to help us with information and places to go......they were both a breath of fresh air.  The hotel is lucky to have them.   Second time we stayed there and would stay there again for sure....rooms are small but clean.

title: Slightly Disappointed After Our Last Visit
text: I guess we were spoiled last time we stayed here as we had a room at the front with a fabulous view of the Empire State Building. This time we had a room on the lower floor which overlooked buildings at the rear of the hotel which made the room a bit dark and drab. However there was the consolation we could use the stairs as on the last visit we had to wait some time for the lift. That aside - the hotel is in a great location - opposite Macy's for all you shoppers, near Penn Station, the Empire State Building and it has ample subway options nearby which I think is a must in Manhattan. Staff are friendly and helpful, the room was comfortable. Breakfast was typical free American fare which most days was ok, one day awful - burgers and dry biscuits - I think this option needs a rethink! Would I stay here again - not sure.

title: Macys day parade
text: Was a nice location for the parade.  Be prepared to spend a lot for parking. Cost $200 for three days with a mid sized suv. Breakfast items are basic and was very crowded during breakfast hours therefore items tended to be empty frequently.

title: Thanksgiving Day Parade at an awesome hotel for a great price!
text: My family and I book a room in this hotel every year for Thanksgiving. We travel to NYC to watch the parade, shop at Macy's Thanksgiving night and watch the Rockets perform. It never gets old and we love the location of this hotel. It's small, fairly priced, free breakfast and helpful staff! Super clean and comfortable is my number one and this hotel has it! Thanks again Hampton Inn for a great holiday away from home!

title: Shopping trip
text: We couldn’t fault this hotel at all, excellent location, comfy beds, brilliant shower/bath tub, great selection for breakfast, fast check in and check out, friendly staff, lovely and quiet in our room 1608 didn’t hear any noise as we were at the back of hotel which suited us fine, will def be back here again, I got a great price for 4 nights and it was one of the best I’ve stayed in,in New York!

title: Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade
text: Our granddaughters marched and danced in the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade and we went to watch them. The Hampton was conveniently located for us to do everything we wanted. It was an excellent place to stay.

title: Hotel perfeito
text:
Tudo de bom, quarto limpo com cama king size, produtos no banheiro de qualidade, ótima televisão e café da manhã saboroso.
A localização é espetacular, ao lado do metrô, em um ponto central da cidade.
Viajo frequentemente, e poucas vezes fui tão bem atendido em uma recepção como pela Khadesha Smith, absolutamente perfeita!

title: Great Location.
text:
Great Location close to transit, shopping and restaurants.
Overall helpful and friendly staff.Free breakfast quality okay.Room sizes are acceptable for New York City standards.
Internet slow and inconsistent

title: Great NYC vacation!!!
text: Great NYC location! Very close to all tourist spots and close to subway stops. Nice view of the Empire State Building from our window. Will definitely consider staying here again if We decide to come back to NYC.

title: Good breakfast but cold room
text: Nice room with a good bed. The room was really central. The breakfast was good with a good selection and different foods every day. The bathroom was however really cold and the windows were leaking air. The aircon was really loud.

title: Great location, disappointing service.
text: You could stumble across the Empire State Building from this location; however, the establishment itself does not meet the basic Hilton expectations. Easy and helpful staff at check-in, a clean room, familiarity with the details of a reservation and the Hilton standard of facility are not unreasonable expectations. I wish I could leave a better review.

title: MUY BUENA UBICACION
text: Lo mejor del hotel es la situación y la atención del personal. Son muy amables y la mayoría hablan español. Las habitaciones algo pequeñas pero confortables. Lo peor la relación precio calidad, para un hotel que seria categoría 3*.

title: Great, just great
text: Honestly, it was more than my daughter and i expected. Everything thing was on point. I would like to stand out the service and attention we got from Mr. Luis. He is the person that will get your bags, stays “right on point” with the complementary breakfast and is always at your service. I would to thank all the staff the worked on this particular Veterans memorial - weekend. You guys got a customer for sure. Hope to see you soon.

title: RECOMENDABLE
text:
Excelente ubicaciòn. Instalaciones correctas y muy buena la atenciòn.
Con respecto a la limpieza nada que objetar. 
Me sentì còmodo y volverìa a ser uso de las instalaciones.
Recomiendo el hotel. Volveria sin dudarlo.
Me olvidaba, recepcionan tus compras online, esto es muy còmodo.
Lo mejor, la ubicaciòn, cerca de todo.
No se van a arrepentir.

title: Excelente ubicación y servicio
text:
Ubicación perfecta. Atención del personal de recepción muy buena. Incluye desayuno, básico pero muy importante en NY.
Habitación con dos camas queen muy cómodas y con vista espectacular al Empire State. 
Lo único desfavorable los ascensores. Muy lentos y en algunos momentos mucha espera.
Volvería.

title: Hilton never disappoints
text: Great stay! Very friendly and accommodating staff. The complimentary breakfast was a plus. The rooms are smaller than what I'm used to, however this is the NY way of life. Overall, clean environment with water and coffee available at all times in the lobby.

title: 3 nights stay in NYC
text:
We booked this hotel at last min and the response is fast and accurate.
Overall service is very good especially we enjoy the quality of complimentary breakfast. The room is clean just little small. The mattress is firm and comfort. Location is perfect going uptown and downtown.

title: Not a very pleasant stay
text:
The hotel staff are great. Very friendly and always willing to help. But this is where the good news end.

Hotel rooms in New York are generally small ... the rooms in this Hampton Inn are very small and show the age of the hotel. And I am not talking about a scratch here or there ... the ventilator in the bathroom was strangely hanging from the ceiling, for instance. The bathroom was not perfectly clean (especially in "hidden" places).

But the real nightmare came with the elevators. There are 20 floors (each with 8 rooms) served by just the elevators (each of them can accommodate ca. 10-12 people) and one of them broke down during our stay and was out of order for two days (or maybe more ... it was still our of service when we were leaving). You can guess how it look in the morning when everybody was trying to get their breakfast. One "roundtrip" of the elevator up to the 20th floor and back to the lobby took 15 minutes or so because on the way down the elevator stopped at each floor although it was already full. On the 2nd day the only working elevator was used by some construction company which was probably doing some renovation for moving material up and garbage down while the hotel guests were hopelessly waiting and waiting. On several occasions we ventured to walk down from the 17th floor because we did not want to spend most of our time in NYC by waiting for an elevator.

I understand that things break down from time to time but the hotel can do better to handle such an emergency situation. I would also expect the hotel operator to have some contingency plan to fix the elevator within hours and not days.

title: Perfeito
text: Adorei o hotel. Muito bem localizado, quarto de bom tamanho, banheiro muito bom, limpeza excelente. O café da manhã é muito gostoso com omeletes, pães, frutas, suco, iogurtes, etc. Os funcionários super atenciosos. Guardam a bagagem até o horário do check-in/out. Tem estação do metrô na esquina, e tbm dá pra ir em vários pontos turísticos a pé, pois a localização é perfeita. Recomendo de olhos fechados.

title: Happy with the HAMPTON
text: Excellent location- a mere walk to the corner and Macy’s Herald Square is in front of you.  Safe walking neighborhood - Close to penn station and Madison square garden.  Amazing staff and warm chocolate chip cookies after a long day And a great breakfast in the morning.  Will definitely stay there again.

title: Clean. Comfortable and Close
text: This hotel is average. Close to everything, comfortable and clean. I really appreciated the breakfast staff person who went out of his way to help my children with the waffle machine. These little things are important especially with front line staff. Kudos, Hampton Inn for hiring that fellow! :)

title: Exceptional service at great property
text:
Stayed for four nights for a family vacation. We chose this hotel because it's in the heart of New York and close to many Subway lines. Rooms were sparkling clean (no carpet!) and looked as if they were renovated recently. Complimentary hot breakfast was great and options changed daily. 

Can't say enough about the super friendly and helpful employees. When we arrived the first evening, we found out our Expedia booking created two reservations for our stay and we'd have to visit the desk again the next day for new keys. Came down in the morning and the day clerk knew about the situation and had new cards ready for us. Took about 30 seconds to close one reservation and open the other. I was very impressed they easily rectified the reservations and allowed us to keep the same room. The day clerk also helped us with a ride to the airport, spotted us getting off the elevator at check-out and escorted us to the car. 

So I want to make special mention of Jason and Ryan for their exceptional service during our stay. I've paid more for hotels in NYC and gotten far less.  Thank you for a great stay!

title: voyage famille 2 ado
text: Séjour en famille , hôtel très bien placé. Petit déjeuner correct même si cela pourrait être mieux pour un ce prix par nuit. Chambre tres correcte. Nous étions au 13 ème mais nous avions réservé en direct.

title: EXCELENTE HOTEL
text: Muy buena ubicación, a pocos metros del subway y muy cercano a las grandes tiendas y puntos de atracción turística. Buen desayuno sin esperas para conseguir mesa. Habitación cómoda bien equipada y muy buen servicio de limpieza. El personal de recepción muy atento y siempre muy bien predispuesto para atender a los pasajeros, especialmente Sandra y Jason que nos orientaron a mi esposa y a mi en todo lo que  necesitabamos saber, pues también hablan español.Sin duda alguna volvería a este hotel.

title: Great location and really clean!
text: We stayed at this hidden gem for 4 nights for a short family vacay. The place was really clean and all the staff were super friendly and helpful. The location was great as well! The breakfast was an added benefit!

title: Very good location for subway travel
text: Close to several subway entrances. Lots of good food choices. I felt safe. It is within walking distance of Macy's, H & M, and the Manhatten Mall. Access to the PATH train is 3 blocks away inside the Manhattan Mall

title: Visiting NYC
text: Location was great for riding the subway. Only steps away! Complimentary breakfast was good. Busy hotel which at times could make the elevators a bit slow. Other than that we had no complaints about our stay. Great location for sightseeing major attractions, a quick walk to the subway would take you anywhere you wanted to go.

title: New York trip
text: Excellent hotel in an excellent location. I visited New York with a friend as my holiday of a lifetime. Since I was a young age I had always wanted to go and it didn’t disappoint. The staff in the hotel were friendly and extremely helpful I would definitely stay there again should I get the opportunity to go back.

title: Fun trip with family & friends
text:
Wonderful place to stay in New York! Most friendly and helpful staff! Frank, the manager was so friendly and kind! I can see why all his employees are so nice, too! Ryan and all others were so friendly at the front desk! Sorry, wish I could remember all their names! 
Thanks for making our trip so enjoyable!
Gale

title: Great place to stay!
text: This was a wonderful place to stay. Excellent staff, very friendly and extremely helpful. Great location right by Hearld square. Very clean and very peaceful. Will definitely stay here again and highly recommend staying here.

title: Very comfortable and great location
text: This hotel had everything we needed with breakfast included so we could eat and run.... very comfortable. Great location for all the sight seeing plus the subway was just outside. Would definitely return here.

title: New York Trip
text: The employees at this hotel were friendly and helpful. They provided good directions and excellent restaurant recommendations. The location is close to shopping, attractions and restaurants. The hotel was clean and provided an excellent breakfast. I will stay here again.

title: Good location but bare bones room
text:
Great mid-town location just few steps from Harold Square Subway station.

Room was the worst Hampton Inn I’ve stayed at.  Bed and the one chair was uncomfortable and made my back hurt, room was worn out, no fridge and room was handicap accessible.  Street noise was very loud.

Hotel rooms are being remodeled so maybe it will be better for others in future.

I would not stay here again.

title: Our New York experience was GREAT but this Hotel was NOT the best!
