La ubicacion del hotel es su fuerte, a 50 metros de la tienda Macys, unas cuadras de Times Square y el Madison Square Garden. Cerca de 6 lineas del Metro y en una zona con mucho movimiento todo el dia lo que te permitia volver tarde.
El hotel cuenta con un gymnasio en su subsuelo que no usa ni el Capitan America y lo unico que puedo decir no hizo perfecto nuestra estadia fue la rotura de un caño con su consiguiente inundacion y que nadie del personal se acercara a ver si necesitabamos algo sabiendo que debiamos subir 19 pisos x escalera durante un dia y medio y no brindar algun tipo de compensacion a los huespedes que decidimos quedarnos.
En lo demas todo perfecto.

title: Excelente Ubicacion y Amable Personal
text: Excelente ubicacion a metros del Times Square y la tienda Macys. Buena atencion del personal. Limpieza super correcta, tamaño de la cama muy adecuado. Un desayuno correcto para arrancar el dia y servicios de cortesia todo el dia (cafe, agua, etc) que le dan un muy interesante valor. Lastima no pude sumar punos Honors por haber contradado con una agencia.

title: 2 night stay for ex New Yorkers
text: arrived before 3p; room was ready; staff are great!  easy & fast check-in.  room on 14th floor facing the back was very quiet.  king room is small, but you be in NYC.  very clean; safe holds 17.3 inch laptop; lots of hot water.  bed was very comfy.  no fridge; basic Wi-Fi OK.  breakfast is great: 2 rooms; lots of food choices.  great location in Mid-town.  Concierge is a nice touch at this price point.  would definitely stay again.

title: Me encantó!!
text:
El hotel es súper cómodo y lo mejor es la ubicación!! Se puede hacer caminando muchas atracciones y el subte está en la misma cuadra!
La limpieza es correcta y la mayoría del personal habla español.
Tiene desayuno, algo casi raro en un hotel de Nueva York.

En la misma cuadra hay una pizzería que permite un almuerzo o cena económica!

title: Xmas shopping
text: Excellent hotel. Staff were polite and very helpful. Breakfast was excellent, lots of choice. Excellent position for Macy's and shopping, not far from Times Square.  A very good experience and would thoroughly recommend. Will go back again.

title: Hampton Inn Empire State Building
text: Good service from a caring staff.  Great location. Easy walikng access to Manhattan,Times Square, Herald Square subway station serving all points of interest.  Good breakfast.  Friendly service. Very good value.

title: Failure to timely service room
text: Room was not made up during normal business hours.  Hallway was filled with equipment  used for repairing water damage.  Workers congregated outside of room in hallway.  Workers did not defer to guests in operating elevators.

title: Excellent staff and very clean hotel.
text: The staff shine at this Hampton Inn. The location is fantastic, the breakfast had everything one could want, the rooms and lobby etcetera are very clean. The accessible room was very nice. The one drawback is that the beds are new and are therefore hard. Of course, I got to sleep in a bed that hadn't been slept in by 1000 people, and that is a nice thing. I will return here soon, hopefully.

title: Convenient Location
text: The best thing about this Hampton Inn is its perfect location and free breakfast. We found most major attractions to be walkable from here, which we appreciated. We also were able to save a little money by taking advantage of the free breakfast (which is serviceable but nothing to write home about). The room was clean enough but not sparkling and was pretty small (but that's to be expected in NYC). The bed was comfortable and the shower always had hot water. The most frustrating thing about the hotel is the extremely slow elevators, of which there are only two. Also, when holding luggage, they keep your bags right in the lobby. There is, of course, an employee nearby, but I didn't get the feeling that my bag was secure. I'd recommend bringing luggage locks if you plan to store your luggage upon arrival or check out.

title: Excelente!!!
text: Excelente hotel, buena ubicación lo mejor es el personal que te hace sentir como en casa, los desayunos con Antonia y Luis son diferentes, personas muy gratas y amables, pendiente de ti en todo momento.

title: Favorite place to stay in NYC
text: Have now stayed here several times and it has been excellent every time. Very friendly staff and the housekeeping is top notch. The location is perfect for doing everything you want to do in NYC. Can’t wait to stay there again.

title: Excellent location, outstanding staff
text: I’m a frequent traveler with status in most hotel chains. But I fled here from an Airbnb with a rock hard bed and roaches—my bad for experimenting! I was so grateful to get a clean room on sudden notice with crisp sheets in a hotel so centrally located near major shops, the Empire State Building, and Penn Station. But the best part of my stay was the staff. The front desk staff understood my dilemma, worked with me to get a room as quickly as possible, and responded in a timely way to all my questions. The housekeeping staff really hustled and everything was clean. Luis in the breakfast area helped me get piping hot water for my travel French press, too. The rooms are small, yes, but for the reasonable prices, they are just fine. I had no complaints and I will definitely come back the next time I’m in town.

title: Convenient location in NY
text: We walked everywhere during our long weekend stay in NY.  For the price and location, this was a great choice, but I will say it's not the as nice as most urban Hampton Inn hotels.  The lobby is crowded, elevators are a little small, rooms are tiny, but nicely appointed.  Nice bed, shower head, good bathroom counter space and a safe.  The staff was very nice and the breakfast was good.  The common space could use a little sprucing up, but location and function were spot on!

title: Great hotel
text: This hotel has very courteous staff and is a clean comfortable hotel with great complimentary breakfast. We highly recommend this hotel to families with children. We brought our 8 year old grand-daughter on her first trip to New York and the location of this hotel was perfect!

title: Great Value Hotel in Manhattan
text: Overall great experience at this Hampton Inn. It has a great location, beautiful views of the empire state building as well as an extremely helpful staff. Everyone who works there was extremely lovely, efficient and kind.

title: Not the best stay.
text: The AC in my room made a ticking noise starting at 1am and didn't stop. Then the hairdryer shorted out constantly when trying to dry my wet hair.   The front desk person put the onus back on me and asked why I didn't reach out to them with the problems.  1. I'm not going to change rooms in the middle of the night.  2. I don't have time to wait for you to bring me a new hairdryer. You should have checked to make sure all things work in a hotel room.   Severely disappointed in the customer service given.

title: Definitivamente la mejor vista!
text: Excelente experiencia! Descargué la app que anuncian en la entrada y me fascinó porque está súper completa, te explican piso por piso todos los detalles y es como tener un guía solo para ti y a tu ritmo. El horario que tiene es fascinante y en todos los pisos la señal del wifi gratis es muy buena!. Es preferible ir de día o mejor aún, al atardecer para disfrutar de la vista de Central Park. La gente súper amable y llegar a lo más alto en mi opinión si vale la pena.

title: Hotel muy recomendable, por ubicacion y maravillosa atencion
text: La ubicacion es exeaordinaria y el servicio del front desk absolutamente maravilloso. Lo recomiendo por su calidad vs precio y porque logra que tu estadia en NYC se transforme en una muy grata experiencia

title: Un hotel acogedor en el Midtown de Nueva York
text:
Me encantó este hotel, ya que desde la recepción (donde hablan español), nos recibieron y todas nuestras dudas resueltas.
En frente de la recepción esta un modulo, donde se puede obtener información de tour, traslados y otros, donde fueron extremadamente amables
Las habitaciones, aunque pequeñas, son muy acogedoras, siempre todo muy limpio y renovado todos los días
El desayuno, cumple con las expectativas y junto a ello todo el día tienen té y café disponible, también los periódicos del día.
Me encantó el hotel, por su personal y también por el servicio prestado. También la ubicación para quienes vamos a turistear es inmejorable.

title: Friendly and excellent service in the city.
text: Rooms are clean and spacious for New York standards. You will get a great value on your money as the service that Antonia, at the breakfast area and Hector at the front desk is second to none.  They will go the extra mile to make you feel welcomed (yes, in New York City). The service alone they provide is worth the visit.  Don’t forget to say hello to them.

title: Great hotel and location
text: We really liked this hotel. It’s clean, with fairly large rooms and very friendly staff. The free breakfast and WiFi were great too, although the WiFi worked best in the lobby and hallways rather than our room. It is in an amazing location! Definitely the best thing about this hotel. It’s close to everything - Herald Square, Macy’s on 34th Street, Madison Square Garden, Penn Station, Empire State Building, and the subway lines. This was my fourth trip to NYC. I would definitely stay here again in the future and highly recommend it.

title: Bon hôtel
text:
Nous avons séjourné dans cet hôtel du 21/10 au 28/10 . Le quartier est parfait pour les visites , à deux pas de l'ESB, avec le métro à 50 m ( nombreuses lignes, station Herald Square), Macy's au bout de la rue , Times square à côté à 15mn.
Chambre avec lit kingsize, au troisième étage , sur rue.
La literie est excellente.la chambre était propre . Il y a de la moquette au sol . Il y a un coffre fort, pas de frigo ni mini bar.L'ameublement n'est pas neuf mais toutefois récent . L'insonorisation avec les autres chambres est convenable, nous n'avons quasiment rien entendu. Le bruit sur la rue a été décrit comme infernal mais franchement, mon fils qui dormait sans bouchons d'oreilles n'a pas été gêné .
Les ascenseurs peuvent effectivement être lents, mais rien d'insurmontable.
Le petit déjeuner est correct pour cette catégorie d'hôtel, du sucré, du salé chaud basique , une machine pour se faire des gaufres délicieuses .
La salle de petit déjeuner est petite , certes , mais nous avons toujours eu de la place, à différentes heures , meme a 8h30 .
Le personnel est tres tres aimable et serviable , ce qui est un plus. Nous avons réservé par leur intermédiaire un véhicule pour le retour vers JFK , un peu plus cher qu'un taxi mais tres correct et ponctuel. Ils nous ont gardé nos bagages le jour du départ.
Le seul point qui pourrait être noir , c'est la clim/chauffage qui est extrêmement bruyante. Nous l'avons coupée, il faisait une température tout à fait agréable. En plein été ou plein hivers, prevoir les bouchons d'oreille !
Bref , un bon rapport qualité prix dans sa catégorie. Il faut savoir qu'en fonction des périodes , les prix varient du simple au triple,(de 100$ à 300$ Pour la même chambre) mais c'est valable pour tous les hôtels alentours.

title: Gutes Mittelklasshotel an zentraler Lage
text:
Die Lage für einen Citytrip ist ideal. Das Hotel liegt nur einen Häuserblock vom Empire State Building entfernt. 
Das Zimmer war recht gross (wir hatten ein rollstuhlgängiges Zimmer). Leider war es etwas dunkel. Auf den Lift mussten wir immer lange warten. Es gab weder Kühlschrank noch Minibar im Zimmer. Die grosse Dusche dürfte mehr Wasserdruck haben. Das Frühstück war ok, allerdings gab es nur Wegwerfgeschirr. Das ist schade und gar nicht umweltfreundlich.
Alles in allem ein gutes Mittelklasshotel.

title: Moldy bathroom at overpriced hotel
text: The staff were friendly and helpful at check in and check out. Our bathroom was disgusting with black mold in the shower. The shower curtain was also broken and not connected to the broken tile in the wall causing water to splash on the floor unless you held it to the wall. Bathing with one hand is not fun and the front desk was not able to get it fixed.   The work out room has TVs that do not work properly on the machines. The free breakfast was not good and the egg omelet things was really gross. For over $400 a night I expect a lot more from a hotel.

title: School trip
text:
Stayed here with a school group. 
Perfect location for access to Macy’s and Times Square as well as subway and buses. 
Rooms are a good size and contain large comfortable beds. Coffee machine in rooms. 
Breakfast is good and offers a range of hot and cold food. 
Staff very friendly. 
Recommend hotel, much cheaper than the Gregory opposite which suffers more outside noise.

title: Great location!
text: We enjoyed our stay.    Location was minutes from the Empire State Building, Penn Station, 5th Avenue and about a 15 minute walk to Times Square.   Also loved the free hot breakfast!   I would have preferred a queen sized bed to sleep in as opposed to a double though...

title: New York vacation October 2017
text: Hampton Inn Empire State Building is centrally located with metro station 1/2 block away, numerous restaurants and abundant shopping.  Staff was professional and friendly.  Rooms were spotlessly cleaned every day.  Hotel is quiet, no street noise.  Check in and check out took less than a minute each time.  Breakfast in the morning is a plus.  Many items to choose from.  The eating area is kept very clean.  Nice touch to have coffee, tea, hot chocolate, water available all day.  Wifi worked well.  I would recommend this property to friends.

title: Great place to stay
text: My first visit to NY and the hotel was perfect. Able to walk almost everywhere we wanted to go. Always clean and quiet. Breakfast was very good. Staff friendly and helpful. The beds were very comfortable and linens of a high quality.

title: 100% Recomendable
text: La cadena  Hampton Inn cumple con las 3B Bueno, bonito y Barto.  La ubicación de este hotel en pleno Manhattan es perfecta, muy recomendable y a metros del subway. El que puedes utilizar para moverte a lo largo de la ciudad.

title: Ubicación y amabilidad
text:
La ubicación de este hotel es casi ideal, está a cuadra y media del Empire State y a metros de varias líneas de subte.
El personal de recepción dispuesto a responder y a resolver todas las situaciones que se fueron presentando durante nuestra estadía.
Quiero nombrar especialmente a Antonia y Luis, quienes estaban en el desayunador, sirviendo y acompañando a todos los turistas. Antonia se destacaba por su buen humor y cordialidad, atenta a nuestras necesidades a esas horas de la mañana.
La habitación amplia, limpia y silenciosa.
Hotel al cual volvería de volver a Nueva York, y al cual recomiendo sin dudar

title: Fab hotel
text:
Had 2 rooms on 13th floor for 4 of us including 2 teens.
Rooms amazing. Spotlessly clean. Lovely spacious bathroom with great shower. Beds so comfy with huge feather pillows.
Staff friendly and helpful.
Water and ice available on landings and complimntary hot drinks, ice cold juice and water in the breakfast room at all times. Vending machines in basement containing snacks and drinks which were much cheaper than in the local shops.
Breakfast was busy but great with fresh hot choice each day and loads of cold choices plus waffle makers which made the most amazing fresh hot waffles with choice of toppings.
Located right next to Subway and Macy's. 5 min walk to Empire State. 20 min walk to Times Square. McDonald's just round the corner where all soft drinks 99 cents.

title: Dobbeltbooking
text:
Vores første oplevelse med hotellet, trækker vurderingen ned: vi havde booket og betalt for værelset et helt år før. Vi ankommer med to børn (8 og 11 år) kl. 24 midnat (kl 6 om morgenen dansk tid, så på det tidspunkt havde vi været vågne i næsten et døgn). Fuldstændig smadrede træder vi ind og får at vide i receptionen, at der var "et problem" med værelserne på 9. etage, og at vores værelse ikke var klar. Vi fik at vide, at vi den første nat kunne blive indkvarteret på et søsterhotel ca 6 minutter i bil fra hotellet. Og at vi så kunne ringe kl 9 næste morgen og spørge, om værelset var klar. Herefter fik vi at vide, at vi bare kunne gå ud og praje en taxa og tage til det andet hotel. De skulle nok refundere udgiften. Det viste sig så, at hotellet lå næsten 1/2 time væk.... Afsted om natten med to trætte unger (og os selv).  På det andet hotel kom vi ind. Vi spurgte , om vi kunne spise morgenmad der, for vi havde jo betalt for morgenmad, og vi var ikke sikre på, at vi kunne nå tilbage til vores oprindelige hotel næste dag, inden morgenmaden var pakket væk. Svaret var, at det ikke kunne lade sig gøre, men at vi var velkomne til at ringe til hotellet kl 9 næste morgen og høre, om værelset var klar, og hvis det var, kunne vi tage tilbage og få morgenmad. På det tidspunkt var klokken næsten 2 om natten, så det var svært at forestille sig, at vi skulle nå tilbage til hotellet til kl 10. Vi overhørte en samtale mellem receptionisterne på de to hoteller og fandt herefter ud af, at hotellet havde dobbeltbooket, og at det var derfor vores værelse ikke var ledigt...
Vores første klage falder på, at de overhovedet kunne dobbeltbooke et værelse, som allerede var købt og betalt. OG at vi først fik besked, da vi ankom.
Vores anden klage falder på, at vi selv skulle ud op gaden og praje en taxa. Den mindste service man kunne forvente var vel, at der blev ringet efter en taxa...

Når det er sagt, så var vi tilfredse med alt andet. Beliggenheden er intet mindre end perfekt. Rengøringen var fin, den øvrige service fin, og de andre receptionister meget venlige. Morgenmaden var også ganske udmærket. Altid noget lækkert æg, flere forskellige slags brød, morgenmadsprodukter, yoghurt, havregrød, frugt og ikke mindst bag-selv vafler.

title: Lovely mid range hotel
text: Would recommend - good location, good breakfast and helpful staff  Easy location to get about New York and taxis pass by right outside hotel  Rooms are of a good standard but are a little small for 2 people and luggage but are clean and well cared forf  Breakfast choice is excellent

title: great location
text: hotel staff very helpful and friendly.  Clean rooms, great location, able to walk to most attractions, good hot breakfast, TV only worked part of the time, comfortable beds, coffee pot and hair dryers in rooms.

title: Com certeza voltarei
text: Adorei esse hotel e como sempre viajo a negócios para esse lugar, com certeza irei me hospedar novamente, pois fomos muito bem tratados e ficamos muito satisfeitos. Alem na facilidade de estar bem perto de principais pontos. Otima localização. Excelente atendimento.

title: VERY PLEASE
text: First time in New York, on our 10 year Wedding Anniversary. They upgraded our room and gave us bottle of wine.  Have stayed in nicer hotels, but considering the location and age of the building, overall very pleased.  W

title: Staff here are amazing!
text:
Gracious staff who are helpful, gracious and made my week here very special.
Had a corner room not on an ice machine floor and asked to have no view to be quiet.
Breakfast is included and quite substantial.  Great location and makes for easy walks to major sights. Will return as this was the  most reasonable hotel to stay in with the current Canadian dollar!

title: My Hampton on 35th Street
text: The location of the hotel is ideal if you wish to take the subway to visit attractions. Want to shop at Macy's just steps to Herald Square. It was easy to walk to Times Square. The staff was very pleasant and eager to assist with our family needs. Loved the hotel and hope to return soon.

title: Only use if you have 20 plus minute to get to room, don't need dependable internet
text: Okay hotel in good location, but only two elevators for over 20 floors. One was out of order. Took 22 minutes to get to room one time. Ended going up and down 10 floors of steps several times. Internet was intermittent. One bar most of the time. took over 30 minutes to download day's emails. got message in another city that my room would be cancelled if I didn't contact the hotel by 6 PM because my credit card was rejected. When attempted several calls to the hotel, couldn't get a person (tried many lines). finally got them and they said all fine. When got to the hotel, told me they accidently called me versus other person with same first name. Limited fitness center in basement. Must walk service steps.

title: Outstanding Stay
text: In a city where there are 3-6 hotels on every block in the midtown district, Hamption Inn- Empire State Building exceeded all expectations in service, accommodations, price, quality, and overall stay.  We will definitely stay again at this hotel.

title: Location is not everything
text: We stayed for 5 nights. Room was not made up until late (4:00-5:00) in the day, one day we skipped having it cleaned as we were trying to get ready for dinner.   There were problems with the water and had to go without showers two different days.

title: Great location
text: We stay at a lot of Hampton Inns and are always pleased with the service. Love the cookies that great you at the front desk. Came in a little late one night and the cookies were gone. Half an hour after getting to our room, knock knock, fresh hot 🍪 cookies..

title: Great Hotel, Friendly & Accommodating Staff, Clean Facility & Excellent Location
text: We spent 4 days in NYC just to learn about the city and its history doing numerous tours from Central Park to 9/11 Memorial. We walked back & forth to Central Park, road the subway uptown/downtown, took taxis, buses, the whole 9 yards.  Having a hotel in the center of Manhatten, 100 steps from the subway, made travel times feel minimal.  Our hotel room was exceptionally clean---a  "win-win" for me who is very particular about cleanliness.  The staff was always friendly, helpful and accomodating.....day or night.  We had a problem with guests next to us (part of a larger group with other nearby rooms) and had the "Party room" didn't realize their voices carried and the constant closing of the hotel door sounded more like banging at 2:00 am.  We called the front desk and within minutes, it was quiet. We found out in the morning, we weren't the only ones who called, but the point is, they dealt with the problem immediately and we were VERY Happy.  Our only recommendation for this hotel is to have more cookies in the evening for people.  They run out fast and that's it.  No more cookies (although we did get lucky and the evening manager made some for us and brought them up.  Delicious and VERY much appreciated for us older folk who like a cookie before bedtime.  If, and when we return for more sightseeing of NYC, we'll go here first, no doubt!

title: ESPERO VOLVER
text: Hotel con muy buena ubicación . Las habitaciones están estupendas. Y lo mejor es el personal. En todo momento pendientes de cada huésped, el trato es bastante personalizado. Completamente aconsejable. Espero volver al mismo hotel en mi siguiente viaje a Nueva York

title: Fantastic vacation
text: Great place in optimal location, friendly and helpful staff . Within walking distance from major attractions, adequate rooms, very clean good breakfast, great concierge service, very close to metro and endless restaurant options

title: Skvělé
text: Byl jsem zde v září 2017 a nemohu si stěžovat. Hotel je kousek od Times Square, Empiru, Central parku apod. Snídaně jsou zde vynikající, personál moc ochotný a vstřícný a pokoj vám každé ráno vzorně úklidí. Mohu vřele doporučit.

title: Great Location!
text: Close to EVERYTHING!   Subway just down the street (which gives you access to the ENTIRE city!) Walking distance to the Empire State Building (only 1 block)! Room a little small, but it is Lower Manhattan, but clean & quiet! Staff was very helpful in helping us to get where we were going!

title: Excelente Ubicacion - Amabilidad - Limpieza
text: Todo bien, buena ubicación. Excelente relación precio calidad. Muy amables en recepción. Hector preocupado y atento en dar información y recibir correspondencia. Muy limpio, habitaciones buen tamaño. El ascensor un poco lento en las mañanas, recomiendo pedir pisos bajos por si en momentos uno prefiere bajar caminando. (Creo que en 6 días solo fue necesario una vez)

title: Nice trip in New York
text: We enjoyed being up near Time Square but not in it.   Close to Penn station was great. A very helpful, friendly staff. Breakfasts were alright.   The room was clean but lacked hooks in the bathroom and there was not a lot of space for two suitcases.

title: Cruise Trip
text: The price was too high even for New York. We have stayed at Hampton Inn's in Wyoming and other states out west and the price there was less than $100 per night. I am a Hilton Honors member that is why I chose Hampton for this trip.

title: Comfortable, clean and great location
text:
If you like Hampton Inn's this one will meet your expectation.  If is clean, staff was great, they had the typical Hampton free breakfast.  Beds were very comfortable.  My only complaint is the free wifi was very slow at times.  Even at 5AM it was slow, and I am doing emails and checking company websites to book travel and do expenses.  
This hotel is also in a great location.

title: GENIAL.
text:
Un Hotel, con una ubicación excelente. El personal muy atento y dispuestos a colaborar.

Muy limpio y rodeados de sitios de interes. tiendas. cafes, restaurante y mucho más.

Me encantó el desayuno , el cafe, chocolate y referscos todo el día.

title: Convenient, quiet and clean hotel in the heart of Manhattan
text:
Stayed here for three nights while vacationing in NYC and it was all up to Hilton standards -- the room was immaculate, great bed, friendly staff and the best hotel hair dryer I've used in a long time (two heat settings + cool shot + a concentrator attachment). 

Before arriving, I was concerned that it might be noisy due to its location in a very congested/dense area, but we never heard a thing. Front desk staff were very helpful and free breakfast saves you a lot in Manhattan. (Note: there was a fruit cart set up outside the hotel during the day with really good fresh fruit = an alternative to buying fattening snacks.)

Would certainly stay here again!

title: Bom custo - benefício
text:
Muito bom para quem deseja conhecer Manhattan. O hotel é simples, o quarto pequeno, no entanto, o preço é bom e a localização excelente. Ao lado de uma estação de metrô, ao lado da quinta avenida. Do hotel pode-se ver o Empire States Building. A Macys está muito próxima e muitos restaurantes na região.
O café da manhã é bom, com aquelas variedades de comida que os americanos adoram (ovos, linguiças, waffles geléias...), mas também há fruta, cereais e iogurtes. Todos os pratos e copos são descartáveis e os atendentes são atenciosos.
O quarto é limpo, oferecem ótimas amenidades de banheiro da neutrogena e há secador de cabelo, simples mas que funciona. Não há frigobar...
À tarde há café no refeitório e também suco e água.
A concierge agenda alguns programas que desejam fazer (compramos ingressos para espetáculo na Brodway por lá).
Vale a pena pelo que se paga.

title: Awesome Service
text: Perfect location for NYC trip. Short connection via Penn Station to airports. And Macy’s and time square quite next. Real good service, especially from Annabella for breakfast. Good overall Hampton quality

title: Excellent location.....
text:
We have just done 2 x 3 night stays here having room 801 and 601. Really easy to find from Penn Street Station,less than a 10 minute walk. Check in very easy, room seemed dark when walked in but had plenty of space. Bathroom was shower only (no bath) but clean and functional.
Breakfast was simply lovely, make you own waffles, cereal, yoghurts, bagels, bread muffins etc and also a small selection of hot food too. Tea/coffee available all day and a cold drink dispenser available all day too in the breakfast area.
Will definately stay here again and reccommend it to anyone who wants a convenient hotel to all the sights in NYC. Some lovely pubs on the same street for food as well.
A 'thank you' to the staff for letting us store our bags there overnight when we went to Washington-a great help.

title: Great location
text: Great location, great reception staff, very comfortable bed, adequate complementary wi-fi, room a little on the small side but impeccably clean.  Be prepared to be held up waiting on the elevators as the maintenance/cleaning staff seem to use them as their social hub. Can't make any comment on breakfast as never are there.

title: Ok but not great
text: We stayed 2 nights. Location was good, staff was nice, but hotel was just “ok.” Rooms were small and run down. I had to kick the closet door for it to close. We stay at Hampton’s a lot and this was definitely a step below what we are used to. For 295.00 a night, I would definitely recommend somewhere else for the $.

title: Five nights stay in June
text:
Booked an Empire State room
1. Lovely lovely staff
2. Great room , whilst not huge it was certainly bigger than the two separate occasions I've stayed at the New Yorker whose rooms were tiny
3. I loved the location , so near everything ... Bryant Park, Empire State, Macy's, etc etc
4. Brekkie was actually ok. Waffles to die for , but it can get a tad busy, I feel they cope very well though, the gentleman on duty gave the kids sweets thankyou! 
5. Complimentary tea and coffee at reception. Such a small thing but we loved this. After being out all day we grabbed donuts and then a Wee cup of tea before retiring to the room. 
The only one negative ( but it wouldn't stop me going back ) is the amount of rubbish on this street , and sadly we saw a few homeless people out our window which saddens me but I suppose this happens everywhere. Never the less our third trip to nyc from Scotland and not our last

title: Nice family stay
text: We arrived well before check in time but the hotel could accommodate us without waiting. The location is superb for arrival and departure on public transport as well as for walking the city. Roos are on the small side, but hey, it's Manhattan. Nice and clean and comfortable beds and not to noisy on the 18th floor. Liked the view of ESB from the room. All in all a hotel that delivers what it says it will. The price was on the high side at $345 per night, but compared to other options not excessive. Would stay here again, mainly for the location.

title: The Bee's Knees
text: This place is great. The location is perfect and the subway is on the block. You're at Times Square in a 3 min walk. The staff is the best I've ever seen. Stay here!!  Check out the Korean joints next door and the bakery around the corner.

title: Short, weekend stay
text: Nice hotel; great location. Close to all major mid-town attractions. Madison Square Garden, Empire State Building, subway, Times Square and tour bus stops are all within 1- 7 blocks or 10 - 15 min walk.

title: Hampton Hoel, Midtown Manhattan (near Empire State Bldg) deserves your consideration!
text: Gr8 location, close to shops/Times Square/subway & buses. Very reasonable nightly rates;. Includes hot breakfast (daily)...delicious! Comfortable room; gr8 bathroom. Wonderful staff! We will return to this Hampton Hotel--it met all our needs. Other guests came from all over US & abroad.  Everyone friendly; most guests speak English.  Very family-oriented. Be sure to notice Hampton's paper (coffee) cups--they are adorable. Bed very comfortable; a/c worked well. Bathroom very functional & attractive.

title: Gran estadía, excelente ubicación
text: Estuve 10 días con mi padre en el hotel, y la experiencia fue muy buena. La habitación muy cómoda, el baño grande, siempre limpio, cero ruido a la noche lo cual era ideal para el descanso luego de caminar tanto por la ciudad. En el desayuno había una gran variedad de opciones, Antonia y Luis siempre estuvieron para ayudar a arrancar el día de la mejor manera. El hotel cuenta con wifi de buena conexión, y está en una ubicación donde uno puede recorrer puntos importantes de la ciudad caminando. Recomendable.

title: Not my usual hotel
text:
Stayed at the Hampton inn Empire instead of my usual hotel and I have to say that it was a pleasant surprise. Although the room itself is small, the king size bed was really comfortable, the bathroom was big enough that you could actually turn around in it (not to mention a great shower),the room and the hotel were very clean, and the staff very accommodating.
Plenty of room in the breakfast area so you didn't feel cramped or difficult to find a place to sit. 
Only reason this was not a 5 was because the room itself is a little small.

title: Not what we expected. Way better.
text: We frequently stay at the Hilton Garden Inn next door on weekend trips to NY. Couldn't get a double room so we booked the Hampton Inn. Lobby was underwhelming so we were a little concerned. Guy was on the phone with what seemed to be a problem, even more concerned. But then Hector looked up and smiled and greeted us and everything was ok. He was the friendliest guy. It turned out the entire staff was equally friendly. Our TV didn't work someone was there instantly. We needed a towel. Again almost instantly. Breakfast was replenished constantly and great attendants took good care of everything. This is an extremely well managed hotel. This staff is one of the best we have encountered in a very long time. The rooms were actually larger and more comfortable than the HIlton Garden Inn next door. Aaron, Maria, and Grisell all stood out for various reasons. Aaron arranged our late check out with a big smile, Maria took care of our TV problem and Grisell helped us retrieve our bags later in the day after we had checked out and gave us the key to a very nice bathroom to freshen up in before our trip home. All in all this hotel exceed our expectations in every way. Who ever runs this hotel, congratulations for assembling, training and managing a world class staff. Job well done. We will be back!

title: Great location, competent staff, a bit hidden
text: Second time we've stayed in this hotel.  Front office staff are thoroughly competent, and will do many things to make you feel comfortable.  Hotel is a short walk from Penn Station (and thus from Madison Square Garden) as well as close to Macy's and the Empire State Building.  A short half block from several of the NYC subway stations serving the west side of Manhattan.  The only real issue is that the building is set back from the street, and is partially hidden by a Hilton Garden Inn.  Rooms are small, but you are just using them to sleep in.

title: Great Location and Great Service!
text: The location of this property is exceptional in our opinion.   Away from the hectic life of Times Square, yet close enough to walk to easily.   We used the nearby resources to enhance our stay, shopping at Macys and others, Madison Square Garden, Whole Foods to gather food for nearly picnic at Bryant Park, to the Theatre and Times Square...all of this within an easy 15 minute city walk was what we valued the most!   There was even a deli, atm, liquor store, drug store and street cart within 4 minutes from our hotel door!  Rooms are small, elevator is busy in the morning, but breakfast room is large and has good choices!   This is our new "go to" place for a weekend in New York!

title: Nice
text:
We were attracted to this hotel (after staying in some others of the same category), due to the price. It includes breakfast, the location is very convenient, and we were not looking for something fancy. It fulfilled those expectations, plus the staff was very friendly, they helped us with the transportation to the airport (better price on a limo than super shuttle for 2 people or more)
The thing was that we got there late at night and the room we were assigned was dirty, the carpet even had food. We complained the following morning and they cleaned better on that day... so good experience overall, but average.

title: excelente servicio
text: La atención y el servicio que prestan en el hotel es muy recomendable. El personal es sumamente amable y lo hacen sentir a uno como en su propia casa. La ubicación es ideal porque están en el medio de la ciudad, cerca de todo.

title: Good One Night Stay at the Hampton Inn
text: Our family of 3 stayed 1 night pre-cruise at the Hampton Inn Manhattan-35th Street/Empire State Building in early September 2017.  We booked at this Hampton Inn due to the low rate and good reviews on TripAdvisor.  The location is great – by Macy’s and lots of other shopping.  We found a small Asian restaurant within walking distance called Main Noodle House where we had dinner.  The checkin and checkout process was smooth.  The staff were friendly and gave us 3 bottled waters for being Hilton Honors members.  We had a room with 2 double beds.  The room was a bit small for 3 people but we made it worked.  There is no fridge or microwave.  Please note the double beds were small compared to other double beds we had in the past.  My son had 1 double bed to himself and he rolled off the bed during the night.  Definitely a tight squeeze for two people in a double bed.  Delicious complimentary hot/cold breakfast (eggs, hashbrowns, sausage, waffles, toast, yogurt, fruit) in the morning which made for a great start to the day.  We had an issue with the safe as the last guests had it opened but in the lock position so we couldn’t close it.  We phoned the front desk to report it and a maintenance person came up within 5 minutes to fix it.  The only other thing that came to mind is in the bathroom there is no towel bar to hang the hand towels.  They have a hook behind the door and near the shower but nothing else.  They can easily put another towel bar in front of the sink area to hang a towel for drying hands.  All in all enjoyed our 1 night stay at this Hampton Inn but if staying longer you might be more comfortable in larger accommodations.

title: hotel très bien situé
text:
nous avons séjourné dans cette hotel du 27aout au 1septembre 2017. l'hotel est propre , le personnel est sympa.
il est au cœur des sites touristiques de ny. le réseau ferroviaire est juste à côté de l'hotel ainsi que les arrêts de bus (qui est plus facile à prendre que le train). le petit déjeuner est très bien ainsi que le gardiennage des bagages le jour de votre départ si vous en avez besoin. l'hotel donne des bouteilles d'eau gratuitement (sinon épicerie à côté 3 petites bouteilles d'eau 9dolars) t, il y a une machine à boissons et à glaçons au 2è étage. par contre il y a peu de chambre avec la vue sur l'empire state qui n 'est pas loin à pied. visiter ny c'est super, mais les taxes et les tips sont plus couteux que dans d'autres états. les new yorkais sont acceuillants. pour les  attractions je trouve que l'explorer pass est plus facile d'utilisation que le sightseeing flex pass. les transports en communs ne sont pas gratuits pour les enfants en dessous de 10ans environ... je n'est pas trouvé que les prix étaient interssants au century 21 ou dans d'autres magasins (les taxes à rajoutés), il y a de meilleurs affaires à faire dans les outlets en dehors de la ville (mais je n'ai pas eu le temps de faire celui de ny).  nous avons pris le vol ua 54 et 55 et cet avion n'est pas de première jeunesse , c'est pas terrible ainsi que la nourriture dans l'avion...

title: otima localização
text: localização é muito boa, cafe da manha boa, ruim é nao tem geladeira no quarto, e so tem 2 elevadores,  demora muito para chegar. sempre tem cafe e suco gelado na entrada de hotel e as aguas sao gratis, só pedir na recepção.

title: Three Night Stay
text: I booked three rooms at the Hampton Inn for the end of our trip to California and Arizona. We were not disappointed. Staff were friendly, rooms were clean and the hotel was centrally located with views from our rooms of the Empire State Building. I cannot fault this hotel and as an added bonus there is a complimentary breakfast which set you up for the sightseeing and the day ahead. Very reasonable cost also.

title: Happy to stay here again
text: Very friendly staff at reception, we were acknowledged each time we walked by. Plenty of breakfast options, the staff at breakfast were happy and helpful. We asked for a lower level room and were given one on the 2nd floor, much appreciated. The room was clean and comfortable. The location is great.

title: Nice place to stay in Manhattan!
text: Recommend due to helpfulness of hotel staff and location.  Breakfast food was ok and the dining area was crowded.  Subway station at the end of the block was awesome.  Comfortable bed and clean bathroom.

title: Perfect trip!
text: When I walked in, I was immediately greeted and welcomed, check in was effortless and was in my room in less than 5 minutes.  The room was clean and I had a great view of the Empire State Building!  Each morning at breakfast, there were plenty of clean tables to eat at and the breakfast buffet had a really good selection of items to eat.  The breakfast attendant was very friendly and helpful!  Each time I walked through the lobby, the staff also looked up and said hello.  On checkout day, it took about 2 minutes to check out and I was on my way.  The location is perfect, one block from the Empire State Building, only about 9 blocks from Grand Central Station, only about 8 blocks from Times Square.  You can catch the 4,5,6 and 7 trains from Grand Central and you are close to the 1,2 and 3 trains and you can get just about anywhere in the city with these trains.  Perfect location and next time I am in the city, I will stay at this Hampton Inn again!

title: Perfect Location
text: You can't beat the location.  Checked in at 11.30 am and the room was ready which was a bonus.  Very clean room and very comfy beds and pillows.  Great breakfast with a great choice.  All staff we met were very friendly and helpful would definitely stay here again.

title: I love this place!
text: Outstanding... if you're in New York.. or somewhere near.. make sure you go! The views are as amazing at night as they are through the day! And pay the extra to go to the 106th floor! Dont bottle it and stay at 84!!

title: Hotel cómodo y bien ubicado
text:
Se trata de una opción muy recomendable. Aunque el vestíbulo es pequeño y bullicioso, la atención del personal es excelente. 
La ubicación es ideal para mí, ya que está a minutos de Penn Station y del Empire State, con buenas combinaciones de subway. . 
El desayuno buffet es bueno, podría mejorar en variedad, pero en comparación con otros hoteles que directamente no lo ofrecen, cubre las expectativas. El lugar destinado al desayuno es un pequeño y no es cómodo, pero también es una situación que se repite en otros hoteles.
La habitación muy buena y con detalles de calidad, con buen acceso wifi. Hay que aclarar que las habitaciones tienen poca luz natural (quizás alguna que dé al frente vaya mejor), algo que sucede en general en Manhattan debido a la cercanía de muchos edificios altos.

title: Sumamente recomendable
text: Me hospedé con mi familia por 2da vez y no me defraudó en nada. El personal es excelente, sobre todo Luis y Antonia que sirven el desayuno. Debo agregar además que cuenta con una ubicación ideal, a la vuelta del Empire State.

title: Great location
text: Wanted a hotel close to the subway and Penn Station.  Couldn't ask for better location, great view of Empire State Building from room.  Staff was friendly, dropped bags off before check in without issue.  Room is on the small side but hey your in Manhattan so it's kind of expected.  Breakfast was typical Hampton, no complaints other than breakfast wasn't ready on Sun until 6:30-6:45 with a posted start of 6am.  If your walking to the hotel from 6th ave you could walk right past the entrance, it's on the wall facing 5th ave and in small print on the covered walkway.  Look for the Hilton Garden Inn,  the Hamton is right next to it.

title: Nice place to Stay
text: This was our second stay at this hotel.  There was a little wait to get checked in.  Then the room was very nice... Wish we had of had a reading chair in our room... but probably not put in since rooms are New York small.  We were pleased with cleanliness and quietness this time.   Elevators take a while to use.. So many people and can be crowded... Breakfasts were nice but need more space in eathing area. Staff very friendly!!! Thank you!

title: Small and old building
text:
Pro: close to downtown, next to subways, Free breakfast, safe in rooms.

Con: worn and old building, breakfast juices are watered down, more of flavored water than juice, ice Machine has no water filters so tastes like tap water,

title: Niet twijfelen, reserveren!
text: Pluspunten: Strategische ligging, mooie kamers, goede bedden, netjes, héél vriendelijk personeel, goede service, en uitgebreid ontbijt voor Amerikaanse normen. Prijs kwaliteit een topper! Minpunten: Lawaai van de straat, trage lift. Deze 2 minpunten wegen niet op tegenover de voordelen.

title: New York New York
text:
My Brother and I were in New York for a six day break in May 2017. We had a Wonderful warm welcome from the staff and enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The staff on reception are so helpful and friendly nothing is too much trouble from giving information to posting post cards, 

Rooms are beautiful, beds are very comfortable, cleaning staff are out standing and hard working and it shows. 

I just loved it that though out day there was always Tea and Coffee available in the lounge, as well as in our room.  I'm always dying for a cup of Tea, so this made my time heaven. 

My brother and I shared a double room that had two king size beds, Tv and radio alarm clock. Very good shower room with various shampoos, really good hair conditioner,  body wash and lovely thick soft towels.

Breakfast is good with lots of choice.

We had a lovely stay here and it was to easy to access all of New York Sub Way station five mins and MACY'S was just over the street.  We would stay at the hotel again.

title: Buen hotel
text: La ubicación para nosotros es impecable, cerca de todo, pero no en el caos! Elegí este hotel porque además ofrece desayuno, básico, pero viene muy bien salir ya desayunados. La atención es buena, aunque no esperen que carguen sus valijas. El check in era a las 15 hs, llegamos a las 12 hs y nos guardaron las mismas hasta la hora del check in. Reciben paquetes de compras, eso es muy bueno también, No tiene frigobar en la habitación, pero justo en nuestro piso (el 18) había hielo y agua, además de una expendedora de bebidas. Realmente en el piso 18 no escuchábamos ningún ruido. En la habitación habia plancha y tabla de planchar, cafetera. El hotel dispone de agua fria y café en el hall todo el día. El único reclamo es que en 9 noches, no nos cambiaron las sábanas, cosa que me parece que no está bueno.

title: NO CITY VIEW...TOO SMALL
text: If you have claustrophobia, do not stay in this room/Hampton.  The staff is fabulous!  Location of hotel is in the heart of Manhattan.  The bed was comfortable.  Breakfast is ok.  Overall I stay at Hampton Inn in other parts of the country, I would NOT stay at this one again.

title: Very nice place
text: Was nothing remarkable however, was very nice for the price. the breakfast was good and it was in a GREAT location to walk to the majority of sights. The only negative is there was limited seating in the breakfast area and the garbage cans very constantly full.

title: Viaje Nyc compra muestras
text:
Hotel con EXCELENTE UBICACION a 1 cuadra de Macy's 
Las piezas de buen tamaño y limpias
No tienen frigobar pero se puede pedir un mini refrigerador a la habitacion
Lo unico malo es que los ascensores de uso a los pasajeros, tambien los usan para bajar la basura, contenedores de lavanderia y se hace incomodo a las horas peak ya q no hay otros as ascensores de servicios
Desayuno incluido bastante bien con maquinas de autoservicio
Lo mejor la ubicacion y el razonable tamano de las piezas

title: Ottimo hotel!
text: Ottima soluzione.  Hotel non è grande ma pulito e dotato di tutti i confort e sopratutto in posizione centrale e strategica...al centro di manhattan. Wi-Fi gratuita e ottima colazione a buffet molto varia inclusa lo rendono una soluzione ancor più valida. Camere non grandissime ma pulite e in stile hilton. C'è anche la palestra per chi volesse...in conclusione un ottima soluzione a Manhattan!

title: Dropping my son off at college
text: I have been coming to NY for years and I most always stay here. The employees are always so nice. Shaun the bartender has been here for as long as I've been coming. Its always nice to be welcomed back by a familiar face. This trip I had the pleasure to meet Tameika she worked a double and checked me in the previous day. She went above and beyond to accommodate me and my son. I will definitely be back to NY often since my son is going to school here and look forward to staying at the Hilton Garden Inn on my visits.

title: Hotel
text:
Ubicado a una cuadra del empire state y macys
Muy cerca de todo
En la esquina está el metro que te lleva a todos lados
Demasiada gente y moviendo
Cuartos pequeños
Desayuno bien
No tiene laundry 
Para una primera visita es buena la ubicación pero demasiado céntrico si ñ

title: New York City
text: Great hotel and location for this hotel.  The breakfast was very well done and the staff is very friendly. The room was a little small but very equipped with essentials.  It was very clean and affordable.

title: Super recomendable
text: El hotel cuenta con una gran ubicación, para andar caminando por midtown de manera perfecta. Eramos dos personas y la habitación hiper cómoda, con buena limpieza. El desayuno super completo. Sin duda recomendable!

title: Excellent option in NYC
text: The location is perfect. There is a metro station a few meters from the hotel door. The reception personnel is excellent and the breakfast is great with a lot of option. As the hotel is always crowded, avoid to grab you breakfast too late, as you can need to wait a couple of minutes for a empty table. Good rooms and facilities. No complains.

title: Excellent sejour
text:
Séjour excellent.
Chambre très bien. Il manque un peu de rangement.
Petit déjeuner excellent varié les gaufres sont délicieuses. 
Hôtel très bien placé. A deux pas de la 5 ème avenue de times square du métro et de l empire states building.
Personnel attentionné serviable.

title: Excellent location, friendly staff, great wifi & breakfast!
text:
I've stayed in this hotel on 5 occasions and will be returning for a 6th stay in early 2018.

The staff are courteous, knowledgeable and always friendly.

Rooms are a nice size, not huge but sufficient for 2 people.Bedding is very comfortable, the King beds are HUGE! 

Wifi is strong, reliable and complimentary. 

Tea/Coffee/Hot Chocolate 24 hours a day which is a lovely thing to come back to after a long day of shopping & sightseeing. Breakfast is excellent & free! hot and cold items, lots of choice for kids to adults. 

Location couldn't be better, located between 5th & 6th Avenues and very close to subway (B/D/F/M lines)

If you are looking fro a cosy, clean and friendly hotel you can't go wrong! If you can get a room on a high floor facing W35th Street you will get a great view of the Empire State Building.

The only negative I can think of is the lift is slow and unfortunately on each stay one of the 2 lifts was often out of service.

title: Good location and good amenities.
text:
Spent 3 days here on vacation with my daughter. Close to subway, Very central location close to subway and Macy's Herald Square and walking distance to Empire State Building, Grand Central Station and several restaurants. Room was very clean with comfortable king size bed but very small. Everything worked well including complimentary
Wifi. Complimentary breakfast offered good quality and variety. Seating was a bit tight during peak hours 8-9. Front desk staff were pleasant and helpful.

title: Ottimo soggiorno nel centro di Manhattan
text: Siamo stati davvero bene. Ottime la pulizia e il comfort delle stanze e la posizione è strategica per visitare Manhattan. Dalla nostra finestra, che non era tra quelle con vista città, si vedeva l'empire state building che si trova nell'isolato di fronte. Il costo un po' alto ma nella media di NYC. La colazione era ottima anche grazie al bravissimo Mohammad che ci ha servito sempre in maniera eccellente con attenzione e cortesia. Se dovessi tornare a NYC, ci ritornerò sicuramente.

title: Mother - Daughter Annual Trip
text:
Excellent location to everywhere. Subway right outside the lobby door to your right. Right across 6th Avenue to Macys at Herald Square.
Friendly, professional and helpful staff. You get to meet people from all over the world. Delicious hot breakfast every morning. Home

title: Muy conforme
text: Hotel muy bien ubicado, limpio, muy buen desayuno, con amplio horario de servicio. Te guardan las maletas antes del checkin y despues del checkout, en forma gratuita.La recepcion es muy amable y bien dispuesta

title: Vale a pena
text:
Hotel  muito bom com ótimo café da manhã incluso e custo beneficio excelente!  Limpeza, cordialidade dos  funcionários e perto de tudo! 
Fomos em janeiro e após uma noite de neve ficou mais que perfeito!!

title: Melhor localização e café da manhã muito bom!
text: O localização é a melhor em NY e certamente o café da manhã é também é muito bom para os padrões americanos. Diferentemente dos demais, as coisas oferecidas café da manhã são de qualidade, alguns produtos conheci lá! Minha irmã adorava os donuts sempre frescos! O quarto é pequeno, como a maioria dos hotéis em NY, apesar disso voltaria sempre nele pois a última coisa que faço lá é ficar no quarto. Equipe muito prestativa do hotel e guardaram nossas malas sem problemas antes do check-in.

title: AMBIENTE FAMILIAR
text: Las camas son cómodas. El espacio para 4 personas es justo. El espacio en placares es escaso. Habitaciones limpias y silenciosas. El personal del Hotel es muy amable y bien dispuesto. La mayoría habla español y constituyen una gran ayuda para los turistas latinos. Son eficientes y discretos. Menciono en particular a Héctor, Aaron y María del Front Desk. También a Luis y Antonia, que se encargan de que el desayuno se sirva siempre eficientemente y no falte nada, y que siempre tienen un comentario amable o consejo para los turistas que los consultan. El desayuno es bueno y la ubicación del Hotel es excelente, cerca de todo.

title: Pleasant stay
text: This is the third time I have returned to this hotel because of its location and friendly staff.  The complimentary breakfast is a bonus and the beds are extremely comfortable.  Internet was also very efficient.

title: Excellent
text:
We have just returned from Hampton Inn, Manhattan.
Very clean hotel, great and friendly staff. Special thanks to Maria and Aaron, nothing is too much trouble.
Complimentary breakfast excellent. Self service buffet with good selection.
Rooms nice with comfortable beds and good nights sleep.
I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a relaxing base with fantastic staff and location.

title: Excelente alternativa
text: Muy bien ubicado, excelente servicio, habitaciones cómodas, muy cerca al subway o bus. Excelente servicio de Grisel y Maria así como Antonia. Cerca de Macys, Gap, Victoria Secrets, Broadway. Cerca al Empire State

title: Great stay in NYC!
text: The location of this property is a great spot in NYC, convenient to everything. The hotel was clean, and the rooms were great. While the room size may seem small to some, this is NYC, for the most part, all rooms in the city are small, so no complaints here! The staff was great, from checking in to checking out and anything we needed in between. This has definitely become our choice of hotels for the NYC visits.

title: Always a solid stay
text: We stat at this facility because it always offers a solid predictable stay. It is close to the train station and once in the city close to the subways and a short walk (for us) to 5th Ave, theater district, Central Park and most of the main points of interest uptown

title: Great location, small rooms
text:
I was staying for business, so location didn't really matter but as a point it is close to Herald Square, Times Square, Lord & Taylor, etc so that's a definite plus in general!  

Very traditional hotel, with small rooms and lobby.  Gentleman at front desk was great--a lot of people were clamoring around him asking questions; and he remained calm and extremely friendly while helping everyone.

title: Great location
text: Hotel is in a great location (close to MSG and subway). However, one of our rooms was not ready by the 3 PM check in time which is unacceptable. Another room on a separate floor was made available after a 20 minute wait.

title: Right in the thick of things
text: This is the second time we've stayed at this hotel.  It's within easy walking distance from Penn Station, Time Square, the Empire State building, and so many other attractions. The Korean restaurant next door is one of the many wonderful eating places that are nearby.  The staff are very welcoming and the breakfast is outstanding.  Can't wait to stay here again.

title: Cobraram a estadia em duplicata!
text: Cobraram a estadia no meu cartão (valor superior ao da reserva) e no cartão da minha esposa ( o valor da reserva), mandei dois e-mails e ainda não responderam/resolveram. Atrasaram para entregar o quarto no check-inn.

title: MUY BUENA SITUACION Y MUY AGRADABLE
text: El hotel ofrece un trato muy agradable y una excelente situación en NYC. El personal es realmente amable y hacen la estancia realmente agradable. El desayuno es muy correcto y tiene el comedor abierto 24H para tomar un café o un zumo.

title: Hampton Inn Manhattan 35th Empire State bld
text: Прекрасный отель с удобным расположением в центре города в одной минуте от ближайшей станции метро и дружелюбным, отзывчивым персоналом. Отдельного внимания заслуживает завтрак, оправдавший все ожидания.

title: Missed on many points!
text: Problems with directions to parking (the front desk help didn't remember streets are closed on Sunday and 4 calls to the hotel went UNANSWERED while I was sitting in the wrong parking facility), water pressure in room, lack of towels.  Location is excellent so we powered thru it.  Not my best Hampton Inn experience.

title: Toller Startplatz mitten in Manhattan
text:
Tolles Hotel in Toplage, die Subway mit 8Linien (Station Herold Square) ist vom Hoteleingang in weniger als 2Minuten ztu erreichen und somit liegt dir NY zu Füssen.
Die Zimmer sind okay, das Personal freundlich und das es hinter der Lobby zu jederzeit Gratis Kaffee gibt ist auch nicht schlecht.
Wenn ich gerade bei Kaffee bin, frühstücken ist so eine Sache.
Der Frühstücksbereich ist sehr klein und ab 08:00 ist ein Sitzplatz eher Glückssache ;--)
Aber wer braucht in NY Frühstück im Hotel, es gibt gleich ausserhalb des Hotels jede Menge Möglichkeiten dazu.

title: Great Stay
text: This Hampton Inn is positioned in a great spot, just a few blocks from Times Square, if driving in, use the parking garage on the same street, easy access to the hotel, although parking is a bit pricy but again this is NY. Staff very friendly and helpful. Rooms clean and fresh. Breakfast is included and decent compared to other hotels. This hotel is a good place to bring family, rates are reasonable.

title: Уютный отель в центре Нью-Йорка.
text:
Выбирали недорогой отель на Манхеттене. Этот отель полностью себя оправдал, т.к. В цену входит бесплатный wifi и завтрак!
Расположен в самом центре, рядом с метро. Все рядом, вокруг много ресторанов (правда большинство азиатских).  
В отеле есть спортзал, уголок с компьютерами и принтером, консьерж-сервис. На завтраке есть горячее, вафли, фрукты, можно взять кофе с собой.
Двухместный номер нормальных размеров, есть сейф, утюг, кофе-машина, фен и косметические принадлежности. Нет минибара, что минус( ещё наш номер находился рядом с автоматом со льдом, поэтому там часто был народ, которого было слышно.
Вообще отель очень хороший, советуем.

title: Nice, comfortable hotel
text: best location, walk able distance from times square, Empire state building. Lots of eating and shopping options around the hotel.  Hotel room is small but very clean and cozy. bed is comfortable and pillows are comfy. washroom clean & well stocked.

title: Enjoyed our weekend!
text: Breakfast was quite good. Each breakfast offered the basics and something new.  It was nice to not have the same items each day.  Also, was kept stocked. Staff very friendly and always greeted you when you came in.  It was like they knew you.

title: Park and Stay
text:
If you have a car then "park and stay" rate from hilton is the best in manhattan. I had thr priviledge of free in/out of tte car which costs $47 each time. 
Hot breakfast is awesome and hotel location is within 5 minutes walking from everything.

title: Excelente. Recomendable
text:
Ideal para lo que fuimos: pasear todo el día. La ubicación es inmejorable, cerca de todo. El precio está muy bien (incluye desayuno bastante variado). La atención de los empleados es excelente. Fuimos a habitación con dos camas queen para nosotros cuatro (matrimonio + 2 hijos adolescentes). Lo suficiente para descansar y levantarse temprano para salir!

El wifi de buena velocidad. Café/té y jugos disponibles a cualquier hora. Agua gratis en botellitas a pedido. 

Atención con el desayuno: por momentos hay más gente que mesas disponibles. Lo ideal es ir temprano.

title: Double charges our trip
text: Recently, we stay at the hotel for two nights on July 16 to July 18. Although the room is small, we do not have any issue with its size and cleanliness. We booked our trip through Priceline and prepaid for the hotel. However, when we checked out, the staff also charged us again. We were busy to catch our flight therefore we decided to contact the hotel after our trip and it has been a very bad experience ever since. I have talked to Ashley (manager), Hector (supervisor), Yonsi, Aaron for at least 7 times but the matter has not resolved. They can see on the system on the double charges but each time I called they would give me a different explanation such as the Priceline master card didn't go through. Really??? Or they will refund right away but I didn't see refund or confirmation email.. It is very sad but they didn't follow with their commitment to refund us. At least three times, the staff (including Ashley) promised to call me back but I never receive any call from them. I have been a loyal Hilton member for at least 10 years. I always stay at Hilton property anytime I travel but I have never experienced anything like this. This is unacceptable! And I'm deeply disappointed about their services and commitment. This definitely WILL NOT BE THE HOTEL that I would stay when I visit New York next time. My next might be to call our credit card company and dispute this charge.

title: Ubicacion/Higiene/Comodidad
text: Excelente ubicación esta cerca de todas las tiendas, todo limpio lucia como nuevo, una cama super cómoda y sobre todo una excelente atención al cliente. Los mas importante me recibieron con una sonrisa.

title: Hampton Inn Manhattan
text: Great location, but getting unloaded is a challange.  Just park on the street and walk in. Rooms are small, but clean. Staff was excellant. Breakfast had a decent selection, but the area is small. Overall, a great stay and a great staff.

title: 자녀방문
text: 앰파이어스테이트와 코리안타운에서 100미터 시내중심이라 편리하다 무료조식이 그런대로 좋다.

title: The staff seemed always ready to help.
text: Picked this hotel because of Hilton Rewards program, price, complimentary breakfast, and location.  The hotel came through on all of those fronts.  The staff never made us feel like we asked too much. There were always refreshments available in the lobby area, and the ice water was much appreciated given the temperatures.  I would definitely recommend this hotel, especially for families.

title: Buona sistemazione, ma chiedete un piano alto.
text:
Il giudizio è nel complesso positivo. La posizione è ottima, fermata della metro praticamente di fronte, a un passo da Times Square.
Non è un hotel di lusso ovviamente, ma le camere sono pulite, ordinate e hanno tutto ciò che può servire per un soggiorno di qualche giorno. Nemmeno troppo piccole, noi siamo in 4.
I letti comodi, la biancheria pulita e di qualità.
La colazione inclusa nel prezzo è buona, niente di sorprendente ma accontenta sia gli amanti del dolce che del salato (solite scrambled eggs, omelettes, bacon, ecc). Carina la macchinetta per prepararsi i waffels sul momento, molto apprezzata dalle mie figlie adolescenti.
Unico "problema", che noi però essendo mattinieri non abbiamo avuto, può essere l'affollamento della sala colazioni dopo le 9, in quanto la sala è piccina e da quanto ho visto arrivando troppo tardi si rischia la coda. Noi abbiamo sempre fatto colazione tra le 7.30 e le 8.00 e non abbiamo mai avuto problemi, anzi era semivuota.

Unico neo per quanto riguarda la stanza era la sua collocazione. Piano basso, mi pare 2° o 3° e affaccio su un micro cortiletto, vista muri, e soprattutto con i motori dell'aria condizionata sotto. Conseguenza: un costante ronzio derivante dai motori. Ci si abitua...noi dopo un pò non lo sentivamo più, però se qualcuno avesse problemi di insonnia o semplicemente una particolare sensibilità ai rumori, beh, suggerisco di chiedere una sistemazione ad un piano più alto (non è un grattacielo comunque, mi pare abbia 12 piani in tutto) o quantomeno con affaccio sulla strada.
Poi NY è rumorosissima in ogni caso, anche soggiornando al 30 piano il rumore di sirene e traffico non sparisce mai....

Nel complesso non la migliore sistemazione che abbia avuto a NY, ma sicuramente per il rapporto qualità prezzo più che adeguata.

title: 7 jours à NYC début juillet 2017
text:
A 7 personnes: 4 adultes + ados
Hôtel très bien placé au cœur de New-York - Manhattan
Bouche de métro à 20 mètres
Empire States building devant ma fenêtre
Times Square à 15, 20 minutes à pieds
Personnel très sympathique
Petit déjeuner très bien: salé ou sucré avec gaufres, salade de fruits, laitage.
J'avais lu en réservant qu'il y avait à disposition muffins ou petits gâteaux à disposition tout au long de la journée. Cela n'a pas été le cas mais ce n'est pas bien grave :-). Citronnade ou orangeade fraîche à disposition par contre.
Chambre bien, propre, rien à dire
Bon choix d'hôtel

title: Close to Attractions in Manhattan
text:
I stay here frequently for work. The location is very convenient for both tourists and business travelers. Close to Fifth Avenue and the Empire State Building, anything you want to see in Manhattan is easily accessible on foot or by public transit.

The rooms are clean, but a little shabby and dated. They are also very small. Some of the furniture and fixtures in rooms I have stayed in are broken and damaged. The walls are sometimes gouged. Ask for a room on a high level floor to avoid noise from the street. The second and third floors can be a little noisy. It's New York City after all.

The staff is pleasant and helpful. Overall a budget friendly choice for NYC.

title: Excellent location, amazing views!
text: An easy walk to the Empire State Building, Macy's, Times Square, Broadway and more! Subway was right there, a huge variety of places to eat, we really couldn't have asked for anything more!  Staff was friendly and room was very clean.  We would definitely stay here again!

title: Perto de tudo
text:
Perto de tudo! Várias estações de metrô próximas. Dá para ir caminhando para a Times Square. Várias lojas maravilhosas próximas.
Quarto espaçoso, novo, confortável. Equipe muito cordial e educada! Vale o preço que se paga!

title: Good location
text: Good location and friendly and helpful staff made an extended family weekend vacation pleasant. Location is conveniently close to bus and train stations from Newark Airport. Particularly grateful for the Sunday morning 6am breakfast bag to-go for an early flight.

title: Exactly what I hoped for
text: I came on business with my spouse, and we enjoyed the location, the room, and the view. I had some complications with checking in and the staff (Nico?) was accommodating and friendly. The staff recognized us and greeted us as we entered and left. Breakfast was standard Hampton Inn fare, so it was easy to skip, I did like the light in the breakfast room and the fruit was fresh.

title: Nice stay
text: I habe no complaints whatsoever about this hotel. The front desk was very friendly, courteous and helpful. The rooms were clean, small but clean and comfortable. I do recall it being a bit noisy outside from the trash pickup.

title: Visiting
text: We traveled to The city for one night while in New York for business.  Our stay at the Hampton Inn was a pleasant surprise.  The front desk stay was extremely helpful and pleasant.  The rooms were a nice size even by New York standards.  The hotel was very clean and super convenient to Times Square, a mere 5 minute walk.  We walked to the Sugar Factory in the meat packing district and it took us maybe 20 minutes.  The hotel is centrally located, clean and has an amazing staff.  What more could you want!  I travel with my daughter a lot so it's nice to find a good family safe hotel that I know is clean and in a good area.  Thank You!

title: Très bonne situation
text: Le métro se trouve à 50 m de l'hôtel, parfait pour visiter New-York. Vous pouvez aller à pied dans de nombreux sites à visiter. L'hôtel est propre, petit déjeuner compris dans le prix, le personnel à votre écoute. Je le conseille vous ne serez pas déçu.

title: Very happy with the service
text: Well, first of all - the location is great. I was pretty happy with the breakfast, the room was nice and clean. The stuff was very helpful with several of our questions and requests. It's definitely a great option for the price.

title: bon hotel, personnel sympathique
text: J'aime bien la chaine Hamptonn Inn. Ce petit hotel est très bien situé pour se déplacer à pied et en métro, le personnel est très sympathique et professionnel. Je vous le recommande pour vos séjours à New York s

title: Service desk poor listener
text: See survey for comments. Was checked out prematurely- was promised points to resolve issue. Never go them. I will never visit this hotel again in my entire life. Front desk staff on shift just before or around 7am June 26th have poor listen

title: Sister's Yearly Weekend Trip 6/23-6/26/2017
text: 5 sisters from Ohio. We take a trip to NYC to shop until we drop every year. For the last several years we have stayed at the Hampton Inn - Empire on 35th St. Our stay was excellent. The staff is friendly and professional. Our rooms were clean and comfortable. This is a great location with easy access to the subway which is just a few feet out of the door. The cross street is 6th Ave-Avenue of the Americans and it's one block from Macy's at Herald Square.

title: Hôtel idéalement placé entre la 5eme et la 6eme. Station de métro 34 herald station à 50 mètres.
text: Chambre familiale au dernier étage (20 eme). Chambre propre. Personnel agréable.  Très bon petit déjeuner.  Petit bémol pour la taille des lits et le manque de rangement pour une chambre pour 4 (2 adultes et 2 enfants)

title: Great stay with breakfast too!
text: Hotel was located only a few blocks from Grand Central Station which was a great location in midtown. The hotel was very clean. They offered a satisfying breakfast included in room price with protein and not just carbohydrates. Price was very reasonable for NYC. Would stay again!

title: New York, New York
text: The best place to stay in NY! Perfect location, outstanding service, great breakfast and comfortable beds.  Would definitely stay here again.  Staff is very knowledgeable about the city itself, airports, transportation, etc.

title: Great location when visiting NYC
text: I chose this hotel because of the location and it was even better than I thought. Centrally located you can get anywhere in the city via subway in minutes. The free breakfast is nice. It saves time to grab a quick bite and some coffee before heading out. Rooms in the city are small but this one accommodated myself, my husband and our daughter just fine. Even though we were in a very busy part of the city, the room was so quiet.  I would most certainly stay at this Hampton Inn again and would recommend it to anyone else visiting the city.

title: 便利です。
text:
メトロで動き回るにも、夜のブロードウェイミュージカルにも便利な場所です。
ペンステーションからも歩ける距離です。
メイシーズもすぐ、ストレスなく動き回れます。
部屋は広くはありませんが、マンハッタンでこのクラスのホテルでは普通でしょう。
寝具はマリオットですから快適です。
掃除も行き届いています。
部屋からエンパイアステートビルが見えるのでリクエストしてみました。
部屋からどうにか見えました。もっと高層階ならもっと迫力あるビルが見えます。
お薦め出来る良いホテルです。

title: Great location!
text: Great breakfast! Fresh fruit was awesome! Great location! Clean! Comfortable beds. Subway close. Lots of sightseeing close by, within walking distance. Helpful staff. Great restaurants close by. A/C worked great!

title: Disorganized Hotel
text:
Recently stayed for 2 nights for business. I usually enjoy Hampton Inns when they are in a suburban location. This hotel however was an exception and was a disaster. 

The lobby is extremely small and crowded. On departing on Saturday it was literally filled with luggage and hard to navigate to the front doors from the elevator. The rooms were very loud. I had a maintenance closet next to my room and there was constant noise coming from within. The hotel is understaffed and there was a line-up of 6+ people waiting to check-in. Although I had pre-checked in via Hilton website none of my paperwork was complete. 

Worst part about this hotel is the elevators. There are two slow moving elevators and it can take 5+ minutes to get an elevator that is not filled to capacity. 

I would avoid if you have more than 1-2 people or are staying longer than 2 nights.

title: Perfect for our visit
text: We needed a centrally located Manhattan hotel for visiting our daughter and taking in some sites and nightlife in NYC.  Easy walk from Penn Station after taking the LIRR from JFK.  Great location close to transportation and walking distance from many sites and neighborhoods.  Great staff, clean rooms, and comfortable beds.  Love the complementary breakfast.  We will stay here again.

title: Booked me in an occupied room
text: Front deskgave me keys to an occupied room. Walked in on guest in his bed. Awful experience. Front desk yelled at employees in front of me. Very unprofessional of female manager. I'm very lucky guest I walked in on was so calm. Could have been a scary situation.

title: Great Urban Hamton
text:
Great Hampton, with one hiccup......elevators were extremely noisy during my visit.  There are only two and they are very busy.  They shut the noisy one down during most of the sleeping hours, and that made the wait very long.  This is a tall narrow tower with few rooms per floor, so they are all clustered around the noisy elevator.

Good breakfast.  Larger room than I expected.  Good bathroom with decent sized vanity.  In-room coffee.

title: Excellent experience
text: Very nice rooms.  Our room was  clean and very large. The staff is extremely helpful. They are attentive to every need. My family was totally satisfied with the complimentary breakfast. If you like to shop, the location is perfect. The only downfall is the slow internet.

title: Great staff and beautiful hotel in NY
text: First of all, the staff in very helpful and do their best to make sure you are happy. The room I stayed in was big enough for me and my friend. The room was clean and very comfortable. We enjoyed our trip to NY and I would definitely be back.

title: Convenient location
text: The hotel suited my needs for a long weekend tourist trip.  My experience was extremely average. The elevators are extremely slow, and only one was working most of the stay.  The front desk was chaotic every time I walked by.

title: Great Hotel
text:
I know this is a Hampton Inn in a city full of amazing hotels.  But honestly, I really think you can't beat the location.  It's convenient to multiple subway lines, maybe a 15 minute walk to GCS, without traffic I can to/from LGA in like 20/25 minutes.  And best of all Lord and Taylor is around the corner!

I started staying here because its my sisters goto for business travel.  And honestly the staff are so friendly, the rooms are perfect for a few nights stay.  I never make it to the breakfast because I'm in NY and I have so many other places to try, but I have grabbed drinks at the bar, and its always a nice spot to grab a glass of wine.  I will be back in August!

title: Birthday Weekend in NYC
text:
We took our daughter to NY for the weekend for her birthday, and the Hampton Inn was a perfect base.  It was about a five-minute walk from Penn Station and Macy's and five minutes to the Empire State Building.  There were several little restaurants and take-out places near by, and it was about 10-15 minutes to Times Square.

The room was clean and the beds were extremely comfortable.  We also really appreciated the complimentary full hot-breakfast in the morning.  I would definitely stay here again as it was still close to a lot of attractions, but not on a noisy street.

title: Great Location
text: I love the location of this hotel.  I was able to get on the High   Line, which is approximately .8 miles away from here, and walk to the Whitney.  I also took 5th Avenue and walked to The Met, which took approximately 50 minutes.  It is very close to the Empire State Building and NYU.

title: Clean, conventiebtl located with a good breakfast included
text: Steps away from the subway.   Close to Empire State Buiilding.  Within walking distance to Times Swuare without being part of the hectic crowd that draws.   Great location. Clean and well kept.  Keep checking website closer to your stay for price drops and call Hilton and have it rebooked.

title: Great STAFF
text: Excellent staff from the front desk to the breakfast area, to the maid service. Breakfast was excellent, lots of space to eat and lots of choices. Clean room, little on the small side but that's to be expected in NYC. Great location. Very enjoyable stay.

title: Well satisfied
text: Room not quite as small as feared; managed to stay four ppl/3 nights there. Kids loved the bathtub. Breakfast was good and had reasonably healthy options. Very conveniently located, yet quietish location. Very helpful staff.

title: Good location in NY
text: Overall this hotel is pretty good.  The location is great-right around the corner from Empire State Building.  Also easy access to subway and even Times Square is in walking distance.  Hotel is clean and staff is very nice.

title: friendly and good location
text: exceptionally friendly and responsive place to stay - location is central if a bit hectic but, hey, it's NYC - terrific complementary breakfast, and impeccable cleanliness in room along with reasonable fitness centre make this an all-purpose place

title: Excellent hotel
text: Excellent hotel and staff, very good location. The breakfast is wonderful. Overall we had a very good experience. I would definitely recommend it to my family and friends. The price of the room was pretty cheap compared to the other hotels around. I will go back there on my next trip.

title: Excelente localização
